hypo: This is one of the important skills certification that I find important beyond a driving license!

src: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
tgt: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.
hypo: Introduce:  Emergency treatment is actually for immediate response during sudden emergency situations, before the medical team comes.

src: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
tgt: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.
hypo: As is well known, there is a certain period during which the救护车 is required to arrive after the incident has occurred. This period is truly critical.

src: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
tgt: This period is the most important time for first aid.
hypo: This is the time when there is a need for emergency medical care.

src: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
tgt: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
hypo: If we really experience a heart attack, brain attack, and respiratory arrest, then our window of life only consists of four minutes，也被称为“黄金四分钟”!

src: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
tgt: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!
hypo: So it goes, how important is it that those around you know first aid!   So it is, how crucial it is to have knowledge of first aid when you're around!

src: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
tgt: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.
hypo: When someone falls around us, we can use our professional knowledge to help them before they become frightening. instead of standing there aimlessly,

src: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
tgt: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.
hypo: According to official data, there are over 30 million accidental deaths annually in China, and the most dangerous form of cardiac arrest is占比。

src: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
tgt: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.
hypo: "在美国全国，平均15%的人能够被拯救。"

src: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
tgt: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”
hypo: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。  这句话的英语翻译是：In Las Vegas'赌场酒店， about 80% to 90% of the visitors can recover, while Shanghai and Beijing are less than 1%.

src: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
tgt: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.
hypo: This is said by Lu Li, the founder of First Response.

src: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
tgt: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.
hypo: If someone has a cardiac arrest and their breathing is gone, and their heart is not beating, pinching theirphiltrum is not helpful.

src: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
tgt: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.
hypo: There is a chance to save the person if they must undergo artificial respiration and chest compressions.

src: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
tgt: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.
hypo: I find that very few people now have the awareness to study first aid, but when accidents happen, it's too late. Therefore, I呼吁 everyone to study this skill so that we can respond promptly in case of sudden situations.

src: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
tgt: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!
hypo: "说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！" 的英语翻译是 "It may still be possible to save a person's life!" or "It could still be a good idea to try and save someone's life."

src: 急救证可以在你们当地的红十字会培训中心报名，我是在珠海的红十字会培训中心报名的，学生还有优惠呢。
tgt: People can apply for the certificate of first aid at your local Red Cross Training Center, and I applied for my certificate at the Red Cross Training Center in Zhuhai; students are offered with a discount.
hypo: Ambulance certificate can be applied for at the Red Cross training center in your local area. I applied for it at the Red Cross training center in Zhuhai, and students have special discounts.

I have planned to obtain a diving certification and I have seen an Aid Certificate of First Arrival (Aide Certificate) on Xiaohongshu. src: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
tgt: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.
hypo: The advantage of using concrete blocks to form检查井 is that the blocks are all凹凸槽-shaped on all four sides, which can be combined and砌筑 to form a chain.

src: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
tgt: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.
hypo: The resistance of the wall on the well-head is far greater than the brickwork used for flat friction bricks.

src: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
tgt: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.
hypo: The module is a hollow structure, which is combined and assembled into纵向 and横向 holes that are interconnected. After the hole core is filled with concrete, a cast concrete network structure is formed, which serves as a secondary reinforcement and waterproofing effect.

src: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
tgt: The joint bar grooves are equipped for modules vertically and horizontally; the horizontal and vertical joint bars can improve the overall strength of the structure.
hypo: The module has holes for reinforcements on both theHorizontal and vertical sides, which helps to improve the overall strength of the structure by accordingly adding横向 and纵向 reinforcements.

src: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
tgt: In addition, phenomena such as collapse, sink or water leakage are rare in the inspection shafts and pumping shafts laid with concrete inspection shaft modules, with stable mechanical performance in shaft wall modules, easy operation and standard forming size.
hypo: The shafts and检查井 modules are made of concrete, which makes them less prone to collapse，下沉， and leakage phenomena. The mechanical performance of the壁 module is stable, easy to operate, and standard in terms of dimensions.

src: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备智能控制配备数据输入、输出装置一键通触摸式液晶显示监控机械操作全部过程，实现理想的人机对话、自动分析比料、密度运转、安全逻辑控制及故障诊断系统。

The触摸式液晶 display monitor operates through a logic control system, achieving an ideal human-machine interaction, automatic analysis of material parameters, density operation, safety logic control, and fault diagnosis system.

src: 国际橄榄油协会将橄榄油分为初榨橄榄油（Virgin Olive Oil）和精炼橄榄油（Lampante Olive Oil或Refined Olive Oil）两大类，五个级别。
tgt: The International Olive Oil Association divides olive oil into two categories, Virgin Olive Oil and Lampante Olive Oil or Refined Olive Oil, and five levels.
hypo: The International Olive Association divides olive oil into two categories: Virgin Olive Oil and Refined Olive Oil, and offers them in five grades.

src: 初榨橄榄油或称为天然橄榄油，是直接从新鲜的橄榄果实中采取机械冷榨、经过过滤等处理除去异物后得到的油脂。
tgt: Virgin olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is oil obtained from fresh olive fruit after removing foreign matters by mechanical cold pressing and filtering.
hypo: Refined olive oil, also known as natural olive oil, is a liquid obtained directly from fresh olive fruits by mechanical冷榨， followed by filtering to remove impurities.

src: 根据酸度的不同可分为三个级别：
tgt: There are three levels according to acidity:
hypo: There are three levels of acidity based on the different degrees of acidity.

src: 特级初榨橄榄油（Extra Virgin）：是最高级别、质量最高的橄榄油，是纯天然产品。
tgt: Extra Virgin: is the highest level, best quality olive oil, a pure natural product.
hypo: Extra Virgin橄榄油： is the highest quality, best product, natural product

src: 口味绝佳，有淡雅怡人的植物芬芳，酸度不超过1%。
tgt: It has premium taste, a slight and pleasant plant fragrance and a acidity of less than 1%.
hypo: The taste is excellent, with a gentle and soothing plant fragrance, and the acidity is no more than 1%.

src: 优质初榨橄榄油（Fine Virgin）：酸度稍高，但不超过2%，味道纯正、芳香。
tgt: Fine Virgin: has a slightly higher acidity of less than 2%, tastes pure and aromatic.
hypo: Higher acidity  Virgin: Fine

src: 普通初榨橄榄油（Ordinary Virgin）：口味与风味尚可，酸度不超过3.3%。
tgt: Ordinary Virgin: taste and flavor are acceptable, with an acidity of no more than 3.3%.
hypo: Ordinary Virgin橄榄油： The flavor and flavor are quite good, and the acidity should not exceed 3.3%.

src: 精炼橄榄油是指酸度超过3.3%的初榨橄榄油精炼后所得到的橄榄油，或成为“二次油”。
tgt: Refined Olive Oil refers to olive oil obtained from the refining of virgin olive oil with an acidity of over 3.3%, also called as “secondary oil”.
hypo: 精炼橄榄油 refers to secondary oil obtained from crude oil橄榄油 after its pH is below 3.3%, which is commonly known as "二次油".

src: 精炼橄榄油可分为两个级别：
tgt: Refined Olive Oil can be divided into two categories:
hypo: 精炼橄榄油可以分为两类：

src: 普通橄榄油（Olive Oil）：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。
tgt: Olive Oil: is refined olive oil mixed with virgin olive oil in a certain proportion to adjust the taste and color, has an acidity of under 1.5% and a transparent light gold color.
hypo: 普通橄榄油(Olive Oil)：精炼橄榄油与一定比例的初榨橄榄油混合，以调和味道与颜色，其酸度在1.5%以下，呈透明的淡金黄色。

src: 精炼橄榄杂质油或橄榄果渣油（Refined Olive-Pomace Oil）：是通过溶解法从油渣中提取并经过精炼而得到的橄榄油。
tgt: Refined Olive-Pomace Oil is olive oil obtained and refined from pomace with dissolution method.
hypo: Refined Olive 杂质油或橄榄果渣油(Refined Olive-Pomace Oil)：是通过对油渣进行溶解提取精炼得到的橄榄油。

src: 看过等级分类的你应该已经发现，橄榄油的酸度是一个非常重要的指标。
tgt: After reading the classification, you may find the acidity of olive oil is an important index.
hypo: You should have noticed that the acidity of橄榄油 is a very important index.

src: 要知道，橄榄果就好像酿制葡萄酒的葡萄一样，来自不同的产区、不同橄榄果品种的橄榄果，就会出产不同标准的橄榄油。
tgt: You should know that olives are just like grapes that make wine, olives from different producing areas and different types of olives will produce olive oil of different standards.
hypo: You need to know that olive fruits, like grapes for winemaking, come from different regions and variety of olive fruits. Therefore, the olive oil produced from these olive fruits can have different standards.

src: 油橄榄的最佳生长地：
tgt: The best growing area of olives:
hypo: The best place for olive oil to grow:

src: 地中海沿岸具有油橄榄生长所需的最适宜的土壤和气温、日照、空气湿度以及降水量等气候条件。
tgt: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil, temperature, sunshine, air humidity, precipitation and other weather conditions for olive growth.
hypo: The Mediterranean coastal area has the most suitable soil and climate conditions for olive grove growth, including soil type, temperature, sunlight, humidity, and precipitation.

src: 除地中海沿岸外，其它地区只能在适生区零星种植。
tgt: Aside from the Mediterranean costal area, olives can only be planted sporadically in suitable areas in other areas.
hypo: The这句话的英语翻译是：Other than the Mediterranean coast, olives can only be planted零星ly in suitable areas.  注意：本题考查单词的准确拼写。olives 的正确拼写为 "olive"。

src: 主要产区产地（地中海）：
tgt: Main producing areas (the Mediterranean):
hypo: The main producing area is the Mediterranean:

src: 意大利、西班牙、希腊、土耳其、葡萄牙、摩洛哥、叙利亚、以色列、突尼斯、阿尔及利亚、埃及、巴基斯坦、黎巴嫩等等，与其气候类似的也有远在南纬度的阿根廷、秘鲁、南非等等。
tgt: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey, Portugal, Morocco, Syria, Israel, Tunisia, Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan, Lebanon, etc., and Argentina, Peru, South Africa, etc., which are far away in the southern latitude and have similar climate.
hypo: Italy, Spain, Greece, Turkey，葡萄牙， Morocco, Syria, Israel，尼斯， Algeria, Egypt, Pakistan，黎巴嫩， South Africa，阿根廷，秘鲁， and so on.   Note: This translation assumes that the text referred to is a list of countries with their climates.

src: 油橄榄的采摘月份：
tgt: Picking time of olives:
hypo: The time of橄榄 harvest is

src: 每年的3至6月，是油橄榄树开花坐果的时间，7至10月果实开始发育并且成熟，果实从绿色过渡到红色，紫色，最后变黑。
tgt: March to June each year is the time for olive trees to blossom and bear fruit, and from July to October, the fruit begins to develop and ripen, and the color of fruit will transition from green to red, purple and finally black.
hypo: The period from March to June is when olive trees bloom and bear fruit. Fruit starts to develop and mature from July to October. The fruits change from green to red, purple, and finally black.

src: 11月至次年2月是果实的采摘季节（橄榄油的新鲜度可是很重要的哦）。
tgt: November to February of next year is the picking time of fruit (the freshness of olive oil is very important).
hypo: The time of果实采摘 is from November to February (the freshness of橄榄油 is very important).

src: 橄榄油的营养成分：

hypo: 橄榄油的营养成分： 确保包含这些词： Nutrients of

src: 橄榄油富含丰富的单不饱和脂肪酸，即油酸及亚油酸、亚麻酸，还有维生素A、维生素B、维生素D、维生素E、维生素K及抗氧化物等。
tgt: Olive oil is rich in monounsaturated fatty acids, namely oleic acid, linoleic acid, linolenic acid, vitamin A, vitamin B, vitamin D, vitamin E, vitamin K and antioxidants.
hypo: Olive oil is rich in mono不饱和脂肪酸， including 油酸 and 亚油酸， as well as 亚麻酸，和维生素A, B, D, E, K, and antioxidants.

src: 橄榄油被认为是迄今所发现的油脂中最适合人体营养的油。
tgt: Olive oil is deemed the most suitable oil for human nutrition among all the oils found so far.
hypo: Olive oil is deemed the most suitable oil for human nutrition among the oils discovered to date.

src: 每个人的爱好不同，有人喜欢收藏，有人喜欢美食，当然也有人喜欢品酒，红牌威士忌是目前各个国家最畅销的苏格兰威士忌之一，而且红牌威士忌曾获国际洋酒大赛金奖。
tgt: Different people have different preferences; some like to collect, some like food, and certainly some like wine tasting; Johnnie Walker Red Label is one of the fastest selling Scottish whiskies in the world and has won the gold prize of International Wine Competition.
hypo: Each person has different hobbies, some like collecting, some like food, and of course, some people also like to taste wine. Red Label威士忌 is one of the most畅销 Scottish威士忌s in various countries today, and it has won the gold medal at the International Wine Competition.

tgt: Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky has its own unique flavor, but if you don’t know how to taste it, it would be such a waste of its mellow fragrance.
hypo: Each bottle of Red Label威士忌 owns unique flavor, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, it's not a way to waste its fragrance.

src: 尊尼获加红牌威士忌由约35种苏格兰威士忌调配而成，具有浓郁芳香及传统苏格兰威士忌的特质，浓郁芳香中带有甘甜及烟熏香味。
tgt: Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky is blended with around 35 kinds of Scotch Whiskies, possesses rich fragrance and the characteristics of traditional Scotch whisky, with both sweetness and smoked smell in its rich fragrance.
hypo: The Red Label of Johnnie Walker is blended with approximately 35 types of Scottish whisky, featuring rich and flavorful aromas and traditional Scottish whisky characteristics, including a savory and smoky flavor.

src: 入口浓醇清新，略带香草及浓烈的烟熏麦芽味道。

hypo: The wine can be drunk directly from the refrigerator or mixed with your favorite drinks.

src: 红牌威士忌进入国内,为了适应国人的口味,红牌威士忌+可乐或雪碧或新奇士等气泡饮料成为一种经久不衰的时尚。
tgt: After Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky entered China, in order to adapt to the tastes of Chinese people, drinking Red Label whisky with bubble beverage such as Cola, Sprite or Sunkist has become an enduring fashion.
hypo: The red labelWhisky has entered domestic market, and in order to adapt to the tastes of domestic people, the red labelWhisky + bubble drinks such as可乐，雪碧， and C是无脊椎动物饮料成为经久不衰的时尚。

src: 这些甜味的饮料，除了可以中和酸味,在视觉上能给人带来愉悦，加入饮料,起到冲淡酒味改变口感的效果。
tgt: These sweet drinks not only can neutralize the sour taste, bring pleasure to people visually, but also can dilute the taste of wine and change the overall taste.
hypo: These sweet drinks, apart from中和ing the酸味， can also bring people pleasure in the eyes and have the effect of稀释the酒味 and changing the flavor of the drink.

src: 红牌威士忌+切片柠檬+方糖(砂糖亦可),是最正宗、最传统的喝法.
tgt: Red Label whisky + sliced lemon + cube sugar (granulated sugar is also acceptable) is the most authentic and traditional drinking method.
hypo: The translation of the sentence is: "Red LabelWhisky, sliced lemon, granulated sugar (or other granulated sugar) is the most authentic and traditional way to drink."

src: 正宗的红方威味道有些酸涩,加入糖可以中和其中的酸味,柠檬则会给酒带来清新的香味,当然,甜酸度可根据个人的口味爱好调配。
tgt: Authentic Red Label whisky tastes a little sour; adding sugar can neutralize the sour taste, lemon will bring fresh fragrance to the wine, and of course, the sweetness and sourness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.
hypo: The正宗的 redapple wine tastes a bit bitter. Adding sugar can help to中和 the bitterness, and lemon will bring a fresh scent to the wine. Of course, the sweetness or bitterness can be adjusted according to personal tastes.

src: 以上三种都是红牌威士忌的最好喝法，大家可以作为参考尝试下，希望小编的介绍可以帮助到大家。

src: 在选照片的时候，因为在网上看到很多案例，不愿意让客人删太多照片，但是我们选照片的时候，真的，一点没有让我们加照片的意思，直接套餐里的24张，一张都没有加（听说和我差不多时间拍婚纱照的表妹，七千多的套餐还加了一万多的照片，当时我就惊呆了，心里也很怕自己会选太多）
tgt: When choosing the photos, I saw many cases online where they wouldn’t let the customers delete too many photos, but they didn’t ask us to add photos at all, just the 24 photos in the set and nothing more (I heard that my cousin who was also taking wedding dress photos added photos worth over 10,000 in addition to the 7,000 yuan set, and I was stunned and feared I might choose too many).
hypo: When choosing photos, due to seeing many examples online, we are not willing to let our guests delete too many photos. However, when we were choosing photos, we did not even give the option to add more photos to the套餐， choosing only the 24 photos included in the package without any additional options. src: 大美360集成家装
tgt: Damei 360 Integrated Home Decoration
hypo: Great Damei 360 integrated home decoration

src: 地 址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼
tgt: Address: Happy Home Building 12, South Ring Road 156
hypo: Address: 12楼， Ring Road, No. 156, Happy Home Building

src: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
tgt: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.
hypo: I trusted my friend, so I decided to take a look.

src: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
tgt: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.
hypo: Come to the store, and then start a series of scams.

src: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
tgt: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.
hypo: I showed them my apartment图 first, and they didn't measure the house. They offered me a price of 70000 for my 135-square-foot apartment, even though they didn't know the brand of the materials. They just saw the material briefly, and didn't know what brand it was.

src: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
tgt: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.
hypo: Their second scam is that they will keep holding back the deposit until you come to the store (and once the money is sent, you can't get it back unless you have enough experience to argue with them).

src: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
tgt: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.
hypo: When I was in the midst of considering whether to pay the deposit, they invited their所谓的经理 to come and tell me how much advantage we could give you if you today paid the deposit.

src: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
tgt: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.
hypo: This is just a big trap, and I am just a victim who really got scammed. I paid over $1,000 in advance as soon as I got的冲动.

src: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
tgt: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.
hypo: The quoted price I received from him contains many issues, which does not include water and electricity improvements, and also does not include any doors, refrigerator, or bathroom. These are the main expenses for the foundation.

src: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
tgt: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.
hypo: After considering these factors, their point fee is also higher than other companies.

src: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
tgt: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.
hypo: I have lost faith in this company since they didn't clearly communicate before allowing me to sign a contract.

src: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
tgt: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.
hypo: When I asked them to ask for the money back, they表现出很有经验的样子. They had a专门的 small team to deal with you.

src: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。
tgt: Anyway, they just said it was the client’s problem and they had absolutely no responsibility for it.
hypo: "Regardless of whether it's a problem or not, the customer is always to be责任less."

src: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
tgt: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.
hypo: The translation of the above Chinese sentence is:  "各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。"  The English translation is:  "There are various excuses for responsibility, there are many details, I don't want to share all my tears, in short, don't choose them, because my friend's apartment was not in good condition after they decorated it, and they will charge you various fees in the end."

src: 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。
tgt: Swindle; they used to be the swindler company Longtou Renovation, then it’s changed to Damei, and now it seems they have closed down and changed into something else.
hypo: It seems that the original decorative龙头 is now replaced by a much larger one, and it seems that Longtou Renovation has went bankrupt and replaced it with something else.

src: 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。
tgt: So please don’t choose such a swindler company.
hypo: So please, don't choose such a swindler's装修公司.

src: 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。
tgt: When you choose renovation companies in the future, please search them on Baidu because renovation cost is not a small amount.
hypo: 以下是包含这些词的英语翻译：  1. When you choose, 2. Look up, 3. Check, 4.因为装修不是小钱。  所以，以下是这句话的英语翻译：  "以后的大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。"

The化妆 and customer service were both very耐心. They will teach you how to pose for the cameras later. src: 推荐理由:精选高粱为原料，采用传统工艺酿造，来自内蒙古高原的白酒，口感更为经典，浓香甜口，涩中带点甜，层次丰富，采用传统固态法白酒工艺，保留了其原汁原味不流失，让酒体带着浓郁又醇厚的口感。
tgt: Recommendation: Made from carefully selected sorghum, brewed using traditional procedure; baijiu from Inter Mongolian Plateau tastes more classic, rich, sweet, astringent and layered; it adopts traditional solid-state Baijiu procedure to keep its original flavor, giving it a rich and mellow taste.

By following the traditional solid-state method of Baijiu cooking, we can keep the original flavor and essence intact, leaving the的酒体 with a rich and profound taste.

hypo: The recommended reason: After several years of storage, it has become more浓郁 and clear. It is a popular drink for the草原游牧民族 in Inner Mongolia's grasslands. src: 周围是真不怎样，饭店五金店寥寥无几，而且饭店味道一般般。

src: 这个电梯也是很无语，跟有那大病一样，负二到负一，来回折腾，不停我按的这一层，从安全通道下去到一楼，也是很无语，直接通到一个家具店，家具店关门，安全通道出不去!
tgt: This elevator really makes people speechless; it went back and forth from B2 to B1 and did not stop on my floor, and it was ridiculous that when I went to the 1st floor from fire escape, it led to a furniture store which was closed, so I couldn’t get out from the fire escape, either!
hypo: This elevator is really无语. It goes back and forth between負二和負一 like there's a big problem. I pressed this floor, but it didn't stop at my choice. I need to go down to the first floor from the safety通道， but the store closed the door and I can't get out from there!

src: 浙大学术年会上学生唱主角 研究成果让人脑洞大开-新华网
tgt: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet
hypo: The student students of Zhejiang University played the主角 at the academic conference, and their research results opened up new perspectives. (新华网)

src: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
tgt: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.
hypo: Using air to wash the hands, breathing to diagnose diseases, and precise searching for the source of air pollution were recognized during the opening ceremony of the 2016 academic conference of Zhejiang University.

src: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
tgt: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.
hypo: These results are mainly researched by students, covering major fields such as environment, machinery, energy, medical, life science, and humanities education. Students started with interesting ideas and created many high-end inventions with practical value. Some of these projects have been awarded at home and abroad.

src: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
tgt: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor
hypo: Biocompatibility sensor: your family health examination doctor

src: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
tgt: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.
hypo: Zhang Diming's team at the biomedical engineering school demonstrates a biological sensor that is half the size of a智能手机.

src: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
tgt: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”
hypo: You only need to take a deep breath, and this set of instruments can初步detect your health status from the gas composition of your exhalation.

src: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
tgt: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.
hypo: Zhang Di Ming said that this set of sensors is connected to a smartphone, and after taking a breath, the health report will be displayed on the phone.

src: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
tgt: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
hypo: Smart watches that can detect health conditions typically measure temperature and heart rate as physical parameters.

src: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
tgt: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.
hypo: The above sentence can be translated into English as follows:  This set of biosensing devices employs carbon atoms in the form of石墨烯， which serves as the target material. The keen "嗅觉" of these sensors enables them to more deeply and accurately reflect the health status of the body.

src: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
tgt: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors
hypo: Smart手术灯：医生的高能眼睛。

src: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
tgt: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.
hypo: In addition to smartphones, intelligent手术 lights are also used in operating rooms.

src: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
tgt: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.
hypo: This invention won a silver award at the 44th International Inventive Fair in Geneva, Switzerland this year.

src: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
tgt: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.
hypo: The朱林靖， Shuang Chen-fu team from the Photochemical and Solar Energy Science and Engineering College has opened a new approach in the shortcomings of traditional operating lighting, and发明了 a intelligent LED operation shadow-less lighting.

src: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
tgt: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”
hypo: "Early detection and surgery are not always effective in many diseases, which is related to the lights used in the doctors' operating rooms."

src: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
tgt: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.
hypo: So the sentence in English would be: "申俊飞 says that, for example, during early inspection of cancer, if doctors are not able to see all tumor tissue in a timely manner，癌细胞 may still spread after that."

src: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
tgt: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.
hypo: This intelligent surgical light has four light sources, and it enhances the contrast of different tissues under light by adjusting the光谱.

src: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
tgt: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.
hypo: During the手术 process, doctors can adjust the size of the light spot, brightness level, spectrum, color temperature, and shadows rate according to the手术 needs and personal habits.

src: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
tgt: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.
hypo: This intelligent surgical lighting has been tried in Sir Run Hospital, Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University Medical College, and Zhejiang University Medical College Affiliated Children's Hospital, and has received good feedback.

src: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
tgt: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.
hypo: Last October, this invention won the first prize in the National Challenge Cup.

src: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
tgt: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way
hypo: Washing, air, saving, water, cool，酷炫， smart.

src: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
tgt: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.
hypo: The English translation for the sentence is: "For ordinary people，洗手 simply involves water washing, perhaps scraping off some soap, and injecting some洗手液. However, classmates like Qizhang and others have invented a set of 'air-refreshing洗手 devices'."

src: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
tgt: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.
hypo: As long as we stand on the device洗手台， our weight can compress the air out.

src: “就像是一个打气筒。
tgt: “Just like an inflator.
hypo: "Just like an inflator."

src: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
tgt: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.
hypo: 压缩空气 that is obtained through compression forms a fluid at the faucet, and it combines with water.

src: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
tgt: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”
hypo: So, we can get our hands clean then!

src: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
tgt: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.
hypo: The Chromogenic reaction and细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。  The effect of洗手 through this method has been demonstrated by the chromaogenic reaction and细菌残留实验.

src: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
tgt: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.
hypo: This device can be driven only by the gravity of ourselves, which can ensure the cleaning level and also save 90% of water, making it completely energy-efficient and environmental friendly.

src: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
tgt: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.
hypo: Last year, during the second global major challenge summit, this invention emerged as the only award winner among numerous top universities worldwide.   Note: This sentence is from a Chinese source, and the translation may vary depending on the context and regional language usage.

src: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
tgt: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
hypo: The Chinese University of Finance and Economics is piloting a modern master's program in corporate training, with students入学就等于是企业准员工， according toXinhuanet.

src: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
tgt: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
hypo: Last night, I was informed by the City Education Commission that from this year, our city will carry out a pilot experiment of the "modern apprenticeship scheme" in talent development training, where students who are accepted for pilot training will also hold apprentice status. After enrollment and录入， they will be pre-encoded as unit employees by the pilot enterprises.

src: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
tgt: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
hypo: The city government requires the standardization of enrollment and hiring procedures for vocational schools and enterprises, clarify the双重身份 of apprentices who are students in vocational schools and employees in enterprises, and sign a three-party agreement between the apprentice, the school, and the enterprise according to the双向选择 principle. For apprentices aged 16 or above but not 18, the agreement must be signed by the apprentice, guardian, school, and enterprise in a四方 format to determine specific positions, teaching content, and rights and benefits of all parties.

src: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
tgt: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
hypo: Encourage试点学校 to adopt the modern master- apprentice system format and collaborate with joint enterprises to carry out employee pre-shift and shift training.

src: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
tgt: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
hypo: Experimental schools need to reform the training and development招生模式.

src: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
tgt: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
hypo: "We jointly design a talent cultivation program, jointly establish professional teaching standards, curriculum standards, job standards, enterprise masters standards, quality control standards, and corresponding implementation plans."

src: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
tgt: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
hypo: The试点 period is set to train students, and the实习 duration in enterprises is determined by the professional人才培养 plan. The typical duration of full-time实习 is usually 6 months.

src: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
tgt: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
hypo: In the practice of enterprises, the enterprise team-based management model should be implemented. Depending on the characteristics of different专业， one master can lead 2-5 students to form learning teams, ensuring that students fully master the skills required for each training position.

src: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
tgt: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
hypo: According to plan, from February 2016 to August 2019, our city has identified 60 pilot batches of modern professional learning programs at 20 public junior colleges, with a total number of around 3,000 students (trainees) in each batch.

src: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
tgt: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
hypo: According to the principle of launching pilot programs before adopting them widely and gradually expanding from point to point, we are currently exploring the long-term mechanism of jointly recruiting, training, and nurturing students from schools and enterprises. This will effectively improve the skills of students and increase their job chances and job quality.

src: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
tgt: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
hypo: The Chinese Children's Center will hold a series of activities to let children "高科技" celebrate "六一".

src: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
hypo: As reported to us by the Chinese Children's Center on May 20th, there are plans to hold various activities such as children's Maker Experience, Children's Visual Arts Festival, family book festival, and more from May 28th to June 1st, the六一儿童节前后. These activities aim to allow children to experience the charm of cutting-edge technology and make the六一儿童节 a memorable one.

src: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
tgt: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
hypo: I am aware that the activities scheduled for the "First Day of the Six-One儿童节" at the Chinese Children's Center this year include "Love Home and Creativity酷" Children's Future Learning Celebration, the first Children's Visual Art Festival, "Smile Through Reading" Book Series, and other activities such as the "Smile Through Reading" Book Festival.

src: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
tgt: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
hypo: The central child protection director, Li Zhongming, said at the press conference on the 19th anniversary of the六一儿童节 in 2016 that "A Family with Innovation and酷" children's future learning festival was a key activity for this year's celebration of the六一儿童节 at the Chinese Children's Center.

src: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
tgt: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
hypo: The activity focuses on integrating social innovation with individual creative ideas of families, through children and families participating in various innovative learning experiences that make innovative practices become cultural genes of mass families and encourage "making things" as a new way of learning and living for a large number of families.

src: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
tgt: It is understood that “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning includes dozens of leading scientific and technological experience such as the “Douguo Makers” experience activity, Old Cow children exploration house anniversary celebration and the “Exploring Love of the Whole Family, Celebrate the Children’s Day with Innocence” activity, VR Public Experience Plan and “Creator Tribe” interaction workshop.
hypo: According to reports, "A Home for the Creative and酷" children's future learning celebration includes "Bahrain Business Modelers" experience activities, the first anniversary celebration of the Old牛 Children's Explore Center and "Exploring the Family, Love, and Happy六一" activities, VR world experience plan, interactive workshop of "Business Modelers Club" and many more cutting-edge technology experience content.

src: 南非医生：奥密克戎传播力虽强 但多为轻症
tgt: Doctors from South Africa: Although more transmissible, most of the patients infected by Omicron are mild cases
hypo: 南非医生：奥密克戎虽然有强烈的传播力，但多为轻症。

src: 南非许多医生和医疗专家认为，新冠病毒奥密克戎变种所致病症比德尔塔变种更为轻微，虽然传播速度更快。
tgt: Many doctors and medical experts in South Africa believe that patients infected by Omicron are milder cases compared with those infected by Delta, although Omicron is more transmissible.
hypo: Many medical experts in South Africa believe that the symptoms caused by the Omicron variant of the COVID-19 virus are milder than those caused by the Delta variant, although the spread of the Omicron variant is faster.

src: 据美联社报道，随着奥密克戎变种在南非的传播，南非豪登省的一个五千多名医生组成医师组织报告说，他们目前治疗的新冠病人出现的症状都比较轻微，例如身体疼痛和咳嗽等与流感类似的症状。
tgt: According to report from the Associated Press, as Omicron is being transmitted in South Africa, a report by a physician organization composed by more than 5,000 doctors in Gauteng, South Africa says that most of the current patients of COVID-19 in treatment have mild symptoms, such as body ache and cough, which are similar to symptoms of flu.
hypo: According to a report from美联社， as the Omicron variant spreads in South Africa, a group of五千多名 doctors from the province of Gauteng in South Africa report that the symptoms they are seeing in patients being treated for COVID-19 are relatively mild, including symptoms such as physical pain and fatigue, which are similar to those seen in influenza.

src: 该组织总监安本·皮莱（Unben Pillay）医生说，他每天都要看几十名病人，但是还没有任何病人需要住院。
tgt: According to Doctor Unben Pillay, chief supervisor of the organization, he needs to provide medical services to dozens of patients every day, but none of them needs to be hospitalized.
hypo: The director of the organization, Unben Pillay, says he sees dozens of patients a day, but none need to be hospitalized.

src: 皮莱说 ： “ 他们能够在家里控制疾病，大多数人在隔离10至14天内康复 。 ”
tgt: Pillay said, “Their diseases can be controlled at home, and most of them can recover after quarantine of 10 to 14 days.”
hypo: Pillay said, "They can control the disease at home and most people recover within 10 to 14 days of isolation."

src: 他说，这包括老年患者和那些有健康问题的患者，这些人群本来更容易因冠状病毒感染而陷入重症。
tgt: He said that those included aged patients and patients with health problems, who were easier to become severe cases due to infection of the COVID-19.
hypo: He said that includes elderly patients and those with health problems, who were generally easier to develop severe COVID-19 infections.

src: 他说，与之相比，在上一波的德尔塔疫情中，他治疗的新冠患者“呼吸困难，血氧水平低。
tgt: He said that, in comparison, the COVID-19 patients he treated in the last round of epidemic suffered from “breathing difficulties and low blood oxygen.
hypo: He said that compared to the previous wave of Delta virus, the patients he treated suffering from "air hunger and low blood oxygen levels."

src: 许多人几天内就要住院 ” 。
tgt: Many of them needed to be hospitalized within only a few days”.
hypo: Many people will be admitted to the hospital within a few days.

src: 在南部非洲首次报告奥密克戎变异毒株后的两周内，其他医生也分享了类似的经验。
tgt: Other doctors shared similar experience within 2 weeks after the first report of Omicron the new variant in South Africa.
hypo: After the first report of the Omicron variant in southern Africa, other doctors also shared similar experiences within two weeks.

src: 虽然收集足够的数据还需要几个星期的时间，但医生的观察和早期证据提供了一些线索。
tgt: Although it will take some more weeks to collect sufficient evidence, observation and early proof from doctors have provided some clues.
hypo: Although it will take several weeks to collect enough data, the doctor's observation and early evidence have provided some clues.

src: 据南非国家传染病研究所总结：在近几周住院的新冠患者中，只有30%是严重病症，是前一波疫情重症比例的一半；平均住院时间从8天缩短到2.8天；近期的新冠患者中，仅有3%死亡，而在南非早期爆发的病例中，死亡比例达20 % 。
tgt: According to the summary made by National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa, among the patients of COVID-19 who were hospitalized within the last few weeks, only 30% of them were severe cases, which accounts for a half of the proportion of severe cases of the last round of epidemic; the average stay at hospital is reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; only 3% of the latest patients of COVID-19 died, which used to be as high as 20% in the cases of the early epidemic phase in South Africa.
hypo: According to the South African National Institute for传染病 Research, among the patients who have been hospitalized with COVID-19 in recent weeks, only 30% have severe symptoms, half of the percentage of severe cases in the previous wave; the average length of stay has been reduced from 8 days to 2.8 days; and only 3% of recent COVID-19 patients have died, compared to a death rate of 20% in early cases of outbreak in South Africa.

src: 非洲健康研究所所长威廉·哈内科姆（Willem Hanekom）引用国家传染病研究所的数据和其他报告说 ： “ 目前，几乎所有的迹象都表明，这是一种较温和的疾病 。 ”
tgt: By quoting the data from National Institute of Infectious Diseases of South Africa and other reports, Willem Hanekom, Director of Africa Institute of Health said, “At present, almost all the evidence indicates that this is a relatively mild disease.”
hypo: According to威廉·哈内科姆， President of the African Health研究所， "at present，几乎所有的迹象表明，这是一种相对较为温和的疾病。"

src: 他还说 ： “ 现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。
tgt: He also said: “However, it’s still at early stage, and we need to obtain data of later stage.
hypo: He also said that "现在还是早期，我们需要获得后期数据。"

src: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周 。 ”
tgt: In general situations, hospitalization and death happen later, and it’s only two weeks since we entered into this round of epidemic.”
hypo: 通常情况下，住院和死亡发生的时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间只有两周。  Translation:   通常在情况下，住院和死亡的发生时间较晚，而我们进入这一波疫情的时间 only two weeks.

src: 与此同时，世界各地的科学家正在观察病例数和住院率，同时测试目前的疫苗和治疗方法的效果。
tgt: At the same time, scientists from all over the whole world are observing the number of medical cases and the rate of hospitalization, as well as testing the effect of the current vaccines and treatment method.
hypo: Meanwhile, scientists around the world are observing the number of cases and入住率， while testing the effectiveness of current vaccines and treatment methods.

src: 尽管德尔塔仍然是全世界主要的新冠病毒株，但奥密克戎病例正在数十个国家出现，其中南非为疫情中心。
tgt: Although Delta is still the main COVID-19 virus strain of the world, Omicron cases are emerging in dozens of countries with South Africa at the center of the epidemic.
hypo: Although Delta is still the main新冠病毒 strain worldwide, Omicron cases are emerging in数十 countries, with South Africa serving as a hub of the pandemic.

src: 据卫生官员介绍，豪登省在12月的第一周发现的新病例增加了400 % ， 测试显示，奥密克戎变体的病例占90%以上。
tgt: According to introduction from health officials, the new cases detected in Gauteng province in the first week of December increased by 400%; according to test results, Omicron variant cases accounted for more than 90%.
hypo: According to health officials, the number of new cases diagnosed in Gauteng in the first week of December increased by 400%, and testing shows that cases of the Omicron variant account for more than 90%以上.

src: 教育时评:拯救被拐儿童要靠什么？
tgt: Education news commentary: What should we do to rescue abducted children?
hypo: Education commentary: What can be done to save kidnapped children?

src: 如果类比“没有买卖就没有杀害”的著名公益广告语，那么，在没有“收拐”需求的良好环境里，群防群治、全民反拐，使拐卖行为无利可图、风险大、成本高，这类犯罪也就不会屡屡发生。
tgt: As the famous public service advertising says, “there is no killing if there is no buying”; in a good environment with no demand of “buying abducted children”, if the masses can prevent and fight against abduction together and make abduction an action with no benefit, high risk and cost, then such crimes will not happen again.
hypo: If we compare the famous tagline "没有买卖就没有杀害" to the phrase "No trade, no杀害，" then in a good environment without the demand for "collection" or the need to "buy up" individuals, we can encourage community-based governance and resistance against trafficking, making trafficking行为 unprofitable, risky, and costly, thus preventing such crimes from happening again and again.

src: 近日，公安部刑事侦查局打拐办开发的儿童失踪信息紧急发布平台上线。
tgt: Recently, the platform of emergency release of missing children information developed by the Anti-Abduction Office of Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security went online.
hypo: Ministry of Public Security, criminal investigation department, anti- kidnapped department, and launched the emergency information release platform for children's disappearances recently.

src: 这是为建立儿童失踪信息发布的权威渠道、及时找回被拐儿童而创设的互联网信息平台。
tgt: This is an Internet information platform established as an authoritative channel for the release of missing children information and timely finding the abducted children.
hypo: This is an internet platform created to establish an authoritative channel for the release of child失踪 information and promptly recover stolen children.

src: 听闻此App名为“团圆 ” ， 顿觉暖意十足。
tgt: I feel warm after hearing the App is named “reunion”.
hypo: I feel

src: 新技术手段不仅名称“文艺 ” 、 情怀满满，而且信息化运用得当，实用、有效。
tgt: This new technical means not only has an “artistic” name and full of warm feelings, but also makes appropriate use of informatization, making itself practical and effective.
hypo: The new technological means not only have a "文艺" name and a strong emotional appeal, but they also make appropriate use of information technology, being practical and effective.

src: 打拐执法，首要目标是寻回被拐的孩子，保护其人身安全、自由。
tgt: The first and foremost objective of fighting against abduction is to find the abducted children and ensure their security and freedom.
hypo: The primary goal of abduction enforcement is to locate and recover children who have been kidnapped, to protect their physical safety and human rights.

src: 其次才是对嫌疑人的审判与惩罚。
tgt: The judgment and punishment to the suspect is secondary.
hypo: The second is the judgment and punishment of the suspect.

src: 刑事惩罚的意义，从个别惩罚、社会预防到法律教育，可以列举很多“大词 ” 。
tgt: In terms of the significance of criminal punishment, lots of “big words” can be listed from individual punishment and social prevention to legal education.
hypo: The meaning of criminal punishment can be listed很长很长列表， from individual punishment, social prevention, to legal education.

src: 但在拐卖案件告破之前，应优先关注被害人的人身安全。
tgt: However, before solving an abduction case, the safety of the victims should be priority.
hypo: Before solving the abduction case, it is important to prioritize the safety of the victim.

src: 事分轻重缓急，在急切的“寻救”目的之下，诸如“拐卖儿童是否应当一律死刑”之类众说纷纭、争议较大的话题，可以暂搁下来，谨慎讨论；但救助被拐儿童的事情等不得。
tgt: There are orders of priority; with the urgent goal of “rescue”, the discussion on contentious topics with divergent public opinions such as “if death penalty shall be applied to criminals of child abduction” can be shelved for now and be discussed with discretion; however, rescuing abducted children cannot be delayed.
hypo: Things have different importance and urgency. Under the urgent need for the " retrieval" of children, such controversial topics as "should child abduction be granted the death penalty" can be put on hold and discussed with caution; but the urgent need to protect children who have been abducted cannot be satisfied.

src: 根据此类案件的侦办经验，人贩子惯于在得手之后尽快远离作案地点。
tgt: According to the experience in solving such cases, human trafficking traders tend to run away from the crime scene as soon as possible after the crime.
hypo: Based on my experience in investigating such cases, human traffickingrs are commonly known to flee the scene of the crime as soon as they are caught.

src: 寻拐行动多耽搁一分钟，孩子就可能更远离家长一步，案件侦破的难度也就增加一分。
tgt: Therefore, with each minute delayed in finding abducted children, the children are farther from the parents, and the difficulty of solving the case also increases.
hypo: If the investigation takes a little longer, the children may be one step further away from their parents, and the difficulty of solving the case increases by one minute.

src: 在此情况下，拿出如“团圆”平台这样直接有助于侦破案件、寻回孩子的有效办法，确实是务实的行动。
tgt: In this case, it is a practical action to present a platform such as “reunion” which can help solve the case and provide an effective method to find the children.
hypo: In this situation, finding effective ways such as the "Unity" platform to help solve crimes and find children directly is a practical action.

src: 毕竟 ， “ 打拐”是需要运作起整个法制系统来做好的一件大任务。
tgt: After all, cracking down on abduction is a major task that requires the coordination of the entire legal system.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation: "After all, " cracking down" requires effective coordination of the entire legal system to achieve success."

src: 打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不需要贯彻“护幼扶弱”的关怀。
tgt: To crack down on crimes and protect the interests of children and parents, the care of “protecting the young and helping the weak” shall be implemented in the improvement of legislation, and in safeguarding judicial system and meticulous enforcement.
hypo: "打击犯罪、保障儿童和家长权益，从立法的完善，到司法的保障，以及执法的缜密，无不不需要贯彻‘护幼扶弱’的关怀。"   safeguarding judicial

src: 此外，拐卖儿童的预防，从家庭到社会，都还可以做得更好。
tgt: In addition, we can do better to prevent abduction of children from the perspectives of both family and society.
hypo: In addition, the prevention of child trafficking, from both the family and the society's perspectives, can also be better.

src: 比如一个常见的案例，一家三口在火车站休息，父母熟睡，醒来才发现孩子不见了。
tgt: Take a common case as an example; parents and a child were taking a rest at the train station, and the parents found their child missing after waking up.
hypo: A common case was that a family was resting at a train station. The parents were deep in sleep, and when they woke up, they found that their child was missing.

src: 不能期待一个两岁的孩子具有足够的自我保护技能，但作为年幼孩子的家长，应至少具有相当的保护意识。
tgt: You cannot expect a 2-year-old child to protect himself/herself; however, as parents of young children, adults shall have at least some degree of protection awareness.
hypo: 不能期待一个两岁的孩子具有足够的自我保护技能，但作为年幼孩子的家长，应至少具有相当的保护意识。  To ensure that includes these keywords, the English translation for the phrase " cannot expect a two-year-old child to have enough self-defense skills " would be:  It's not possible for a two-year-old child to have enough self-defense skills, but as a parent of young children, at least you should have a certain level of concern for their safety.

src: 父母两人轮流休息，又或将孩子置于稳妥的保护之下，都是预防儿童被拐的最起码手段。
tgt: The father and the mother can take turns in taking rest, or they can protect their child in a proper way, which are the basic approaches for protecting children from being abducted.
hypo: Protecting their children by having two parents轮流 rest and/or placing them in safe protection is the minimum measure to prevent children from being kidnapped.

src: 从警方打击拐卖犯罪的另一面看，购买被拐儿童一方也应被关注和惩治。
tgt: Viewing from the other side of the crackdown on abduction, the party purchasing the abducted children shall be given attention to and punished, too.
hypo: From the perspective of addressing the prevention and enforcement of abduction犯罪 by the police, the party purchasing the abducted children should also be targeted and punished.

src: 单个的不法行为，往往只是长长链条中的一环。
tgt: Any single illegal behavior is usually one link of a long chain.
hypo: A single不法行为 is often just one link in a long chain of wrong doings.

src: 根据我国《刑法》规定，拐卖儿童罪的法定刑起刑点为5年；情节特别严重的，可至死刑，并处没收财产。
tgt: According to the Penal Code in our country, the criminal penalty starting point of child abduction and sale is 5 years; suspects with especially serious circumstance may be sentenced to death penalty with confiscation of property.
hypo: The法定刑 for the crime of abduction of children under our criminal code is a maximum sentence of 5 years imprisonment; in exceptional circumstances, the sentence can extend to life imprisonment with confiscation of property also being considered.

src: 起刑点高、最高刑重，在“轻刑化”的大趋势下，拐卖儿童罪显然属于处罚较重的罪。
tgt: Under the trend of “light sentencing”, the crime of abducting and selling children has a high starting point and heavy maximum standard of sentencing, and thus it is clearly a crime with heavier sentence.
hypo: The sentence is high and the maximum punishment is heavy, under the trend of " lighter sentences". Therefore, the crime of buying and selling children clearly falls into a more serious crime.

src: 可至今每年仍还有不少的拐卖案件发生。
tgt: However, there are still lots of cases of abduction every year.
hypo: 可至今每年仍还有不少的拐卖案件发生。  The translation of this sentence in English is: However, there are still many cases of abduction every year.

src: 可见，部分人在养育儿女方面的观念落后，法律意识淡薄。
tgt: It is clear that some people are still lagging behind in the concept of raising children and have dim legal awareness.
hypo: It can be seen that some people have落后的观念 in caring for their children and lack of legal awareness.

src: 对这部分人的法制教育应该同步跟进。
tgt: Legal education should be provided to these people.
hypo: The legal education should be provided同步 for these people.

src: 要有效控制拐卖犯罪，不能仅靠官方严格执法。
tgt: It requires not only strict enforcement from authorities to effectively control the crime of abduction and selling.
hypo: To effectively control the crime of abduction, it is not enough to rely only on official strict执法.

src: 倘若收拐“市场”广泛存在，拐卖者利欲熏心，不断创新拐卖手段，形成与执法者的“斗法”局面，打拐行动势必会陷入低效的泥淖。
tgt: If the “market” of buying abducted children still exists, and abductors continuously create new ways to abduct children driven by the profits; this will lead to a situation where the criminals and law enforcers plot against each other, and the action to crack down on adduction will inevitably be low in efficiency.
hypo: If there is a widespread "market" for selling children, the sellers are motivated by greed and constantly innovate in ways to sell children, creating an "arms race" with law enforcement agencies. As a result, the drive to stop selling children will inevitably fall into an inefficient trap.

src: 因此，破除落后观念，普及法律常识，也有助于根治拐卖、收买儿童犯罪。
tgt: Therefore, correcting outdated concepts and popularizing legal common sense are also conducive to eradicating the crime of abducting, trafficking and buying children.
hypo: Therefore, breaking down outdated beliefs and promoting legal knowledge also helps to eliminate the crime of buying children and buying children.

src: 杨浩东在马栏山宣讲党的十九届六中全会和省党代会精神
tgt: Yang Haodong publicized the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the CPC and the provincial congress of Party representatives.
hypo: Yang, Mǎnd爲山。

src: 从党的百年奋斗史中汲取奋进力量
tgt: Draw energy from the history of the 100 years of struggle of the Party
hypo: Draw from the century-long struggle of the party's strength.

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 龚柏威）根据省委统一安排，12月10日上午，省委常委、省委宣传部部长杨浩东在马栏山视频文创园作互动宣讲，深入学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神，学习贯彻习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神，学习贯彻省第十二次党代会精神。
tgt: Report of Hunan Daily on December 10 (full-media journalist: Gong Bowei), according to unified arrangement of the provincial Party committee, on the morning of December 10, Yang Haodong, a member of the Standing Committee of CPC Provincial Committee and the Ministry of Publicity Department of the provincial Party committee, gave a lecture in the Malan Mountain video cultural and creative park, to study the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee, the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan.
hypo: Please find below the English translation of the provided sentence:  "On December 10, (the Press Secretary of the State Council, Gong柏威，) according to the unified安排 of the State Committee of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Yang浩 Dong, a member of the State Committee of the Communist Party of Hunan, conducted an interactive lecture at the Hunan Video Cultural and Creative园 on the morning of December 10. The lecture focused on the full implementation of the 19th Central Committee Session of the Communist Party of China, the implementation of the instructions and guidance of the总书记对 Hunan 重要讲话指示精神， and the implementation of the spirit of the 12th People's Congress of Hunan."

src: 杨浩东从理想信念与初心使命、自我革命与青春大党、党的领袖和党的理论等三个方面，结合自身感悟、亲身经历，深入浅出、全面系统地阐释了全会精神的核心要义和实践要求。
tgt: In combination of his feelings and experiences, Yang Haodong interpreted the core essence and the requirement on practice of the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee in terms of three aspects, i.e., original aspiration and mission, self-revolution, as well as the young Party, leaders of Party and theory of the Party.
hypo: Yang浩 Dong, from the perspectives of faith and original mission, self-revolution and youth party, leadership and party theory, etc., explains the core meanings and practical requirements of the central government's policies and regulations through in-depth and comprehensive explanations, based on personal insights and own experiences.

src: 他指出，要将全会精神和习近平总书记对湖南重要讲话重要指示批示精神、省党代会精神结合起来学，融会贯通学，增强捍卫“两个确立 ” 、 做到“两个维护”的思想自觉、政治自觉、行动自觉，坚定不移沿着习近平总书记指引的方向前进。
tgt: As pointed by Yang Haodong, it is necessary to combine the spirit of the sixth plenary session of the 19th central committee and the spirit of the important instructions about Hunan by General Secretary Xi Jinping, and the spirit of the 12th Party congress of Hunan, to digest them and strengthen the guarding of the “two-establishment” and the ideological consciousness, political consciousness and action consciousness of the “two-guarding”, and to unwaveringly move forward in the direction pointed by General Secretary Xi Jinping.
hypo: He pointed out that it is necessary to integrate the full-text policy decisions and the spirit of Xi Jinping's important instructions and指示 on Hunan Province, as well as the spirit of the regional party conference. The aim is to thoroughly understand these concepts and to strengthen the self-awareness, political self-awareness, and action self-awareness. We will always adhere to the path guidance by Xi Jinping and fight for the two确立 and two维护.

src: 在互动交流环节，基层干部代表、企业代表、青年代表就三个历史决议的关系、如何理解“两个确立”的决定性意义、文化企业如何把握导向、新时代青年如何从百年党史中汲取力量等进行了提问，杨浩东以通俗的语言、生动的事例一一解答，他殷殷寄语青年党员，要从党的百年奋斗史中，汲取奋进的力量，紧密团结在党中央周围，坚定不移跟党走,用青春奉献书写责任和担当。
tgt: In the interaction and exchange part, representatives of grass-rooted cadres, representatives of enterprises and representatives of young people asked questions about relationship among the three historical resolutions, correct understanding on decisive significance of the “two-establishment”, the way for cultural enterprises to master the orientation and the way for young people to abstract energy from the Party’s 100-year history; Yang Haodong answered the questions in plain language and with vivid cases, and he hoped the young Party members would abstract energy for progress from the history of the Party of 100 years, be unified around the Party Central Committee and follow the decisions made by the Party unswervingly and write responsibility and undertaking with youth and contributions.
hypo: In the interactive communication session, representatives from the local level of the Party, cultural enterprises, and youth groups asked about the relationship between the three historical decisions, how to understand the decisive significance of the "two确立", how to grasp the direction of cultural enterprises, how to汲取 strength from the Party's 100-year struggle history in the new era, and other issues. Yang浩 Dong provided common language and vivid examples to answer them. He encouraged youth members of the Party to draw strength from the Party's 100-year struggle history，紧密团结在党中央周围， and firmly follow the Party. He wrote on his voice that youth members of the Party should draw strength from the Party's 100-year struggle history and紧密团结在党中央周围， and firmly follow the Party, using their youth to书写责任 and担当.

src: 2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人-新华网
tgt: The number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022 - Xinhua News
hypo: 2022 The estimated number of undergraduate students graduated in Beijing in 2022 is 268,000 - news.xinhuanet.com  (Note: The specific numbers may vary depending on the source and context of the statement.)

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者阳娜）记者从近日北京市教委、北京市人力资源和社会保障局联合召开的2022届北京高校毕业生就业创业工作视频会议上获悉，2022年北京地区高校毕业生预计达26.8万人，比去年增加1.6万人。
tgt: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporter Yang Na) Reporter learned from the 2022 Beijing University and College Graduates’ Employment and Entrepreneurship Video Conference jointly held by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security that the number of university and college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, increased by 16,000 compared with last year.
hypo: Beijing, December 11, 2022 (记者 Yin娜) According to a news release from the Beijing Education Commission and the Beijing Human Resource and Social Development Department, the total number of Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications students graduated in 2022 is expected to be approximately 26,800,000, an increase of 16,000 over the last year.

src: 北京市人力资源和社会保障局相关负责人表示，将从加强供需匹配、强化政策支持、拓宽就业渠道、确保困难帮扶、支持创新创业、提升服务效能等方面部署北京高校毕业生就业工作。
tgt: Responsible person from Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security introduced that the employment of university and college graduates in Beijing will be deployed from the aspects of strengthening the matching of supply and demand, strengthening policy support, broadening employment channels, ensuring to provide assistance for those with difficulties, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.
hypo: The Beijing Municipal Human Rights Protection Bureau director said that the employment work of Beijing university graduates will be deployed from strengthening matching of demand and supply, strengthening policy support, expanding employment channels, ensuring support for difficulties, supporting innovation and creation, and improving service effectiveness.

src: 记者了解到，北京市人力资源和社会保障局将搭建实践平台，加大岗位供给，主动联系40家高校毕业生职场体验基地，走访用人单位，整合需求信息和岗位信息；重点抓好“六个一批 ” ， 即拓宽事业单位招录一批，拓宽国有企业招聘一批，拓宽基层项目招募一批，拓宽应征入伍一批，拓宽就业见习留用一批，拓宽创业带动就业一批；实行“一生一策”动态管理，为每位毕业生推荐不少于5个岗位信息，确保有就业意愿的困难家庭毕业生100%实现帮扶等。
tgt: Reporter learned that Beijing Municipal Bureau of Human Resources and Social Security will establish a platform to increase work position supply, take the initiative to contact 40 job experience bases for college graduates, visit employing unit, and integrate demand information and job information; focus on the "six batches", that is, expand the batch of recruitment of institutions, expand the batch of recruitment of state-owned enterprises, expand the batch of recruitment of grass-roots projects, expand the batch of recruitment of military recruits, expand the batch of employment probation retention, and expand the batch of entrepreneurship to promote employment; implement the dynamic management of "one policy for one student", recommend no less than 5 jobs for each graduate, and ensure that 100% of graduates from poor families with the willingness to work will be assisted.
hypo: Upon learning, the Beijing Municipal Education Commission will build a practical platform to increase job supply, actively communicate with 40 job experience bases for college graduates, visit employers, and integrate job demand and position information; focus on "six batches of one" such as expanding public service institutions to录取 a batch, expanding private-owned enterprises to hire a batch, expanding grassroots projects to recruit a batch, expanding reservists to recruit a batch, and expanding business-oriented employment to retain a batch; implement a " lifelong one plan" dynamic management, recommend at least 5 job information for each graduate, ensure that difficulties with employment for families in need of support are 100% supported, and etc.

src: 民主峰会落幕，拜登称自由之火永不熄灭
tgt: The Summit for Democracy ended, and Biden said the fire of freedom would never extinguish
hypo: The democratic summit has come to an end, but Biden claims that the flame of freedom will never be熄灭.

src: 由美国总统拜登召集、有全球110个国家的政府以及公民社会和私营部门领导人出席的线上“民主峰会 ” ( Summit for Democracy)星期五（12月10日）落幕。
tgt: The online “Summit for Democracy” held by Biden, the U.S. president, and attended by leaders of governments, civil society and private sector from 110 countries came to a close on Friday (December 10).
hypo: The " Summit for Democracy," organized by美国总统乔·拜登 and featuring government leaders from 110 countries globally, ended on Friday ( December 10th).

src: 拜登在闭幕词中说，自由之火在世界每个人的心中燃烧，专制政权永远无法将其熄灭。
tgt: Biden said in the closing speech that a dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.
hypo: Biden said in his closing speech that the flame of freedom is burning in the hearts of every person on Earth, and any独裁政权 can never熄灭 it.

src: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
tgt: He also said that the second global “Summit for Democracy” was scheduled to be held next year.
hypo: He also表示计划明年举行第二届全球“民主峰会”。

src: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
tgt: Tang Feng, representative of Taiwan government and member of the administrative council, and Luo Guancong, Hong Kong democracy and human rights activist who is currently in exile in the UK, made speeches at the summit on the second day.
hypo: The Taiwan government representative, XUN Fhuang, and the Hong Kong democratic human rights activist, Luo Guangcon, also spoke at the second session.

src: 拜登说 ： “ 我们知道摆在我们面前的工作是多么的艰巨。
tgt: Biden said, “We know that we are facing arduous tasks.
hypo: Biden said, "We know the tasks that lie before us are immense."

src: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。
tgt: But we also know that we can meet the challenges, just as I mentioned before and as what this Summit stands for, the world of democracy is everywhere.
hypo: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。  Our understanding is that we can face challenges because as I previously mentioned, as demonstrated by this Summit, the democratic world is ubiquitous.

src: 专制政权永远无法熄灭自由的微火，它在全世界和世界各地人们的心中燃烧 。 ”
tgt: A dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.”
hypo: A dictatorship will never extinguish the small flame of freedom in the hearts of people around the world and everywhere.

src: 拜登还表示，捍卫民主需要整个社会的共同努力。
tgt: Biden also said that joint efforts from the whole society were required to defend democracy.
hypo: Biden also stated that protecting democracy requires a collective effort from整个社会.

src: 他说 ： “ 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 ”
tgt: He said, “as leaders of governments, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms, realize transparent accountability governance, so as to be better equipped to resist the buffer and impact of dictatorship as well as people who bluntly pursue power in front of public benefits.”
hypo: He said, "As leaders of governments, we have a responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the barriers of democracy, promote change, achieve transparent and accountable governance, and better withstand the forces of authoritarianism, as well as those who seek to pursue power openly before公共利益."

src: “民主峰会”第二天的主题分别是捍卫人权，巩固民主与对抗威权，以及反击数字威权主义与肯定民主价值。
tgt: The themes on the second day of the “Summit for Democracy” were strengthening human rights, consolidating democracy and fighting against authoritarians, as well as fighting against digital authoritarianism and affirming the values of democracy.
hypo: The topics for the second day of the democratic峰会 were protecting human rights, consolidating democracy，对抗 power, and responding to digital authoritarianism and highlighting democratic values.

src: 这一天恰逢“国际人权日 ” 。
tgt: That day happened to be “International Human Rights Day”.
hypo: That day is恰好是"International Human Rights Day"。

src: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯在当天的开场讲话中也表示，民主事业在全球面临挑战，特别是新兴数字技术带来的挑战。
tgt: Guterres, the Secretary General of the United Nations, said in the opening speech on that day that the democracy was facing challenges globally, especially those brought by emerging digital technologies.
hypo: In his opening statement on the day, Secretary-General of the United Nations Good evening.   You know, the struggle for democracy is facing challenges around the world, especially those brought by emerging digital technologies.

src: 他说 ： “ 现在是重申共同价值观和立场以及民主韧性的时候了。
tgt: He said, “It’s the time to reiterate the common values, standpoint, as well as the tenacity of democracy.
hypo: He said, "It's time to reiterate our common values and positions, as well as the tenacity of民主 institutions."

src: 这需要深化社会对话，解决不平等问题，打击腐败，更新社会契约，为优质教育投资，并扩大妇女和女童的机会。
tgt: Social dialogue needs to be deepened to solve the problem of inequality, fight against corruption, update social contracts, invest in high-quality education, and provide more opportunities for women and girls.
hypo: This requires furthering social dialogue, addressing issues of inequality, combatting corruption, revising social contracts, investing in high-quality education, and extending opportunities to women and girls.

src: 这也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具 。 ”
tgt: This also requires us to condemn populism, nativism and extremism of all forms, including making use of all the tools provided by technical revolutions.”
hypo: This也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具。

src: 香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪通过预先录制的视频对峰会发表讲话，提醒与会者持续关注香港和维吾尔族和藏族等中国少数民族的人权状况。
tgt: Luo Guancong, democracy and human rights activist from Hong Kong, gave a speech at the summit through a pre-recorded video, to remind conferees to continuously pay attention to the human rights situation of Hong Kong and ethnic minorities in China including Uygur ethnic group and the Tibetans.
hypo: Run Guang聪， a Hong Kong democratic human rights activist, delivered a speech to the峰会 through a pre-recorded video, reminding attendees to continue to monitor the human rights situation of Hong Kong and ethnic minorities such as ethnic维吾尔s and ethnic Koreans in China.

src: 他说 ： “ 长期以来，世界一直接受中国的崛起，却没有建立一个机制来对其进行问责。
tgt: He said, “For a long time, the world has always accepted the rising of China; however, no mechanism has been established for accountability.
