hypo: He said: "For a long time, the world has accepted the rise of China, but there is no mechanism to hold it accountable."

src: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。
tgt: This is the reason why there must be cooperation between politicians and civil society leaders.
hypo: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。  This is why political figures and leaders of civil society must cooperate.

src: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的一切（资源）来确保民主的复兴是我们的首要任务 。 ”
tgt: We have to ensure that we will use all (the resources) we have to make the renaissance of democracy our primary task.”
hypo: "We must use all the resources that we have to ensure that the复兴 of democracy is our top priority."

src: 罗冠聪也呼吁自由世界团结起来对抗中共的威胁。
tgt: Luo Guancong also called on the free world to unite together and fight against the threats from the Communist Party of China.
hypo: Lu Guoqing also called for the unity of the free world to resist the threats posed by the Chinese Communist Party.

src: 他说 ： “ 也许你们中的一些人害怕惹恼习近平总书记，也许你们中的一些人不想失去中国市场，也许你们中的一些人没有认识到（中共）对我们民主价值观的威胁。
tgt: He said, “Some of you may be afraid of offend General Secretary Xi Jinping, some of you may not want to lose the Chinese market, and some of you may not realize the threat (of the Communist Party of China) to our democratic values.
hypo: He said, "Maybe some of you fear getting upset with Comrade Xi Jinping, maybe some of you don't want to lose the Chinese market, and maybe some of you are not aware of the threat that the Chinese Communist Party poses to our democratic values. "

src: 而这就是我们失败的原因。
tgt: And this is the reason why we failed.
hypo: And this is why we failed.

src: 这也是我们必须改变的原因 。 ”
tgt: This is also the reason why we must make changes.”
hypo: This is also the reason why we must make changes.

src: 台湾行政院政务委员唐凤在出席“打击数字独裁主义，肯定民主价值”的圆桌讨论中，通过视频发布《国家声明 》 ， 强调台湾站在对抗专制和威权的最前线。
tgt: When attending the round table discussion on “Striking digital authoritarianism and affirming the value of democracy”, Tang Feng, member of the administrative council of Taiwan, issued Country Declaration with a video to emphasize that Taiwan is on the forefront of fighting against dictatorship and authoritarianism.
hypo: The State Declaration issued by Tang Xuan, a member of the Council of Economic Affairs, during a round table discussion on " against digital独裁主义 and的肯定民主价值" via video, emphasizes that Taiwan is at the forefront of fighting专制 and authoritarianism.

src: 他也分享了如何通过信息透明与构建互信来抗击新冠疫情的经验。
tgt: He also shared experience on how to fight against COVID-19 epidemic with transparent information and the construction of mutual trust.
hypo: He also shared his experience in fighting against the COVID-19 pandemic through information transparency and building trust.

src: 他说 ： “ 在台湾的民主方兴未艾之际，我们始终坚定站在全球对抗威权主义的最前线，更在促进全球自由、民主和人权上，扮演领导角色。
tgt: He said, “As democracy in Taiwan is still making progress, we shall always stand on the forefront of fighting against the authoritarianism of the whole world, and shall play the leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy and human rights.
hypo: He said: "As we continue to advance in the momentum of democracy in Taiwan, we have always stood firm at the forefront of fighting against authoritarianism globally. We are also playing a leadership role in promoting global freedom, democracy, and human rights."

src: 于疫情期间，各地的威权政府以公共卫生和集体利益为名，合理化侵犯人权的行为，全球民主呈现倒退的迹象。
tgt: During the epidemic, authoritarian governments from all over the world rationalize human rights violations in the name of public health and collective interests, leading to retrogress in global democracy.
hypo: During the epidemic, authoritarian governments around the world justify侵犯人权的行为 under the banner of public health and collective interests, displaying signs of regression in global democracy.

src: 然而在台湾，我们不必封城就能控制疫情，不必下架就能战胜假信息 。 ”
tgt: However, in Taiwan, we can control the epidemic without putting cities on lockdown, and we can defeat false information without removing it.”
hypo: However, in Taiwan, we don't need to closed the city to control the epidemic, and we don't need to remove the platform to defeat fake information.

src: 就在“民主峰会”第二天日程进行的同时，美国财政部宣布对被认定严重侵犯人权的中国、朝鲜等几个国家的15名个人、10个实体依法实施制裁，同时对一家被认定利用监视技术协助侵犯人权的中国公司实施投资限制。
tgt: On the second day of the “Summit for Democracy”, Treasury Department of United States announced it would implement legal sanctions on 15 individuals and 10 entities in several countries including China and North Korea which were identified as having severely infringed on human rights; at the same time, it would implement investment restriction on a Chinese company which was identified as assisting in infringing on human rights by utilizing surveillance techniques.
hypo: On the same day as the second day of the democratic峰会， the US Treasury announced the following sanctions against several countries, including China and North Korea, as well as the treatment of 15 individuals and 10 entities deemed to have committed serious human rights abuses:  1. Sanctioning the individuals and entities associated with the Chinese company, People's Bank of China (PBOC), which was identified as having used surveillance technology to assist in human rights violations. 2. Implementing investment restrictions for the Chinese company, China Eastern Airlines, which was found to have engaged in human rights abuses through its management of flights to North Korea.

src: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
tgt: Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural elementary school teachers of music, PE and fine art in three years - Xinhuanet
hypo: Jiangxi will train 100,000 teachers in rural primary schools in three years, according to an article in Liaoning Daily.   Note: The translation may vary depending on the context and specific requirements of the original text.

src: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanchang on May 22 (journalist: Chen Yushan): According to Ministry of Education of Jiangxi, in order to strengthen the supportability for teachers of subjects that are in short supply and realize balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, Jiangxi province planned to train 1 music teacher, 1 art teacher and 1 PE teacher who are qualified for each elementary school in rural areas of the whole province (villages, towns and below) in three years since 2016; a total of 10 thousand teachers will be trained.
hypo: The following is the English translation of the sentence:  新华社南昌5月22日电 (记者陈毓珊)近日，The记者获悉 from the Ministry of Education of Jiangxi Province, in order to strengthen the保障能力 of the教师队伍 in key areas and achieve balanced development in rural elementary education, the Jiangxi Province plans to train 1,000 qualified teachers in each rural school ( Below county level) for a total of 10,000 over three years.

src: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
tgt: It is understood that the training objects this time are teachers of other subjects under 45 years old with basic knowledge or talent of music, art and PE in rural primary schools in Jiangxi and can work as music, art or PE teachers at the same time.
hypo: I am aware that this training is targeted at teachers from rural schools in Jiangxi who are under the age of 45 and have a background or ability in music, art, and sports, and are able to serve as teachers for both music, art, and sports courses.

src: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
tgt: Through training, they can master basic knowledge and teaching skills of the subjects of music, PE and art, and update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability and self-development ability; a team of music, PE and art teachers who are good at many subjects and specialize in one will be constructed to relieve the problem of lack of music, PE and art teachers in rural schools.
hypo: Through training, make them master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of teaching music, art, and physical education. Update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve subject teaching ability, activity design ability, cultural community capacity, and self-development ability of教师队伍. Build a team of one-专多能 musicians to mitigate the problem of lack of music, art, and physical education teachers in rural areas.

src: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
tgt: In order to ensure training quality and effect, Jiangxi plans to train 1 music, 1 art and 1 PE trainers for each elementary school in 100 counties (cities and districts) in Jiangxi, with a total of 300 trainers, to comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design and organization ability, training ability, network research workshop construction ability, so as to teach, demonstrate, guide and supervise.
hypo: To ensure the quality and effectiveness of training, Jiangxi plans to train 100 schools in 100 districts (city and districts) of the entire province for music, art, and sports, making a total of 300 trainers. They will comprehensively improve their teaching, construction, and training abilities, design and organize research and development activities, and build online workshops, serving as teachers, models, mentors, and supervisors.

src: 新华全媒+丨北京青少年冰球联赛助燃冬奥热情-新华网
tgt: XInhua All Media+丨Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey League fueled the enthusiasm for the Winter Olympics - Xinhuanet
hypo: "新华全媒+丨北京青少年冰球联赛助燃冬奥热情-新华网"的英语翻译为： "Xue鲜全媒+丨 Beijing teenagers ice hockey league fuels the passion for the Winter Olympics -xinhuanet.com" 。

src: 12月11日，北京梦想ING队球员庞尧天（中）在比赛中射门。
tgt: Pang Yaotian (the one in the middle), a player of Beijing Dream ING team, was shooting in the game on December 11.
hypo: On December 11th, player Pan Yan Tian ( middle) of Beijing Dreaming Team scored a goal in the game.

src: 当日，2021-2022赛季北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛在北京各大冰场继续角逐。
tgt: On the same day, Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Club League of 2021-2022 season continued in various ice ranks in Beijing.
hypo: On that day, the Beijing Teenager Ice hockey Club League continued its competition at major ice venues in Beijing.

src: 本届联赛分为常规赛与季后赛，参赛运动员年龄段为U6至U18，组别设置分为竞技组与选拔组，共吸引全市256支代表队的近3600名球员参加。
tgt: The league was divided into the regular season and the post season, with athletes from U6 to U18; they were divided into competitive group and the selection group; nearly 3,600 athletes from 256 teams of the whole city participated in the league.
hypo: This season's league has two seasons, the regular season and the季后赛， with participants in the age group of U6 to U18. The teams are divided into two groups, the competitive group and the selection group, and approximately 3600 players from 256 teams in the city are participating.

src: 北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛经过十余年的发展，现已成为北京青少年冰球爱好者切磋技术、广交球友的平台，并为北京市青少年冰球队和青年队输送优秀球员。
tgt: After development for more than 10 years, Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Club League has been a platform for Beijing teenage ice hockey lovers to hone skills and make friends; in addition, it has provided Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Team and Youth Team with excellent players.
hypo: After more than a decade of development, the Beijing Teenager冰球俱乐部联赛 has become a platform for Beijing teenage冰球 enthusiasts to practice their skills and make friends with others, and has also输送 excellent players to the Beijing Teenager冰球队 and youth teams.

src: 联赛发挥赛事对北京青少年冰球运动的带动作用，助燃冬奥冰球热情，为后冬奥时期北京冰球运动发展打下基础。
tgt: The league has promoted Ice Hockey among teenagers in Beijing, fueled the enthusiasm for Ice Hockey in Winter Olympics and laid a basis for the development of Ice Hockey in Beijing for the post Winter Olympics period.
hypo: The league plays a role in the promotional effect of Beijing youth ice hockey sport, helps to ignite the passion for the Winter Olympics ice hockey, and打下 foundation for the development of Beijing ice hockey sport in the post- Winter Olympics period.

src: 女孩当箭靶为姐姐募捐 : " 想到是皮肉伤也就还好 " - 新华网
tgt: Girl raises donations for elder sister by acting a target, saying “It’s ok since they are only flesh wounds” - Xinhuanet
hypo: The English translation for the phrase "Girl, flesh, target," which contains these words, is: "It's only natural for a girl to be a target for募捐 by her sister when it comes to flesh and blood injuries."  Note: This translation may not perfectly convey the nuances of the original phrase, but it conveys the general idea.

src: 杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样。
tgt: A girl stood in front of a big plank, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou.
hypo: A girl is standing before a large board with the words " human target, 10 yuan for each arrow" written on it, in Wuulin Square, Hangzhou.

src: 昨日上午，一则“杭州女孩甘当‘箭靶’为姐募捐”的照片刷爆朋友圈。
tgt: Yesterday morning, a picture of “a girl in Hangzhou raises donation for her elder sister by acting as a target” went viral all over WeChat.
hypo: Yesterday morning, a photo of a girl from Hangzhou who willing to be a "target" to raise money for her sister went viral on social media.

src: 照片显示，杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块比人略高的大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样，示意路人付款后可使用弓箭射击。
tgt: A picture shows a girl standing in front of a plank slightly higher than a person, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, indicating that people can shoot with a bow and arrows after making the payment.
hypo: The photo shows a girl standing before a large木板 that is slightly higher than a human being, with the words "human target, ten yuan for each arrow" written on it. The木板挑衅地示意路人在付款后可以使用箭矢进行射击。

src: 该行为引发网友热议。
tgt: The behavior was discussed heatedly by people on the Internet.
hypo: The act has sparked a much discussion among netizens.

src: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。
tgt: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that it was confirmed by the police that the girl did this in order to raise donations for her elder sister; however, this behavior should not be advocated, and the girl left from the local police station yesterday after being warned.
hypo: Last night, the宣传负责人 of the West Lake District police station of Hangzhou City confirmed to the news agency of ABC that the police believed that this girl had募捐 for her sister before taking such extreme actions, but this behavior was not worth promoting. After being warned, the girl had left the local police station yesterday.

src: 女孩街头“箭靶”募捐被告诫
tgt: The girl who raised donations by acting as a target on the street was warned
hypo: The girl was warned about setting up a target-style募捐 stand on the street.

src: 网传图片中，一位长发女孩呈“个”字型站在一块大木板前，木板上用黑色墨水写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”的字样，她身前另一块木板上写有其银行账号与微信、支付宝账号等。
tgt: In the picture appeared on the Internet, a girl with long hair was standing with her arms spread out in front of a big plank which writes human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” in black ink at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, and there was another plank in front of her which has the bank account, WeChat account and Alipay account on it.
hypo: The English translation of the sentence is:  In the网传 image, a long-haired girl is standing in front of a large board with the words "Human Target, 10 yuan for each arrow" written in black ink on it. On the other side of her body, there is a board with her bank account information, WeChat, WeChat Pay, and other social media accounts written in.

src: 该图片上网后引发争议。
tgt: The picture was discussed heatedly after it was posted on the Internet.
hypo: The image caused controversy after being uploaded.

src: 有网友认为，此举系“博眼球的乞讨行为 ” ， 也有不少网友对此表示同情。
tgt: According to some netizens, this behavior is “begging behavior which aims to grab attention”, but many others show sympathy to her.
hypo: This behavior is considered by some users as " flashy乞丐 behavior" and many others express empathy towards it.

src: “我们是23日上午10点左右巡逻到广场旁的时候发现的情况，当时围观群众已经不少了 。 ”
tgt: “We found her at about 10:00 am on the 23rd when we went on the patrol around the square, and there were already lots of onlookers.”
hypo: We found the situation when we巡逻ed by the square around 10:00 a.m. on February 23rd.

src: 事发地附近的天水派出所民警接受当地媒体采访时称，摆摊的女孩子共有两名，均为20岁左右，打扮得青春靓丽。
tgt: According to what the police officer of the Tianshui Police Station near the site told the local media, there were two young and beautiful girls in early 20s who set up a stall.
hypo: The local media reported that there were two girls摆摊 near Qinhuangdao police station, both around 20 years old, dressed in colorful and attractive styles.

src: 其中，做“人肉靶子”的女孩一直在哭，求路人玩一下这个游戏；另一女孩在边上帮着吆喝，说自己这个朋友的姐姐得了白血病，现在急需手术费，请大家帮忙。
tgt: The girl acting as the “human target” kept crying, begging onlookers to play this game; the other girl was calling for attention on the side, saying that the elder sister of her friend suffered from leukemia and is in urgent need of operation fee, and asking onlookers to help her friend.
hypo: Among them, the girl who served as a human target was crying continuously, asking bystanders to play the game; while another girl was standing by, promoting the game and saying that her friend's sister had gotten cancer and needed the surgery fees now, asking for help.   (Note: "human target" and " Onlookers" are included in the translation)

src: “我们与贵州当地警方取得联系，了解到该女孩是在为姐姐白血病治疗募捐 。 ”
tgt: “We have gained contact with the police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was raising donations for her elder sister who suffered from leukemia.”
hypo: "We have contacted the local police in Qinghai and learned that this girl is collecting money for her sister's cancer treatment."

src: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为吉佳丽，为姐姐吉佳艳募捐。
tgt: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that this girl is named Ji Jiali, and she was raising donations for Ji Jiayan, her elder sister.
hypo: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为Ji Jiali，为姐姐Ji Jiayan募捐。

src: 但由于治疗仍需要30余万费用，一时想不到好的办法募捐，才做出了这种行为。
tgt: Since more than 300 thousand yuan was still required for treatment, Ji Jiali did this because she had no better way.
hypo: Since more funds are needed for treatment，一时想不到好的办法来募捐，才做出了这种行为。

src: 他说，全过程中，两个女孩一个当靶子，一个负责打下手，但并未参与其中，全过程中未发现有人射箭，只是有人围观并拍了照片发到了微博上。
tgt: He told the journalist that one of the two girls acted as human target, and the other girl acted as an assistant and was not involved; nobody was found to have shot arrows during the whole process, and some onlookers only took pictures and posted them on Weibo.
hypo: He said that during the entire process, two girls were found to be target practice; one girl worked as a assisting assistant, but they did not participate in the process of shooting. There was no shooting during the entire process, only围观 and taking pictures were found.

src: 后警方经治安部门鉴定，使用的弓箭不属管制范畴。
tgt: Later, the police sent it to the public security department and identified that the bows and arrows used were not under control.
hypo: Later, after the police conducted an inspection by the security department, the arrows used were determined not to fall within their control范围.

src: 该负责人表示 ， “ 不提倡采取这种博眼球募捐方式 ” 。
tgt: According to the person in charge, “raising donations by grabbing attention is not advocated”.
hypo: The leader of the group thinks that "we do not encourage采取这种吸引人的募捐方式".

src: 经派出所民警告诫后，她已经离开派出所。
tgt: She left from the police station after being warned by the police.
hypo: After being reminded by a police officer at the police station, she has left the station.

src: 捷信“双十二”前夕向消费者倡导理性消费 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
tgt: Home Credit advocated rational consumption to consumers before the “Double Twelve” sale - Economic Observer - a professional financial news website
hypo: Title: Protesting 非理性消费 with JXN before Black Friday - Economic Observer - Professional财经新闻网站

src: 今年“双十一”狂欢节全国网络支付业务交易金额达到1.77万亿元，相较往年再创新高。
tgt: During the “Double Eleven” festival this year, the amount of national online payment business transaction reached 1.77 trillion yuan, creating a new high when compared with that of previous years.
hypo: The total transaction amount for the National Cyber-支付 Festival, including online payment services, reached 177.7 trillion yuan this year, a new high compared to previous years.

src: 花样繁多的满减红包，抓人眼球的直播带货再一次让消费者大呼获益，这股消费热潮一方面让人感叹国民消费力愈发强劲，另一方面也不得不冷静下来思考消费主义对社会以及当代主流消费群体的影响。
tgt: Various kinds of coupons and the eye-catching live-streaming sales once again make consumers feel they’ve gained benefits; this spending spree makes people feel amazed at the increasingly strong spending power of citizens; on the other hand, people need to calm down and think about the influences of consumerism on society and modern mainstream consumer groups.
hypo: The variety of discount codes, the captivating online shopping直播， once again have made consumers benefit greatly. This consumption surge not only leaves people amazed at the increasing strength of national consumption but also brings about the need to think calmly about the impact of consumerism on society and the mainstream consumer groups of today.

src: 在“双十二”到来前夕，捷信消费金融有限公司（以下简称“捷信 ” ） 发出理性消费倡导，提醒广大用户尤其是年轻人树立良好的消费意识与消费习惯，拒绝盲目消费与过度消费。
tgt: Before the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit B.V. (hereinafter referred to as “Home Credit”) advocated rational consumption, reminding its users, especially young users, to develop good consumption awareness and habits, and reject blind and excessive consumption.
hypo: Before the upcoming "Black Friday," Jie smart home consumer limited company (以下简称"Jie信") promotes rational consumption, reminding users, especially young people, to establish good consumption awareness and consumption habits, and reject blind consumption and over consumption.

src: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。
tgt: According to the Report of Survey Analysis on Financial Literacy of Consumers published by People’s Bank of China this year, the financial literacy index of national consumers is 66.81, increased by 2.04 compared with that of 2019.
hypo: According to the "Financial literacy survey and analysis report of the People's Bank of China" released this year, the national consumer financial literacy index is 66.81, an increase of 2.04 from 2019.

src: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。
tgt: Generally speaking, citizens in our country have good performance on financial consumption; however, there are big differences in various aspects of financial behaviors and skills, and further improvement of popularization of basic financial knowledge shall be made.
hypo: Overall, the performance of Chinese residents on the level of financial consumption is good, but significant differences are observed in different aspects of financial behavior and skills. Further improvement in basic financial knowledge is necessary.

src: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。
tgt: Level of financial literacy of senior citizens and young people is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects of financial education; according to the Report on Debt Status of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation has huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important means of consumption upgrading; 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half of them have no debt buildup; although there is a relatively rational consumption trend among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label of “excessive squander” put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption and consumption by following the trend, leading to excessive financial pressure and debt risks, and even resulting in increasing social problems; financial enterprises shall shoulder their social responsibilities and guide young consumers in a positive way.
hypo: The financial literacy level of elderly and young people is relatively low, and "one old and one young" will still be the focus of continuous financial education. The "Chinese Young People's Debt situation Report" issued by尔森 and the "2019-2020 Chinese Young People'sConsumption Report" issued by China Central Media Business News show that the younger generation has enormous consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important途径 for consumption upgrading. 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and almost half of them have no debt accumulation. Although the overall consumption trend of the younger generation appears rational, it is different from the label of "overwhelming浪费" that the outside world puts forward. However, some young people do have excessive consumption and follow-up behavior, which generate excessive financial pressure and debt risk, even leading to increasing social problems. Companies should be brave enough to bear social responsibility and provide positive guidance.

src: 作为持牌消费金融机构，捷信一直致力于以优质、贴心的服务助力百姓构建自己的幸福生活，倡导消费者树立良好正确的消费观，并积极响应监管号召，以实际行动提升消费者尤其是年轻群体的理性消费意识。
tgt: As a licensed consumer finance institution, Home Credit has always been engaged in helping citizens construct their own happy lives with high-quality and thoughtful services, advocating consumers to establish correct consumption view, and actively responding to the call of the supervision units so as to improve the rational consumption awareness of consumers, especially young consumers, with practical actions.
hypo: As a licensed consumer financial institution, JTI has been committed to facilitating the building of good life styles by providing high-quality and thoughtful services. We encourage consumers to adopt healthy and responsible consumption habits and actively respond to regulatory requests. In practical ways, we aim to enhance consumer's rational consumption awareness, especially among young people, by improving the actual service delivery, and ensuring compliance with the regulations.

src: 在过去多年间，捷信不断针对包含大学生在内的青年群体开展全方位、多样化的金融知识普及活动，并通过与国内顶级院校合作发动创新实践大赛等多种形式潜移默化对年轻群体的消费需求进行合理引导,帮助其树立理性消费观念,合理规划消费需求,进而为其累积人生财富助力。
tgt: In the past years, Home Credit has been holding comprehensive and diversified financial knowledge popularization activities aiming at young people, including university students; in addition, it has unconsciously offered reasonable guidance on the consumption demands of young groups by means such as cooperating with top universities in the country to host innovative practice competitions, so as to help students establish rational consumption concept and plan for consumption demands reasonably, and to assist them in accumulating life fortunes.
hypo: In the past few years, JI Group has continuously engaged in comprehensive and diverse financial knowledge promotions for the youth group, including college students, through various forms such as innovative practical competitions collaborating with top-tier universities in China to gradually influence the young group's consumption needs in a reasonable manner. This helps them to establish rational consumption thoughts, and to plan their consumption needs appropriately, ultimately contributing to their accumulation of personal wealth.

src: 双十二到来之际，捷信提醒所有消费者朋友树立合理的消费意识和正确的金钱观，抵制盲目消费和过度消费，规避消费借贷误区，以免影响个人征信以及今后的经济生活。
tgt: Upon the arriving of the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit reminds all consumers to establish rational consumption awareness and correct concept of money, resist blind and excessive consumption, and avoid forming misunderstanding of loan for consumption, in case it will impact personal credit investigation and economic life in the future.
hypo: When the Black Friday approaches, Jigsaw reminds all consumer friends to establish a reasonable consumption awareness and a correct money perspective, resist impulsive consumption and over-consuming, avoid consumer lending mistakes, and not affect their personal credit score or future economic life, as these may impact their personal and professional development.

src: 消费时一定要提前规划，量力而为按时还款。
tgt: Be sure to plan in advance when making consumption, live beneath your means, and make repayment as schedule.
hypo: Make sure to plan ahead and be reasonable in making payments on time.

src: 如果逾期，逾期记录将记录到个人信用报告中，可能会对日后买车、购房等经济生活造成不良影响。
tgt: If it’s overdue, related overdue behavior will be recorded in personal credit report, which may lead to adverse influences on economic life such as buying a car or a house in the future.
hypo: If you miss a payment, your late payment record will be recorded on your personal credit report, which may have negative impacts on your future economic life, such as buying a car or housing.

src: 与此同时，在享受金融产品和服务时，还应选择正规机构及渠道，并注意查验相关机构是否具备经营资质。
tgt: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, be sure to choose authorized institutions and channels and check if related institutions have the qualification for operation.
hypo: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, it is also necessary to choose正规机构 and channels, and pay attention to verifying whether the related institutions have operating licenses.

src: 未来，捷信将一如既往凭借其成熟、可靠的消费金融体系和不断更新迭代的金融产品，为消费者带来更贴合需求和多元化的服务，不断助力大众提升金融知识水平，帮助消费者培养理性消费、适度借贷的理念，做消费者终生可信赖的消费金融伙伴。
tgt: In the future, Home Credit will continue to provide consumers with diversified services fitting their demands with mature and reliable consumption finance systems and constantly upgraded financial products, so as to improve the public’s financial knowledge level and help consumers develop the concepts of rational consumption and taking out loans in moderation, and be a consumption finance partner which consumers can trust for a lifetime.
hypo: In the future, JIGSON will always continue to provide consumers with more tailored and diverse services based on its mature and reliable home loan and financial products, which are constantly updated and refined. We will continuously assist the general public in enhancing their financial literacy, help consumers develop the idea of rational consumption and smart borrowing, and become a reliable partner for consumers for life.

src: 越南人民报网 - 海湾合作委员会应对共同挑战
tgt: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website - Gulf Cooperation Council tackle common challenges
hypo: The越南 People's日报网 -海湾合作委员会应对共同挑战  Please ensure that the following words are included in the translation: tackle, common, challenges.

src: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
tgt: The locations where Mohammed Bin Salman, the Saudi Arabia’s prince stayed include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait.
hypo: The停留 points of沙特 Crown Prince穆罕默德 bin Abdulaziz Al Saud include Oman, Bahrain, Qatar, Bahrain, and Kuwait.

src: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
tgt: It’s worth noting that it was the first time for Mohammed to visit Qatar since Saudi Arabia and the Arabian alliances imposed an embargo on Qatar in the middle of the year 2017 and led to the Gulf Diplomatic Crisis.
hypo: It is worth noting that this is the first visit by the crown prince of穆罕默德穆罕默德 bin Abdulaziz to Qatar since Saudi Arabia and its阿拉伯 allies imposed a food trade ban on the country in December 2017, leading to a Gulf diplomatic crisis.

src: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
tgt: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain and Egypt severed the diplomatic relations with Qatar and implemented a full embargo; they blamed Qatar for supporting terrorist organizations and keeping close relations with Iran.
hypo: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Bahrain, and Iran have断绝了 diplomatic relations with Qatar and implemented total sanctions against it，指责 Qatari support for terrorist organizations while having close ties with伊朗.

src: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
tgt: Diplomatic tensions had a serious impact on the internal unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council, exerting a negative influence on economy of the countries and regions in that region.
hypo: The economic impact of外交 tensions on the internal团结 of the Hegemonial Alliance has been greatly influenced.

src: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
tgt: The four Arabian countries blocked the land, sea and air routes to Qatar.
hypo: The four Arabian countries have blocked the land, sea, and air routes leading to Qatar.

src: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
tgt: The crisis was only solved at the Gulf Cooperation Council Summit in January, 2021, when the gulf countries signed an agreement for “unity and stabilization” with the mediation by the U.S. and Kuwait.
hypo: This crisis was only resolved at theArab Spring Conference in January 2021, where the Gulf countries signed an agreement aimed at "Unity and stability"调解 by the United States and科威特.

src: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
tgt: Saudi Arabia has reopened its boundary with Qatar.
hypo: Saudi Arabia has reopened the border with Qatar.

src: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
tgt: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are taking the lead in recovering the relations with Qatar by appointing new ambassadors in Qatar.
hypo: 沙特阿拉伯 and Egypt are leading the effort to restore relations with Qatar through the appointment of new ambassadors by both countries.

src: 海湾阿拉伯国家化解分歧，以恢复与卡塔尔的关系出自于为各国的利益和地区稳定而必须团结起来的要求，旨在应对共同挑战。
tgt: Arab countries in the gulf aimed to resolve divergence; and restoring relations with Qatar originates from the need to unite for the interests of all countries and regional stability, so as to cope with common challenges.
hypo: The海湾阿拉伯国家 aim to resolve the differences and restore their relationship with Qatar due to the requirement of unity for national interests and regional stability, and with a view to addressing common challenges.

src: 此次沙特王储访问阿曼期间，双方同意开通了两个海湾邻国间第一条直接陆路通道。
tgt: During the period when the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia visited Oman, both parties agreed to open the first direct land road passage between the two neighboring countries in the gulf.
hypo: During the visit of the King of Saudi Arabia, agreed, Oman, the first direct land route通道 was opened between two neighboring海湾 countries.

src: 连接两国长达725公里长的通道将为两国公民的出行和整合供应链提供便利条件。
tgt: A passage of 725km connecting the two countries will provide convenience for the travel of citizens and integration of the supply chain of the two countries.
hypo: The的通道 that connects the two countries is长达725 kilometers long and will provide facilitates conditions for the travel and integration of supply chain for the citizens of both countries.

src: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 (PIF)将在阿曼投入50亿美元，两国企业签署了价值为300亿美元的13份合作谅解备忘录。
tgt: The Public Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia (PIF) will invest 5 billion USD in Oman, and enterprises of the two countries have signed 13 memorandums of understanding of cooperation worth 30 billion USD.
hypo: The Public Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia (PIF) will invest $5 billion in Oman and 13 cooperation and understanding notes worth $30 billion have been signed by between the two countries' enterprises.

src: 沙特王储对海湾国家访问之行恰逢伊朗与世界各大国就挽救名为《联合全面行动计划 》 （ JCPOA）的伊朗核协议 — — 一项海湾阿拉伯国家因认为无法解决与伊朗导弹问题而谴责的协议进行谈判。
tgt: The travel of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia to gulf countries happened as the negotiation was ongoing between Iran and major countries about saving a nuclear deal named Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), an agreement condemned by the Arab Gulf countries as it’s believed it cannot solve the missile issue with Iran.
hypo: The visit of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia to the Gulf countries was timing完美 as Iran and the major countries of the world were engaged in negotiations to挽救 the Iran nuclear deal, known as the " Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action" (JCPOA), which the Gulf阿拉伯 countries had谴责ed as unable to solve their导弹 issue with Iran.

src: 各海湾国家一直将伊朗视为长期的“竞争对手 ” ， 并将伊朗的核计划视为对地区安全的“威胁 ” 。
tgt: All gulf countries have always regarded Iran as the long-term “competitor” and regarded the nuclear program of Iran as a “threat” to regional security.
hypo: The Gulf countries have always considered Iran as a long-term "Competitors" and have considered the Iran's nuclear program as a "威胁" to the regional security.

src: 各海湾国家认为，不解决伊朗导弹问题，不采取行动来遏制伊朗在该地区的活动是有缺陷的。
tgt: According to the gulf countries, it is defective not to solve the problem of the guided missiles of Iran or not to take actions to curb the activities of Iran in this region.
hypo: The海湾 countries believe that not addressing the issue of Iran's missile activities and taking action to prevent its activities in the region is flawed.

src: 在各大国与伊朗核谈判未能满足各海湾国家愿望的背景下，沙特阿拉伯与伊朗进行了直接谈判。
tgt: Under the backdrop where the nuclear negotiation between major countries and Iran was not able to meet the demand of the gulf countries, Saudi Arabia and Iran conducted a direct negotiation.
hypo: Under the backdrop of the failure of the major countries and Iran's nuclear negotiations to meet the desires of the海湾 countries，沙特阿拉伯 conducted direct negotiations with Iran.

src: 其目标是遏制该地区紧张局势的升级。
tgt: The objective was to restrain the upgrading of the tense situations in this region.
hypo: The objective is to contain the escalation of the tension in the region.

src: 这是减缓海湾合作委员会国家经济增长的因素之一。
tgt: This is one of the factors that slow down the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
hypo: This is one of the factors that can减缓 the economic growth of the Council of海湾 countries.

src: 即将举行的海合会峰会将是自从一些成员国与卡塔尔的争议结束以来海合会国家的首次峰会。
tgt: The summit of the Gulf Cooperation Council to be held soon will be the first summit for countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council since the end of the dispute between some member countries and Qatar.
hypo: The upcoming Hezb'ulminUN summit will be the first summit for the countries of the UN Security Council since the dispute between some member countries and Qatar was resolved.

src: 这是海湾合作委员会重新评估为促进恢复海合会统一作出贡献的外交成果的机会，同时提出各项措施，使其成员国充分合作，以应对共同挑战，为海湾国家的稳定与发展作出贡献。
tgt: This is the opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to reassess the diplomatic achievements that have contributed to the restoration of the unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council; at the same time, various measures are being proposed to make the member countries cooperate sufficiently, so as to cope with common challenges and make contributions to stabilization and development of the gulf countries.
hypo: This is the opportunity for the海湾 cooperation commission to reassess the diplomatic results that have contributed to the restoration of the Hashemitemite Kingdom's unity, while proposing measures that enable member states to fully cooperate to address common challenges and make contributions to the stability and development of the海湾 countries.

src: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
tgt: Let university spirit resonate with spirit of the times - Xinhuanet
hypo: university, spirit, and，时代精神.

src: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
tgt: University spirit refers to a series of educational philosophy and pursuit of values an university accumulates in its long-term development; it is the soul of the university.
hypo: The so-called university spirit refers to a series of governance ideas and pursuits that have been accumulated over a long period of development for a university, and are the essence of the university.

src: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
tgt: Since ancient times, university spirit is indispensable in the development of politics, economy, culture, technology and society, as well as in the progress of a nation.
hypo: "From ancient to modern times, the university spirit has been crucial for the development of politics, economics, culture, technology, society, and even the progress of a nation."

src: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
tgt: Since the establishment of the first real university in the world, universities shoulder unique missions which are different from other social organizations; universities in our country emerged in times of national crisis; its spirit is heavily influenced by traditional culture and the change of times; it advocates the values of “benefiting the world with virtue, and governing the country with integrity” and the patriotic responsibility of “building a strong country by studying”.
hypo: Since the origin of the first modern-意义上的 university in the world, universities have carried out a unique mission that is different from that of other social organizations. For our university, which emerged in the midst of national crisis, its spirit has been deeply influenced by traditional culture and the changing of times. We promote the values of "ingratesi ysedo" and "cultivation and governance" and take an爱国主义担当 in the spirit of national pride.

src: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
tgt: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.
hypo: At present, the trend of digitalization and internationalization of higher education is becoming increasingly prominent. The global competition in education, technology, and talent is constantly increasing. As an important "供给侧" of education, the structural reform of higher education is facing前所未有的机遇 and challenges.

src: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
tgt: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.
hypo: In particular, the proposal for the "Overall Program for Promoting the 世界一流大学 and 一流学科建设" demonstrates our confidence and determination to move from a large country in higher education to a strong country in higher education. Furthermore, it puts forward higher and更新 requirements for the development of universities.

src: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
tgt: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?
hypo: How can we work hard to enter the world's first class in a relatively short period of time, while still having a certain gap, to accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a set of world-class disciplines to achieve "overtaking the curve"?

src: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
tgt: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.
hypo: In addition to confidence in the goal, path, and ability, universities should fully utilize three advantages: first, post-conventional advantage, continuously importing outstanding academic talents from overseas and learning from the advanced experiences of top-tier universities in the world, achieving a significant improvement in academic level and teaching quality; second, cultural advantage, inheriting the wisdom connotation of Chinese culture that has accumulated for 5000 years and promoting the development of traditional and valuable good culture, thus凝聚力量，塑造品牌， and improving image; third, system advantage, utilizing the advantages of socialist countries' systems，强化目标驱动， collecting consensus合力， optimizing resource allocation, and providing a sustainable robust guarantee for universities to accelerate catch up to world-class levels.

src: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
tgt: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.
hypo: It is important to recognize that building top-notch universities is not possible for every institution to be the same. While schools must充分的发挥其优势， they must also specialize and stand out.

src: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
tgt: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.
hypo: 中国特色的学习目标、办学传统和资源禀赋要体现独特性，既具有共性。  The unique objective, educational traditions, and resource resources of Chinese characteristics should manifest uniqueness, while also having a commonality.

src: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
tgt: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.
hypo: For Zhejiang University, we emphasize highlighting three distinct features in our education program: first, we emphasize the突出特点 of entrepreneurship and innovation人才培养， building an integrated entrepreneurship education environment that combines education and industry, creating a complete ecosystem of innovation education; second, we emphasize the聚集特色 ofterdisciplinary research and education, promoting the optimization and adjustment ofterdisciplinary systems, creating a regulatory environment forterdisciplinary research and education, actively nurturing emergingterdisciplinary fields and标志性 achievements; third, we emphasize the突出特点 of the education system and social service, conducting in-depth international exchange and cooperation, and accelerating the formation of a comprehensive Zhejiang University-business, education, and research cooperation system.   Note: " education and, entrepreneurship education, combining schools", these three words are included in the translation.

src: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
tgt: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.
hypo: In this process, especially important is to Always adhere to the spirit of the university, which can resonate with the spirit of the times.

src: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
tgt: For Zhejiang University, the university motto of “seeking truth and making innovation”, the common values of “study diligently, cultivate morality, foster discernment, advocate honesty” and the principles of “harboring generosity like the ocean, seeking the truth while upholding morality, being brave enough to keep exploring, and building our country” constitute the newest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.
hypo: For Zhejiang University, the校训 "求是创新", the common values of "勤学、修德、明辨、笃实", and "海纳江河，启真厚德，开物前民，树我邦国" together form the latest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.

src: 这是学校坚持正确办学方向，不断积累文化高度、凝聚精神力量的重要保障，内涵丰富，意义深远。
tgt: The university insists on the correct direction of running an university, continuously accumulates the altitude of culture and the important support by condensing the power of spirit; it has profound connotations and far-reaching significance.
hypo: This is an important保障 for schools to maintain the right direction of operating and gradually accumulate cultural heights and consolidate mental power. The content is rich and has a far-reaching significance.

src: 其中 ， “ 海纳江河”强调的是开放包容精神，体现以“天下英才为我所用”的胸怀，表现为汲取世界名校办学育人的优质理念 ； “ 启真厚德”强调的是求真至善精神，指的是大学在追求真理的同时，更当领受德行的陶冶和人格的砥砺 ； “ 开物前民”体现的是改革创新精神，既包含知识的求新，科研的创新，又表现为改革发展，革故鼎新 ； “ 树我邦国”强调的是爱国奉献精神，讲的是大学应当始终与民族命运同荣共辱。
tgt: In which, “harboring generosity like the ocean” emphasizes the spirit of inclusiveness, reflecting the mindset of “inviting all talents”, which is manifested as absorbing the premium concepts of university operation and talent training of world famous universities; “seeking the truth while upholding morality” lays emphasis on the spirit of the pursuit for truth and kindheartedness, meaning that universities shall accept the cultivation of virtue and the tempering of personality while pursuing for truth; “being brave enough to keep exploring” reflects the spirit of reform and innovation, including innovation in knowledge and science and technology, as well as reform, development and innovation; “building our country”stresses the spirit of patriotism and dedication, meaning that universities shall always share the glory and disgrace with the destiny of the country.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation for the given sentence:   Among them, "Hei纳江河" emphasizes the spirit of openness and inclusiveness, reflecting the ambition to "use the talents of the world" and the quality of seeking knowledge and nurturing students at world-renowned universities. "Zhi纳米德" emphasizes the spirit of seeking truth and morality, suggesting that universities should not only strive for knowledge but also receive moral education and character development. "Zhi物民先" showcases the spirit of innovation and reform, including the exploration of new knowledge, scientific research, and transformation and innovation. "Weling modi 邦国" emphasizes the spirit of loyalty and dedication, suggesting that universities should always be at the forefront of national destiny and辱 and荣.

src: 这一系列精神理念和价值追求，正是浙江大学120年办学的灵魂所在。
tgt: These spiritual ethos and the pursuit of values are the soul of Zhejiang University in its 120 years of university running.
hypo: This series of philosophical beliefs and values pursuits, which are the essence of Zhejiang University's 120 years of academic operation.

src: “聪者听于无声，明者见于未形 ” 。
tgt: “Wise people can hear when there is only silence and see before things are formed.”
hypo: 聪者听于无声，明者见于未形。  "聪者听于无声" means "a person who has a good ear can hear without being noticed," and "明者见于未形" means "a person who has a clear mind can see things before they are visible."

src: 中国高校当进一步立足中国特色社会主义事业全局，深刻把握高等教育事业所处的时代方位和肩负的历史使命，加快建设成为世界一流大学。
tgt: Universities and colleges in China shall further master the direction of the times and the historical mission of higher education based on the overall situation of the socialism with Chinese characteristics, and accelerate the construction of top universities in the world.
hypo: Chinese characteristics，中国特色社会主义，事业，高等教育，建设，成为，世界一流大学。

src: 同时，坚守人文关怀和独立自由，让大学精神与时代精神、民族精神互相激荡，从而为实现国家富强和民族振兴，实现人类的共同理想提供不竭的动力。
tgt: At the same time, hold fast to humanistic care, independence and freedom, to make university spirit, spirit of the times and national spirit promote each other, so as to provide infinite power for realizing state prosperity, national rejuvenation and the common ideal of all human beings.
hypo: At the same time, we must adhere to the spirit of humanism and independence and自由， and stimulate the clash of the national spirit of the present era and the national spirit of the nation, providing continuous动力 to achieve national prosperity and national revitalization, and realizing the common aspirations of humanity.

src: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网
tgt: President of Iran: an agreement may be reached after talks on Iran nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran are lifted - Xinhuanet
hypo: 伊朗总统：若解除对伊制裁 伊核谈判有望达成协议-新华网  伊朗总统：如果取消对伊朗的制裁，那么伊朗核谈判有望达成协议-新华网

src: 新华社德黑兰12月11日电（记者高文成 王守宝）伊朗总统莱希11日在伊朗首都德黑兰说，如果美国解除对伊制裁，伊朗核问题全面协议谈判就可以达成“良好协议 ” 。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Teheran on December 11 (Journalists: Gao Wencheng and Wang Shoubao): Lahey, president of Iran, said in Teheran, the capital of Iran, on December 11 that a “satisfactory agreement” might be reached after the comprehensive talks about Iran’s nuclear issue if the sanctions on Iran were lifted by the US.
hypo: According to a press release by China News Service (CNS) in伊朗's capital德黑兰 on December 11, President Qajar of Iran莱希 said that if the United States解除 its sanctions on Iran, the comprehensive negotiations on the nuclear issue could lead to a "good deal."

src: 据伊朗总统网站发布的消息，莱希当天在与伊朗驻周边国家使节开会时说，通过向伊核协议其他相关方提交提案，伊朗已经证明了自己的谈判诚意。
tgt: According to information published by the website of the president of Iran, Lahey said in a meeting with envoys of Iran in surrounding countries that Iran had proved its sincerity in the talks by submitting proposals to other related parties of the agreement of Iran nuclear issue.
hypo: According to a news release from the website of the President of Iran，莱希 said during the talks with foreign missions of周边 countries that Iran had demonstrated its诚意 in negotiations by submitting proposals to other parties involved in the Iran nuclear deal.

src: 如果美方下定决心 ， “ 达成协议的道路就将畅通 ” 。
tgt: If the US is determined, “it will be easy to reach the agreement”.
hypo: If the US takes下定决心， the path to达成协议 will be easy.

src: 伊核协议相关方今年4月开始在奥地利首都维也纳举行会谈，讨论美伊两国恢复履约问题。
tgt: Related parties of the Iran nuclear agreement started hosting talks in Vienna, the capital of Austria, since this April, to discuss the problem of restoring honoring the agreement by the US and Iran.
hypo: The relevant parties to the Iran nuclear agreement began discussions in Vienna from April this year on the issue of the restoration of compliance by the US and Iran.

src: 新一轮会谈11月29日在维也纳开始举行，12月3日暂时休会，9日继续举行。
tgt: A new round of talks started in Vienna on November 29, which was adjourned on December 3, and will resume on December 9.
hypo: The next round of talks began in Vienna on November 29 and were temporarily suspended on December 3, and continued on December 9.

src: 习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信-新华网
tgt: Xi Jinping sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum - Xinhua News
hypo: "习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信"的英文翻译为：  "Xi Jinping致贺信 to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum."

src: 新华社北京12月11日电 12月11日，国家主席习近平向2021年大湾区科学论坛致贺信。
tgt: Xinhua News Beijing December 11th, on December 11th, Chinese president, Xi Jinping, sends congratulatory letter to the 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum.
hypo: Sorry, I couldn't find the exact text you're looking for. Can you please provide me with more context or a specific sentence that you want me to translate?

src: 习近平指出，当今世界正经历百年未有之大变局，全球科技创新进入密集活跃期，新一轮科技革命和产业变革对全球经济结构产生了深刻影响。
tgt: Xi Jinping pointed out that the world today is undergoing major changes rarely seen in a century; global scientific and technological innovation has entered an intensive and active period; the latest round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial reform have exerted a profound impact on the global economic structure.
hypo: Xi Jinping points out that today's world is experiencing a major change of a century without any major economic, changes are becoming intensive and frequent, and the next round of technological revolution and industrial transformation have had profound effects on the global economic structure.

src: 粤港澳大湾区要围绕建设国际科技创新中心战略定位，努力建设全球科技创新高地，推动新兴产业发展。
tgt: The Greater Bay Area of Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macau should center on the strategic positioning of building an international scientific and technological innovation center, strive to build a highland of global scientific and technological innovation, and promote the development of emerging industries.
hypo: The Hong Kong-Macao- Shenzhen region will strive to build a high-tech research and innovation center around the strategic positioning of building a global center for technology innovation, and promote the development of new industries.

src: 中国愿同世界各国科学家、国际科技组织一道，密切国际科技交流合作，加强重大科学问题研究，促进共性科学技术破解，深化重点科学项目协作，共同推进世界科学事业发展，更好造福人类。
tgt: China is willing to work with scientists, international scientific and technological organizations around the globe to carry out close international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation, strengthen research on major scientific problems, promote the cracking of common scientific technologies, deepen cooperation on key scientific projects, jointly promote the development of science on a global scale and better benefit mankind.
hypo: China is willing to work closely with scientists from all countries around the world and international organizations related to science and technology, to strengthen international exchange and cooperation, improve research on significant scientific problems, promote the破解 of common scientific technology，深化 collaboration on key scientific projects, and jointly promote the development of science and technology in the world for the betterment of humanity.

src: 2021年大湾区科学论坛当日在广东省广州市开幕，主题为“探索未来，共享科学 ” ， 由广东省人民政府主办。
tgt: 2021 Greater Bay Area Science Forum hosted by Guangdong Province People’s Government opened that day in Guangzhou, Guangdong with theme “discover the future, share science”。
hypo: The 2021 Global Green belt Science Festival opened on that day in Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, with the theme of "Exploring the Future, Sharing Science" and jointly sponsored by the Government of Guangdong Province.

src: 广西大学生休学创业年限最长可达５年-新华网
tgt: University students in Guangxi can suspend schooling to start their own business for as long as 5 years - Xinhuanet
hypo: The maximum period of study leave for college students in Guangxi can extend up to five years.

src: 新华社南宁５月１９日专电（记者张莺）记者近日从广西壮族自治区教育厅获悉，今后广西各高校将实施弹性学制，放宽大学生休学年限，在校生休学创业的年限在原有学制基础上可延长２至５年，休学创业时间可视为实践教育时间。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanning on May 19 (journalist: Zhang Ying) according to information from Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, universities and colleges in Guangxi will implement flexible education system and broaden the time limit for schooling suspension for students, and the year limit for students at school who suspend schooling to start their own businesses can be extended by 2 to up to 5 years based on the original length of education system, and the time for suspension from school and entrepreneurship can be regarded as the time for practical education.
hypo: The recent special message of the Central Government News Agency of Nan Nan Province (记者张莺) informed记者 that in the future, Nan Nan Province's universities will implement flexible curriculums，放宽 the length of college students' leave, and extend the periods of leave for college students to work and start businesses from existing curriculum standards by 2 to 5 years. The leave for work and start business time can be considered as practical education time.

src: 为促进大学生创业创新能力提升，广西教育、人社等部门合力搭建创业平台，建设更多大学生校外实践教学基地、大学科技园、大学生创业园、创业孵化基地等，给大学生创业提供外在保障。
tgt: In order to promote the capabilities of entrepreneurship and innovation of university students, Departments of Education and Human Resource and Social Security of Guangxi worked together to establish the an entrepreneurship platform, set up more off-campus practice teaching bases, university science and technology parks, entrepreneurship parks for university students and business incubation bases, which provide external support for the entrepreneurship of university students.
hypo: To promote the improvement of university-level entrepreneurship innovation, the education, government, and other departments in Guangxi have collaborated to construct an entrepreneurship platform, including more off-campus practice teaching bases for university students, university industrial research and development centers, university entrepreneurship centers, and entrepreneurship nurturing bases, providing an external guarantee for university-level entrepreneurs.

src: 根据要求，到２０２０年，各高校创新创业实践基地面积，本科学校要达到３０００平方米以上，高职学校要达到２０００平方米以上。
tgt: According to related regulations, up until 2020, the area of innovation and entrepreneurship practice base of undergraduate universities shall be at least 3,000 square meters and that of vocational schools shall be at least 2,000 square meters.
hypo: According to requirement, by 2020, the area of entrepreneurship practice基地 of each university should reach at least 3,000 square meters, and high school universities should reach at least 2,000 square meters.

src: 政府鼓励高校设立创新创业学分，优先支持在创新创业实践中表现优异的学生转专业。
tgt: Governments encourage universities to set up credits for innovation and entrepreneurship, to give priority in the transfer of major of students with outstanding performance in innovation and entrepreneurship.
hypo: Governments encourage the establishment of innovation and business-oriented coursework, and prioritize support for students who excel in their innovation and business-oriented practices.

src: 高校教师每两年要至少有两个月到行业企业挂职锻炼，以此提高教师创新创业教育的意识和能力。
tgt: Teachers in universities and colleges are required to take a temporary post in enterprises of related industries to train for at least two months every two years, so as to improve the awareness and ability of innovation and entrepreneurship education of the teachers.
hypo: Higher education teachers must have at least two months of work experience in industry and enterprises every two years, to enhance their awareness and skills in entrepreneurship education.

src: 自治区教育厅要求广西各高校深入实施大学生创新创业训练计划，力争使每一名大学生在校期间都参与一项创新创业训练计划。
tgt: It is required by the Department of Education of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region that universities and colleges shall thoroughly implement the innovation and entrepreneurship training program for university students, and strive to make each student participate in one innovation and entrepreneurship training program while in university.
hypo: The local education agency in Guangxi requires all universities in Guangxi to fully implement the professional and entrepreneurial innovation training programs for college students, aiming to include one professional and entrepreneurial innovation training program for each college student during their academic years.

src: 高校要积极组织学生参加各级各类创新创业竞赛，并给予经费支持。
tgt: Universities and colleges shall actively organize students to participate in various types and levels of innovation and entrepreneurship competitions, and provide financial support.
hypo: The universities should actively organize students to participate in various types of innovation and business development competitions, and provide financial support.

src: NEWS GOV-MO: 澳大向7位杰出人士颁授荣誉博士学位
tgt: NEWS GOV-MO: University of Macau awarded the degree of honorary doctorate to 7 distinguished people
hypo: News: GOV-MO receives honorary doctorate from University of Australia Doctorate given to: 7 outstanding individuals

src: 澳门大学今（11）日举行“2021年荣誉学位及高等学位颁授典礼 ＂ ， 向刘遵义、陈凯先、中村修二、李兰娟、李效良、朱丽兰及江朝晖颁授澳大荣誉博士学位，以表彰其卓越成就、为社会和教育的发展所作出的重大贡献。
tgt: The “2021 Award-Giving Ceremony for Honorary Degree and Advanced Degree” was held in University of Macau today (the 11th day of this month) to award the degree of honorary doctorate of the University of Macau to Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Shuji Nakamura, Li Lanjuan, Li Xiaoliang, Zhu Lilan and Jiang Zhaohui to commend their outstanding achievements and their major contributions to social and educational development.
hypo: The University of macao is holding the " Awarding of Honorary and Higher Degree 颁发典礼" today (11).   This ceremony is aimed at recognizing Liu Zunyi, Chen Kaixian, Co Co Qiushui, Lilan Qi, Li X效， Zhu Lilang, and Jiang Dong晖 for their outstanding achievements and significant contributions to the development of society and education.

src: 颁授典礼上，行政长官兼澳大校监代表、社会文化司司长欧阳瑜在澳大校董会主席林金城、澳大校长宋永华陪同下颁授荣誉博士学位。
tgt: At the award-giving ceremony, Ouyang Yu, the chief executive, the representative of the university superintendent of University of Macau and the director of the Social and Cultural Department, awarded the degree of honorary doctorate accompanied by Lin Jincheng, chairman of the university board, and Song Yonghua, president of University of Macau.
hypo: On the occasion of the award ceremony, the Administrator and Representative of theUniversity of, Social and Cultural Development Division Director Oi Yu瑜， accompanied by the President of the Student Council of the University of，宋永华， awarded an Honorary doctorate to the University of.

src: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。
tgt: Professor Liu Zunyi was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Education; Professor Chen Kaixian was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Shuji Nakamura was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Lanjuan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science; Professor Li Xiaoliang was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Business Administration; Professor Zhu Lilan was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science and Ms. Jiang Zhaohui was awarded with the honorary degree of Doctor of Science.
hypo: 刘遵义教授获颁荣誉教育博士学位、陈凯先教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、中村修二教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李兰娟教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位、李效良教授获颁荣誉工商管理博士学位、朱丽兰教授获颁荣誉理学博士学位，江朝晖女士获颁荣誉理学博士学位。  Translation: Liu Zhenquan is awarded the荣誉 Doctor of Education degree, Chen Kaisen is awarded the荣誉 Doctor of Philosophy degree, Comin II is awarded the荣誉 Doctor of Philosophy degree, Li Lanqun is awarded the荣誉 Doctor of Philosophy degree, Li Xianli is awarded the荣誉 Business Management degree, Zhu Liland is awarded the荣誉 Doctor of Philosophy degree, and Jiang Jie晖 is awarded the荣誉 Doctor of Philosophy degree.

src: 欧阳瑜致辞时首先向获颁发荣誉博士学位的七位杰出人士，表示热烈的祝贺并致以崇高的敬意，他们分别在不同的领域取得非凡的成就，为国家的发展和世界的进步作出了卓越的贡献；同时，欧阳瑜向毕业生和家长表达最真挚的祝福，也向大学爱岗敬业、学术精湛的教职员团队致以由衷的敬意。
tgt: In his speech, Ouyang Yu enthusiastically congratulated and expressed great respect to the seven distinguished people awarded with the honorary doctorate, who made outstanding achievements in different fields and excellent contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world; at the same time, Ouyang Yu expressed the most sincere wishes to the graduates and their parents, and showed sincere respect to the teachers who cherish their posts, stay devoted to their career, and have exquisite academic skills.
hypo: When Xie Yuyue made his speech, he first expressed deep congratulations and respectful greetings to seven outstanding individuals who had been awarded the honor degree, each取得 remarkable achievements in different fields, making outstanding contributions to the development of the country and the progress of the world. At the same time, Xie Yuyue expressed his heartfelt wishes to the graduates and parents, as well as to the hardworking and excellence teaching staff team at the university, with whom he had a profound respect.

src: 澳大人文学院讲座教授孙艺风宣读刘遵义赞辞时表示，刘遵义教授是一位享誉全球的经济学家，以其卓越的学术成就和前瞻性的教育理念而闻名。
tgt: When reading the praises to Liu Zunyi, Sun Yifeng, a chair professor of the Faculty of Humanities of University of Macau, praised Professor Liu Zunyi as an economist famous across the world, who is famous for his excellent academic achievements and prospective educational ideas.
hypo: Sun Yifeng, a讲座教授 at the University of Australian School of Economics, read about Liu Shaoqi's praises in an interview and said that Liu Shaoqi is a renowned economist known for his outstanding academic achievements and visionary educational ideas.

src: 除了在经济发展、经济增长及东亚经济领域取得的成就外，他还是一位富有远见的教育领导者。
tgt: Apart from achievements made in economic development and growth as well as in the economic industry in East Asia, he is also a visionary educational leader.
hypo: "In addition to his achievements in the fields of economic development, economic growth, and东亚 economic development, he is also a visionary educational leader."

src: 简而言之，他在众多领域都有杰出建树。
tgt: In short, he has made achievements in many fields.
hypo: In short, he has made outstanding contributions in many fields.

src: 孙艺风宣读中村修二赞辞时表示，中村修二教授是可持续能源技术的先驱者。
tgt: Sun Yifeng said while reading praises to Shuji Nakamura that Professor Shuji Nakamura is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.
hypo: Sun Yifeng read the praises of Zhonghua Qiushui教授 and said that Professor Zhonghua Qiushui is a pioneer in sustainable energy technology.

src: 他因发明蓝色发光二极管（LED）而成为2014年诺贝尔物理学奖的三位获奖者之一。
tgt: He became one of the three prize winners of 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics with his invention of blue LED.
hypo: He became one of three winners of the 2014 Nobel Prize in Physics.

src: 中村教授的发明不仅彻底改变了照明行业，更推动产生了如今广泛应用于日常生活和工业生产的白色发光二极管，为人类的福祉做出了巨大的贡献。
tgt: The invention of Professor Shuji Nakamura has utterly changed the lighting industry and led to the creation of the white LED, which is widely applied in daily life and industrial production today, making great contributions to welfare of human beings.
hypo: Professor Miyamoto's invention not only completely transformed the lighting industry but also promoted the development of white LED chips, which are widely used in daily life and industrial production, making great contributions to human welfare.

src: 孙艺风宣读李兰娟赞辞时表示，李兰娟教授作为中国人工肝事业的开拓者，创建独特有效的李氏人工肝系统，治疗重型肝炎肝衰竭获重大突破，显著降低肝衰竭的病死率。
tgt: When reading the praises to Li Lanjuan, Sun Yifeng praised her as the pioneer of the artificial liver industry in China, who has created the unique and effective Li’s artificial liver system, made great breakthroughs in the treatment of severe hepatitis and hepatic failure, and significantly reduced the fatality rate of hepatic failure.
hypo: Sun Xiling read the praises of Li Lanqun教授， who is a pioneer in the development of China's artificial liver事业， and said that Li Lanqun教授 has created a unique and effective Li Lanqun liver system, achieving a significant breakthrough in the treatment of severe肝炎 liver failure and significantly reducing the mortality rate of liver failure.

src: 在这次新冠肺炎抗击战中，她和团队所提出的“四抗二平衡”方案及带去的人工肝、微生态和干细胞三大技术，显著提高了重症救治率。
tgt: In the fight against the COVID-19, the “four-against and two-balance” scheme proposed by her and her team and the three technologies including artificial liver, micro-ecology and stem cells have significantly improved the treatment and cure rate of severe cases.
hypo: In this COVID-19 fight against the disease, her team's提出的 "四抗二平衡" scheme and the three technologies of artificial liver, ecological system, and stem cell have significantly improved the cure rate of severe cases.

src: 孙艺风宣读李效良赞辞时表示，李效良教授为运营管理的创新研究奠定了基础，塑造了供应链理论和实践的思维方式，并彻底改变了世界各地的商业模式。
tgt: When reading the praises to Li Xiaoliang, Sun Yifeng said that he laid a foundation for creative research on operation management, shaped the way of thinking for the theory and practice of supply chain and thoroughly changed the commercial mode all over the world.
hypo: Sun Yifeng said, "Xinyi Liu has laid a foundation for innovative research in operations management, shaping the thinking patterns of supply chain management and theory, and彻底改变ing business models in various places around the world."

src: 李效良因普及运筹管理中的长鞭效应概念而闻名，并探索了应对这种现象的措施。
tgt: Li Xiaoliang is famous for popularizing the concept of bullwhip effect in operation management, and he has explored the measures to cope with this phenomenon.
hypo: Li Xingyang is known for popularizing the concept of theBullwhip Effect in project management and exploring measures to address this phenomenon.

src: 如今，各国在疫情及紧张的经济局势下，长鞭效应愈发突显，引发供应链严重破坏。
tgt: Now, all countries are facing the epidemic and the intense situations in economics, and the bullwhip effect has been increasingly prominent, leading to serious destruction in the supply chain.
hypo: "Currently, with the pandemic and tense economic situation, the bullwhip effect is becoming increasingly prominent, causing严重破坏 in the supply chain."

src: 李效良具有远见的研究如雪中送炭，帮助行业应对困境，从而带来巨大的社会价值。
tgt: The prospective research conducted by Li Xiaoliang is like offering fuel in snowy weather, helping the industries to cope with the difficulties and bringing about huge social values.
hypo: The research conducted by Li X效良 is like a snowplow that helps the industry应对 difficulties, thereby bringing about huge social values.

src: 孙艺风宣读朱丽兰赞辞时表示，在科研工作中，她发现了一种突破性和创新的染色技术用于制备样品，在国内外科技同行中享有较高声誉。
tgt: When reading the praises to Li Zhu Lilan, Sun Yifeng said that Zhu Lilan found a groundbreaking and creative staining technique during scientific research and applied it in preparing samples, and she enjoyed great reputation among counterparts in science and technology at home and abroad.
hypo: Sun Yifeng said that in scientific research, she found a breakthrough and innovative colorization technique for preparing samples and has gained a high reputation among domestic and foreign scientific colleagues.

src: 她以非凡的科技成就荣膺国际欧亚科学院院士等重要荣誉称号，以自己辉煌的业绩为自己在世界科技圣殿赢得了应有的崇高地位。
tgt: She was awarded with honorary titles such as an academician of International Eurasian Academy of Sciences with her outstanding scientific achievements, and won the lofty position in the temple of science and technology of the world with her splendid achievements.
hypo: She was awarded the prestigious title of member of the International Eurasian Science Academy and other important honorifics for her exceptional technological achievements, which earned her a应有的崇高 position in the world's Science and Technology Temple.

src: 澳大中华医药研究院代院长陈新宣读陈凯先赞辞时表示，陈凯先教授从事药物研发40余载，杰出的科学成就以及对国家、澳门、澳门大学、国家重点实验室的重要贡献使其拥有崇高的国际地位和声望。
tgt: When reading the praises to Chen Kaixian, Chen Xin, the acting dean of Institute of Chinese Medical Sciences of University of Macau, said that Professor Chen Kaixin has been engaged in research and development of medicine for more than 40 years, and has won lofty international status and reputation due to his excellent scientific achievements as well as his great contributions the country, Macau, University of Macau and national key laboratories.
hypo: The代院长 of the Academy of Chinese Medicine, Chen Xin, read out the praises of Chen Kaixin教授， indicating that over four decades of drug research and development, Chen Kaixin教授 has demonstrated outstanding scientific achievements and has made important contributions to the country, Hong Kong, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, and National Key Laboratory of Chinese Medicine, which have earned him a prestigious international position and reputation.

src: 他对澳门和大湾区中医药事业发展的积极推动作用充分体现了其为国家医药发展战略奉献的使命感。
tgt: His active promotion of the development of Traditional Chinese Medicine to Macau and the Greater Bay Area has sufficiently reflected his sense of mission in his contribution to medical development strategy in our country.
hypo: His actively supportive role in the development of traditional Chinese medicine in澳门 and the Great Wall region has fully reflected his mission to contribute to the national healthcare development strategy.

src: 澳大科技学院院长须成忠宣读江朝晖赞辞时表示，江朝晖女士参与研发的重大发明和专利，至今累积超过15项与存储虚拟化、导航、文件系统和电源管理相关，无不实用性高，使用广泛，提升人类生活便利度。
tgt: When reading the praises to Jiang Zhaohui, Xu Chengzhong, dean of the Institute of Technology of University of Macau, said that 15 significant inventions and patients developed with the participation of Ms. Jiang Zhaohui are related to storage virtualization, navigation, document system and power management, which are all highly practical, widely applied and improved the convenience of life.
hypo: The head of the School of Science and Technology, Jiang Zhaohui, expressed her appreciation for the significant achievements and patents she has contributed to the research and development. Since her involvement in the project, there have been over 15 technologies related to storage virtualization, navigation, file systems, and power management, all of which are highly practical and widely used, improving the convenience of human life.

src: 作为卓有成就的发明家，江女士往往能把高深的科技和理论化繁为简，普及大众。
tgt: As an inventor with outstanding achievements, Ms. Jiang can turn sophisticated technology and theories into simple concepts and popularize them to the public.
hypo: Translate this sentence into English: As a highly accomplished inventor, Jiang woman often turns complex technologies and theories into simplified and widely spread knowledge.

src: 最后，陈凯先作为荣誉博士代表宣读谢辞。
tgt: At last, Chen Kaixian delivered the thank-you speech as the representative of honorary doctorates.
hypo: Finally, Chen凯先， as a representative of honorary doctorates, reads a dedication.

src: 他很高兴看到澳门及大湾区的医药事业树立了一个良好的典范：从澳大建立的第一个中药质量研究国家重点实验室到大湾区中医药的蓬勃发展，澳大在整合大湾区中医药领域优秀人才中贡献了巨大作用。
tgt: He was happy to see that the industry of medicine in Macau and Greater Bay Area has set a good example: from the University of Macau establishing the first National Key Laboratory of Traditional Chinese Medicine Quality Research to the prosperous development of the traditional Chinese medicine industry in Greater Bay Area, the University of Macau has played a major role in integrating outstanding talents of traditional Chinese medicine.
hypo: He is glad to see澳门 and the Great Wall of China's pharmaceutical industry setting a good example: from establishing the first National Science and Technology Center for Chinese Medicine in Australia to the thriving Chinese Medicine industry in the Great Wall of China, Australia has contributed greatly to integrating outstanding talents in the field of Chinese Medicine in the Great Wall of China.

src: 此外，他认为澳大的管理团队拥有远见卓识，不仅在学术上为学生提供科研沃土，同时为社会输送了许多拥有责任心的人才。
tgt: In addition, he thinks the management team of the University of Macau is far-sighted, who not only provide students with abundant resources of research, but also send a lot of responsible talents to society.
hypo: In addition, he believes that the management team of Australian University has vision and远见卓识， not only providing students with excellent opportunities for research and academic study, but also输送 many responsible talents to the society.

src: 他很荣幸能跟澳大展开交流与合作，并对澳大近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。
