tgt: He was honored to carry out exchanges and communication with University of Macau and congratulated University of Macau on the achievements it achieved in recent years.
hypo: His荣幸能跟Macau展开交流与合作，并对Macau近年取得的成就表示由衷祝贺。

src: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
tgt: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet
hypo: " Asian communities complain about academic歧视 in the Ivy League universities like耶鲁大学"

src: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.
hypo: "On May 23, 2023, more than 130 Asian-American groups in the United States submitted complaints to the United States Department of Education and the Department of Justice，抗议 three Ivy League universities in New York City —耶鲁大学，布朗大学， and Cornell University —歧视 Asian-American applicants in their admissions processes."

src: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
tgt: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.
hypo: The Asian Education Coalition led the appeal at a press conference the same day in Washington.

src: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
tgt: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.
hypo: The president of the group, Zhao Yuxiang, said that over the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the录取 criteria of top universities in the United States has doubled, but the proportion of Asian students in these three top universities has remained largely the same.

src: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
tgt: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.
hypo: Many studies have shown that during the so-called "的综合考量" admission process of these universities, they "歧视" Asian-American applicants in a long-term and systematic manner.

src: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
tgt: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.
hypo: According to Studies by Sun and other scholars in 2014, among these three universities, the application rate of Asian students is the lowest among all ethnic groups.

src: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
tgt: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.
hypo: The United States Department of Education's data also shows that among all Ionian-American universities, Brown University and Trinity College have the lowest acceptance rates for Asian students among all members of the Ivy League.耶鲁大学 and Brown University have implemented actual种族配额 for Asian application students for more than 20 years.

src: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
tgt: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.
hypo: Zhao Yuxiang told the新华社 journalist that they expected the United States Department of Education and the Department of Justice to conduct a investigation after submitting the complaint, and after determining the facts, to take采取措施 to prevent these universities from continuing to歧视 Chinese students in the admission process.

src: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
tgt: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.
hypo: They also期望 that the universities that were complaints about should actively pay attention to this issue and change their recruitment policies for Asian students.

src: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
tgt: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.
hypo: Currently, the three universities complaint about have not responded yet.

src: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
tgt: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.
hypo: The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015, and during that time, it filed a complaint about Harvard University's admissions歧视， but the US Department of Education did not accept it on procedural grounds.

src: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
tgt: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.
hypo: The groups involved in the申诉 included not only American Chinese groups but also education groups from India, Korean, Japan, and Pakistan.

src: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
tgt: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.
hypo: After the Friday Democracy Summit, the official发言人 of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Saturday ( December 11th) made a statement that the United States organized the "领导人民主峰会" was "划线以意识形态，将民主手段、武器化，以民主的名义行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾."

src: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
tgt: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.
hypo: The Chinese government believes that for a long time, the United States强加于人 its political system and value beliefs, promoting " democratic transformation", applying单边制裁 too often, organizing the " color revolution", and causing catastrophic consequences.

src: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
tgt: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.
hypo: "民主" has become a "大规模杀伤性武器" for the US to interfere in other countries.

src: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
tgt: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.
hypo: This summit was a行动 to兑现拜登的竞选承诺.

src: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
tgt: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.
hypo: The为期两天的视频会议 included 111 national leaders from around the world, including the leaders of Taiwan, but China and Russia were not invited.

src: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
tgt: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.
hypo: Before the summit, China and Russia criticized the United States for its own democracy, stating that the US does not have the qualifications to hold such a summit.

src: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
tgt: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.
hypo: There are also的质疑声音 on the international and domestic level, such as criticism that the邀请函 includes some leaders with authoritarian tendencies, such as those from the Philippines, Poland, and Brazil, and some people are怀疑 the true intentions of the Biden government that the峰会 was organized not for democracy but for geo political purposes.

src: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
tgt: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.
hypo: The newly elected德国总理舒尔茨 also participated in a video Democracy Summit.

src: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
tgt: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.
hypo: The statement by the Chinese foreign ministry on Saturday revealed that "the democracy of the American system today is showing signs of morbidness, with issues such as money politics, identity politics, political polarization, party对立， political polarization, social分裂，种族矛盾， and wealth inequality on the rise." This American democracy, built on the basis of capital, is a "富人游戏" for the wealthy.

src: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
tgt: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”
hypo: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示， "As leaders of the government, we have a responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the firewalls of democracy, promote change, achieve transparency and accountability governance, and better withstand the power of authoritarianism and its impacts, as well as those who seek to emphasize power without regard for the public benefits. "  Note: The phrase "of impact, power of, public benefits" is included in the translation for clarity.

src: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
tgt: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”
hypo: He emphasizes that democracy is not taken for granted, "We must update it in every generation. In my view, this is the defining challenge of our era."

src: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
tgt: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.
hypo: Biden also said that when global democracy and human rights are faced with continuously令人担忧 challenges, democracy needs warriors to捍卫.

src: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
tgt: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.
hypo: The US has承诺 that after this democratic Summit, a year-long campaign will be launched, including an initiative with a total cost of $4.244 billion, aimed at strengthening democracy throughout the world and providing support to independent news organizations.

src: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
tgt: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.
hypo: The United States hopes that各国 will make specific and public commitments before the实体 democratic summit scheduled for the end of 2022 to improve their democratic systems.

src: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
tgt: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.
hypo: Biden said, "Let us allfulfill our promises and report our progress next year."

src: 教育思考：大学考试如何让“学霸 ” “ 学渣”各得其所-新华网
tgt: Thought on Education: How do examinations in college allow straight A students and slack students both get what they deserve - Xinhuanet
hypo: Education reflection: How university examinations can allow "学霸" and "学渣" to achieve their individual goals,Xinhuanet.

src: 兰州交通大学3名学生给校领导写信，反映对大学考试的困惑，并提出提高考试难度，变换考试题型，让考试真正体现学生实际水平的诉求。
tgt: Three students in Lanzhou Jiaotong University wrote a letter to leaders of the university to reflect their confusion on examinations in university, and raised the ideas to increase the difficulty of examinations, change types of questions and let the examinations reflect the real learning level of students.
hypo: 3 students from Lanzhou University wrote a letter to the leaders of the school, reflecting on their confusion about university exams and proposing the demand for increasing exam difficulty, changing exam formats, and making exams truly reflect the students' actual level.

src: 的确，长期以来，大学考试都是一个“热门话题 ” 。
tgt: Indeed, examinations in universities have been a “heated topic“ for a long time.
hypo: Indeed, for a long time, college exams have been a "hot topic."

src: 在大学校园，学生来自五湖四海，能力水平各不相同，再加之学习程度不一，学习的情况千差万别。
tgt: Students on campus come from all corners of the country, with varied abilities and levels; due to different efforts spent in study, their situations of study vary significantly.
hypo: In the university's campus, students come from different regions across the country, with varying levels of ability and learning experience, resulting in a wide range of learning situations.

src: 对于具有如此多元特征的群体进行考核，存在不同感受，在所难免。
tgt: It is inevitable for different feelings about the examinations to exist in such a diversified group.
hypo: Here's the English translation for the given sentence: When evaluating a group with such diverse characteristics, it is inevitable that there will be different feelings.

src: 当然，如果考试试题题型单一、重复率高，题目过于简单，必然会造成另一种截然不同的感受。
tgt: Certainly, it will cause a completely different experience if there are few types of questions, the questions are repetitive or too simple.
hypo: Certainly, if the exam questions have a single type of question, a high ratio of repetition, and the questions are too simple, it will undoubtedly lead to a completely different experience.

src: 不用功的学生，可能考前集中突击就能及格，如若再想其他办法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。
tgt: Students who do not study hard can pass the exam after cramming before the exam; if they think of other ways, they may half the work with double results.
hypo: 不用功的学生，可能通过集中突击在考前及格，如果再加上其他方法，有可能达到事半功倍的效果。  Students who may not work hard enough can possibly pass the exam by集中 studying during the考前. If they can find other ways to achieve their goals, they may be able to achieve more effectively.

src: 如此一来，就出现“学渣”平时不投入也能过关、甚至得了高分 ； “ 学霸”平时从不落课，作业、笔记样样好，考试也没高出多少的“怪现状 ” 。
tgt: As such, there will be a “strange phenomenon where “slack students” who don’t ordinarily study pass the exam and even getting high scores; “straight A” students who never miss any class, take notes, do assignments get scores that are not much higher.
hypo: This way, there will be a "dropout" who can pass with little effort, even getting a high score; and a "study buddy" who never attends classes, is good at作业 and笔记， but doesn't improve much in exams. It will be a strange situation where the "high school genius" doesn't study at all, is excellent in all subjects, but doesn't get much better in exams.

src: 这样看来，兰州交大的学生反映大学考试中存在的问题并非毫无来由，相信这种状况也不只兰州交大存在。
tgt: In this way, the problems in college exams reflected by students of Lanzhou Jiaotong University are not groundless; it is believed that such situations do not exist only in Lanzhou Jiaotong University.
hypo: In this light, it appears that the problems with the university exams reported by students from Lanzhou Jiao Tong University are not entirely groundless, and it is believed that such situations are not limited to Lanzhou Jiao Tong University.

src: 从这层意义上讲，要为这3名写信直陈的学生点赞。
tgt: In this sense, we should applaud for the three students who wrote the letter to reflect the problem directly.
hypo: From this sense, we should endorse the three students who wrote directly.

src: 其实，上过大学的人都清楚，突击备考、想各种办法从老师处“套取”考题，争取划考试范围，求得考前得到“重点辅导”的现象并不少见，甚至在考试中夹带小抄、考后求老师高抬贵手的情况也不是奇闻。
tgt: In fact, people who have been to colleges know that the phenomena of cramming for an exam, “trying to winkle” exam questions from teachers, trying to get the scope of the questions and acquiring “key tutoring” before exam are not rare; further, bringing notes to exams or begging teachers to give higher marks after exams are not rare, either.
hypo: actually, people who have studied at university can understand that突击备考 and try various ways to get exam questions from teachers, strive to define exam scope, and obtain "重点辅导" before the exam is not rare. It is not a rare sight to even carry作弊 paper or ask teachers to please recognize the situation.

src: 在笔者看来，作为一种教学质量评估导向，衡量一所大学考试的合格与否，更在于教师对教与学的全面把握，以及在此基础上的科学命题。
tgt: In the view of the author, as a guidance for teaching quality evaluation, judging if the exams in a college are qualified or not relies more on the comprehensive mastering on teaching and learning by teachers, as well as the setting questions scientifically on this basis.
hypo: In the view of the writer, the assessment of the success of a university exam is more about the comprehensive understanding of teaching and learning by the teachers and the scientific questions built on that foundation.

src: 进入大学本科阶段，专业开始细分，很多专业课程以基础知识为主。
tgt: Majors are segmented after entering the undergraduate study, and many specialized courses are carried out with basic knowledge as the main content.
hypo: As students enter university, majors begin to divide up, and many major courses focus primarily on的基础知识和技能.

src: 毋庸置疑，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。
tgt: Undoubtedly, whether the students have mastered the basic knowledge is a content to be inspected in the exams in college.
hypo: Undoubtedly，是否全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点，是大学考试要考察的内容。  Translation: It is undoubtedly that全面掌握一个学科的基本知识点 is the content that大学 exams will考察.

src: 而本科知识基本都是学科基础理论和基本常识，从知识点而言，变化的空间并不大，基本是固定的。
tgt: Knowledge during the undergraduate study is mainly basic theories and common sense of the subject, and in terms of knowledge points, they are basically unchanged and there is not much room for variation.
hypo: The basic knowledge of each subject is mainly based on fundamental theories and common sense. From the perspective of knowledge points, there is not much room for change, and it is relatively fixed.

src: 就像有教师所言 ， “ 20年前学大学数学的基本知识，现在还在学，还是重点 。 ”
tgt: As some teachers have said, “the mathematical basic knowledge in college twenty years ago is still being taught today and it is still a key content.”
hypo: As some teachers mentioned, learning the basic knowledge of university mathematics 20 years ago is still being studied and is still a focus.

src: 但知识点基本不变，并不代表考试题型单一、试题重复。
tgt: However, the unchanging basic knowledge points do not mean there can be single type or repetitive questions.
hypo: However, the basic concepts remain unchanged, this does not necessarily mean that the examination questions are单调 and the problems are repeated.

src: 在很多大学，考试一般都会组成出题组，再由学科资深教师统筹组成试卷，考试阅卷也由承担该科的全体老师参与，这样就能在一定程度上克服试题重复的情况。
tgt: There will usually be a group working on setting test questions for the exams, and senior teachers of the subject will coordinate and compile a test paper; marking test papers will be undertaken by all teachers of the subject; this can in a sense overcome the situation of repetitive questions.
hypo: In many universities, exams are typically composed of出题 teams, which then组编成试卷. The test scores are also collected by all teachers responsible for the subject, thus overcoming the situation of repetitive questions.

src: 但要拟出一套符合教与学实际的试题，题目根据学生学习整体情况，难易呈正态分布，还需综合掌握教学情况，全面分析学生学习的程度，从而使考试命题对难易、题型有动态把握，既能突出基础知识考察，又能兼顾能力考查，同时对题型进行创新设计。
tgt: In order to prepare a set of test questions in accordance with practical conditions of teaching and learning, it is necessary to set questions with normal distribution in difficulty degree according to general learning conditions of students; it is also required to learn about the teaching situation, comprehensively analyze how well the students have learned so as to have a good command of the level of difficulty and type of question in designing the test paper, giving priority to inspection of basic knowledge, and testing their ability at the same time; creative designs on the type of question can be made as well.
hypo: In order to Develop a set of questions that correspond to the practical reality of teaching and learning, the difficulty of the questions should呈正态分布 according to the overall situation of student learning. It is also necessary to comprehensively master the teaching situation and analyze the degree of student learning in order to create dynamic questions that accurately reflect the difficulty and types of questions. At the same time, innovative design can be done for types of questions.

src: 考试是大学教育的指挥棒，有什么样的考试，学生就会有相应的备考方案，长此以往，将影响大学教育的成效。
tgt: College exam is the baton of college education, and students prepare for college exam according to the exam types; for this reason, college exams will influence the effect of college education in the long run.
hypo: The exam is the baton of college education. As long as there are corresponding study plans for different exams, it will have an impact on the effectiveness of college education.

src: 对于学生的建议信，兰州交大校方高度重视，已在全校部署了整改的方案。
tgt: Lanzhou Jiaotong University pays special attention to the letter of advise from the students; it has deployed the scheme for rectification in the university.
hypo: The校方 of兰州交大 is highly高度重视 and has deployed a plan for improvement throughout the school.

src: 要求各教学单位组织教师开展研讨和课程结课考试对照自查，制定考试试卷命题及相关制度，同时加强对考试试卷命题及审核环节的监督与检查，细化成绩评定，加强课程教学各环节的全面考核。
tgt: It requires all teaching units to organize teachers to deliberate and conduct self-inspection on exams at the end of a course, formulate systems about question setting for exam paper, strengthen supervision and inspection on question setting and review, specify grade evaluation work, and strengthen comprehensive inspection on various links of course teaching.
hypo: Please provide the English translation of the sentence.   To ensure that the translation includes the following keywords: to deliberate, organize teachers, question setting, and comprehensive assessment, the relevant teaching units are requested to organize teachers to carry out discussions and self-evaluations of course結束考试 in comparison with each other. They are also required to develop the question setting and evaluation system related to the examination questions. At the same time, the management should strengthen supervision and inspection of the question setting and review process, and细化 the evaluation of grades. In addition, comprehensive assessment of key aspects of course teaching should also be strengthened.

src: 从机制上解决试题类型单一、题目重复等问题是大学考务需要面对的议题，当然需要出台相应的制度，但功夫贵在日常，需要教师对教学情况的全面掌握，不单要吃透教学内容，更须吃透学生学习情况，两头吃透，教与学将更好对接，形成良性互动，考试也将更加符合实际，从而让“学霸”和“学渣”各得其所。
tgt: Solving problems such as types of questions are few and repetitive questions by way of changing the system is a task that college exam administration needs to deal with; regulations need to be issued, but efforts should be made in normal times; it requires teachers to comprehensive master the teaching and learning situation; they need to not only master their teaching content but also the learning situation of the students; mastering both can better connect teaching and learning, forming an effective interaction; exams will be more fit for the actual situation, and straight A students and slack students can both get what they deserve.
hypo: Solving the problems of a single type of question and repetitive questions through the mechanism is a issue that universities need to face. Of course, corresponding systems need to be put in place. However, it is important to focus on the daily practice of teachers, who need to be comprehensive in their understanding of teaching situations. Not only should they understand the content of teaching, but also their students' learning situations. By understanding both sides, teaching and learning can better connect and form a positive interaction. This will also make the exams more realistic, allowing "学霸" and "学渣" to achieve their goals according to their abilities.

src: 沙巴3200名新生婴儿无报生纸 因特制防伪纸断货
tgt: 3200 new infants in Sabah have no birth certificates because of the supply shortage of the specially made security paper.
hypo: There were no birth announcements for 3,200 mothers-to-be in Saudi Arabia because特制的防伪纸 was in short supply.

src: （亚庇11日讯）沙巴国民登记局说，由于特制防伪纸存货用光，所以自10月初开始就无法颁发报生纸给初生婴儿，至今累积的受影响者达3200人。
tgt: (Kota Kinabalu News on the 11th) According to the National Registration Bureau of Sabah, new infants cannot be provided with birth certificates from the beginning of October due to supply shortage of the specially made security paper; a total of 3,200 infants have been influenced so far.
hypo: (AIB 11日讯)沙巴国民登记局表示，由于特制防伪纸的存货已用光，所以自10月初开始就无法颁发报生纸给初生婴儿，受影响者人数截至今天已经累积到3,200人。

src: 不过，该局主任凯鲁阿米努斯保证，所有已经申请报生纸的婴儿，资料已经记录在系统，当防伪纸在下周运到后就会补发。
tgt: However, director of the bureau, Kerouaminus, promised that the data of all the infants applying for birth certificate has been recorded in the system, and the certificates will be issued as soon as the security paper arrives next week.
hypo: However, the director of this agency, C rugiannis, guarantee that all babies who have applied for security paper have their information recorded in the system, and a copy will be sent to them after the security paper arrives next week.

src: 他在新闻发布会上，针对一家网媒指沙巴报生纸印制问题出现长达10个月的报导，作出解释。
tgt: He made the explanation at the press conference regarding to an online media’s report that the paper shortage of birth certificates in Sabah has been going on for ten months.
hypo: He made an explanation in the press conference regarding the article which was reported by a net media for a长达 10-month shortage of paper printing.

src: 他说，有关问题在2个月前就出现，砂拉越也面对同样的问题。
tgt: He said that related problems started 2 months ago, and that Sarawak is also facing this problem.
hypo: He said that the problem had appeared two months ago, and that砂拉越 was also facing the same issue.

src: “其中一个原因是生产特制防伪纸的中国厂家受疫情影响，导致延迟运抵我国 。 ”
tgt: “One of the reasons is that the manufacturers of the security paper in China are influenced by the epidemic, leading to a delay in delivery to our country.”
hypo: One reason is that the Chinese manufacturer in charge of producing special custom security paper is affected by the epidemic, resulting in delays in the delivery to our country.

src: 他解释，沙巴报生纸使用的防伪纸和其他地区不同，因此不能商借其他州属的存货。
tgt: He explained that the security paper used for birth certificates in Sabah is different from that of other regions, and therefore stock in other regions cannot be borrowed.
hypo: He explained that the paper used for the沙巴 newspaper is different from the paper used in other regions, so it's not possible to borrow inventory from other state-owned enterprises.

src: 凯鲁阿米努斯透露，最新一批防伪纸已经于本月6日运抵吉隆坡，过后于8日交给印刷公司，进行部分印制工作。
tgt: Kerouaminus disclosed that the latest batch of security paper has been delivered to Kuala Lumpur on December 6, and was handed over to the printing company on December 8 for part of the printing work.
hypo: K庐kgu Anus has announced that the latest batch of anti-counterfeiting paper has arrived in Kuala Lumpur on本月 6, and will be handed over to a printing company for some printing work on本月 8.

src: “该局下周四将派人到吉隆坡取货，回到沙巴立刻进行最后阶段的打印，估计多2个工作日（12月20日）就可以交到申请者手上 。 ”
tgt: “The National Registration Bureau of Sabah will dispatch staffs to pick up the goods in Kuala Lumpur next Thursday to complete the printing of the last stage after returning to Sabah, and it is estimated that they can be given out to the applicants at most 2 working days later (December 20).”
hypo: The company will send a team to吉隆坡 to pick up the goods next Thursday, and will immediately carry out the final stage of printing from沙巴. It is estimated that it will take just two working days ( December 20th) to deliver the goods to the applicant.

src: “我们会通知申请者前往各地分局领取报生纸 。 ”
tgt: “We’ll notify the applicants to get the birth certificates at their local branch bureau.”
hypo: "We will inform applicants to collect paper tickets at each station."

src: 他补充，沙巴今年至今共发出2万4801张报生纸。
tgt: He added that Sabah has issued 24,801 birth certificates so far this year.
hypo: He added that since January 1st, 2023，沙巴 has issued 24,801 certificates of news纸.

src: 人民日报评论员 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神-新华网
tgt: Commentators from People’s Daily: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference – Xinhuanet
hypo: The评论员 of the People's Daily: A good start achieved with the "145th National Economic and Social Development Conference" - On the implementation and cultivation of the spirit of the conference

src: 新华社北京12月11日电 人民日报12月12日评论员文章 ： “ 十四五”实现良好开局 — — 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 11: “The 14th Five-Year Plan” has seen a good start – discussion on studying and implementing the spirit of the Central Economic Work Conference
hypo: 新华社北京12月11日电 人民日报12月12日评论员文章： "十四五"实现良好开局 - - 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神  The following sentence can be translated into English as:  新华社北京12月11日电 The World News Agency of China and the People's Daily评论员' article on December 12th: "十四五"实现良好开局 - - 论学习贯彻中央经济工作会议精神  Please ensure that the above-mentioned words are included in the translation.

src: “实现了‘十四五’良好开局 ” ， 12月8日至10日举行的中央经济工作会议高度评价一年来我国经济社会发展取得的成绩。
tgt: “Realizing a good start of the 14th Five-Year Plan”, the achievements made in economic and social development in our country for the past year were highly praised at the Central Economic Work Conference held from December 8 to 12.
hypo: " achieved a good start in the year 2021," the central administrative conference held from December 8 to 10 highly appreciates the achievements in the economic and social development of China in the past year.

src: 习近平总书记在会上发表重要讲话，深刻总结2021年经济工作，深入分析当前经济形势，对2022年经济工作作出重大部署，为我们做好明年经济工作，迎接党的二十大胜利召开，指明了前进方向、提供了根本遵循。
tgt: General Secretary Xi Jinping gave an important speech at the conference, made a profound summary of the economic work of 2021, conducted in-depth analysis on current economic situations, made significant deployment on economic work of 2022, pointed out the direction for moving forward and provided the fundamental principles for the economic work next year to welcome the 21st National Congress of the CPC.
hypo: The President of the United States made a significant speech at the meeting, which deeply总结了 economic work in 2021, analyzed the current economic situation, made important arrangements for economic work in 2022, and provided guidance for doing well in the upcoming year's economic work, preparing for the胜利召开 of the Party's二十大.

src: 我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，正式宣布全面建成小康社会、实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程。
tgt: We solemnly celebrated the centenary of the foundation of the Communist Party of China, officially announced the comprehensive building of a moderately prosperous society and the realization of the first centennial objective, and we will embark on a new journey of building a modern socialist country in an all-round way and march towards the second centennial objective.
hypo: We celebrate with great honor the one hundredth anniversary of the establishment of the Communist Party of China, and officially declare the construction of a comprehensive and modernized socialist country, achieving the first ten-year goal, as we embark on a new journey towards the second ten-year goal.

src: 我们召开党的十九届六中全会，总结党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验，通过百年党史上第三个历史决议《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议 》 ， 这是新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言，是以史为鉴、开创未来、实现中华民族伟大复兴的行动指南。
tgt: We held the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party, summarized the significant achievements and historical experience of one-hundred-year struggle of the Party, passed Resolution of the CPC Central Committee on the Major Achievements and Historical Experience of the Party’s Centennial Struggle, the third historical resolution in the one-hundred year history of the Party, which is also the political declaration for the Chinese Communists in the new era in order to bear in mind our initial aspiration and mission, and insist on developing socialism with Chinese characteristics; it is an action guide for creating the future and realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation by taking history as reference.
hypo: We held the 19th Central Committee Session of the Communist Party of China, summarizing the significant achievements and historical experience of the Party's 100 years of struggle. We passed the third historical resolution in the history of the Party: "resolution on the significant achievements and historical experience of the Party's 100 years of struggle". This is a political宣言 for the new era of Chinese Communist Party leaders to remember their初心使命 and adhere to and develop China's socialism with Chinese characteristics, serving as a行动指南 for creating a better future and实现中华民族伟大复兴.

src: 一年来，世界百年未有之大变局和新冠肺炎疫情全球大流行交织影响，外部环境更趋复杂严峻，国内新冠肺炎疫情防控和经济社会发展各项任务极为繁重艰巨。
tgt: For the past year, under the intertwined influences of the great changes never seen during the past one hundred years and the COVID-19 global pandemic, external environments were more complicated and grim, and the tasks of pandemic prevention and control and various economic and social development tasks are extremely heavy and arduous.
hypo: Over the past year, the world has faced a unprecedented turn of events and a global pandemic that has affected the world for a century, making the external environment more complex and严峻. The domestic task of controlling the pandemic and promoting economic and social development is extremely繁重 and challenging.

src: 以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持统筹国内国际两个大局，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，加快构建新发展格局，强化宏观政策跨周期调节，着力促进经济持续健康发展，着力深化改革开放创新，奋力完成改革发展艰巨任务，党和国家各项事业取得了新的重大成就。
tgt: The Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core insists on taking both the domestic and international situations into consideration, adheres to the general tone of seeking progress in stability, calmly copes with the great changes in the past one hundred years and the epidemic of the century, coordinates epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, accelerates the construction of the new development pattern, strengthens the cross cyclical adjustment of macro policies, lays emphasis on promoting continuous healthy development of economy and deepening reform, opening up and innovation, and works hard to complete reform and development tasks; new significant achievements in various undertakings of the Party and our country have been made.
hypo: The Party Central Committee under Xi Jinping has consistently coordinated the two大局 of domestic and international development, maintaining the overall theme of steady progress with a view to improvement. We have faced the century-long changing situation and the 21st-century pandemic with calm and has coordinated the prevention and control of the pandemic and economic and social development. We have accelerated the construction of a new development landscape and strengthened the inter-annual management of宏观政策. We have worked hard to promote the ongoing economic development and to deepen and innovate the reform and opening-up process. We have worked tirelessly to complete the arduous task of economic development and reform, and achieved significant new achievements in various fields of the Party and country.

src: “十四五”实现良好开局，一个重要方面体现在，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效。
tgt: One of the important aspects of the good start of the “14th Five-Year Plan” is that we are taking a new step in constructing the new development pattern, and new achievements have been obtained with high-quality development.
hypo: The "145" achieve a good start, an important aspect of this is that the construction of a new development pattern迈出s a new step, and high-quality development achieves new results.

src: 我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，发展韧性强、潜力大、动力足的特点持续显现；国家战略科技力量加快壮大，重大创新成果竞相涌现，科技创新能力持续提升，关键核心技术攻关实现新突破；产业链韧性得到提升，对外贸易量增质升，结构继续优化，以新产业新业态新模式为代表的新动能成长壮大；改革开放向纵深推进，着力打通制约供需适配和要素流动的堵点，以高水平对外开放打造合作竞争新优势；民生保障有力有效，就业规模持续扩大，居民收入增长与经济增长基本同步，全年粮食连续7年保持在1.3万亿斤以上，喜获“十八连丰 ” ； 生态文明建设持续推进，碳达峰碳中和工作统筹推进，绿色低碳转型步伐稳健，生态环境保护取得新成效。
tgt: The economic development and epidemic prevention and control of our country is a leading position in the world, with the characteristics of strong development tenacity, great potential and sufficient motivation continuing to emerge; the strategic scientific and technological strength has expanded in an accelerated way, with significant innovative achievements emerging continuously; the scientific and technological innovation ability is continuously improved, leading to new breakthroughs in key and core technologies; the industry chain tenacity is improved, and the foreign trade quantity and quality have been elevated, structure is further optimized, and new kinetic energy represented by new industries, new business forms and new models grows and expands; the reform and opening up are promoted in a deeper way, so as to break through the blocking points restraining the matching of the supply and the demand and the flowing of factors, and to build new competitiveness for cooperation with high-standard opening up; the guarantee of people’s livelihood is powerful and effective, employment scale is further expanded, and personal income growth is basically in step with economic growth; the grain output of the whole year has been more than 1.3 trillion jin for 7 consecutive years, getting “good harvest for 18 consecutive years”; the construction of ecological civilization has been continuously promoted, and the peak carbon dioxide emissions and the carbon neutrality works have been planned as a whole, the green low-carbon transformation has been ongoing in a steady way, and ecological environment has made new achievements.
hypo: The Chinese economy's development and COVID-19 prevention and control maintain global leadership positions, displaying strong resilience, huge potential, and足的动力. National strategic scientific and technological forces are rapidly strengthened, with significant technological achievements emerging continuously. The ability of scientific and technological innovation is continuously improving, with breakthroughs in key core technologies being achieved. The industrial chain has been promoted to enhance resilience and increase foreign trade volume and quality, and the structure is continuously optimized. New enterprise structures and models represent new forces developing and growing.  The government's改革开放 is continuously promoted in the deep layer, efforts made to打通 bottlenecks that hinder supply and demand adaptability and factor flow. With high-level opening up, creating new advantages for cooperation and competition in business and environmental protection.  Overall, the ecological civilization development is continuously promoted, with碳达峰 and碳中和 work being统筹推进 and green and low-carbon transformation步伐 steady. New achievements in ecological protection have been made.

src: 这些成绩的取得，是以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导的结果，是习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引的结果，是全党全国各族人民勠力同心、艰苦奋斗的结果。
tgt: These achievements are the results of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as its core, the results of the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era, and the results of unity and hard work of the entire Party and the people of all ethnic groups in China.
hypo: The achievement of these accomplishments is the result of the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China under the leadership of Party General Secretary Xi Jinping, the scientific guidance of the New Era philosophy of China, and the efforts of the party and people of all sections and ethnic groups throughout the country.

src: 实践再次证明，党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。
tgt: It is proved by practice again that the establishment of the position of Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee and the Party, and the establishment of the guiding position of Xi Jinping thought on socialism with Chinese Characteristics in the new era play a decisive role in promoting the development of the Party and the country in the new era and in propelling the historical process of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
hypo: The practice has once again demonstrated the core and central position of the Party确立 Xi Jinping's central party and all-party system, and the guidance position of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese characteristics for a new era. This has decisive significance for the development of the Party and National government's activities and the progress of the historical process of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

src: 有习近平总书记作为党中央的核心、全党的核心领航掌舵，有习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想科学指引，有全党全国各族人民团结一心、顽强奋斗，我们就一定能够战胜各种艰难险阻，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程上创造新的时代辉煌、铸就新的历史伟业。
tgt: With General Secretary Xi Jinping as the core of the Party Central Committee, with the scientific guidance of socialism with Chinese characteristics of Xi Jinping in the new era, with unity and struggle of people of all ethnic groups in the Party and the whole country, we can solve all difficulties and create new glories and historical achievements in the new journey of building a socialist modern country in an all-round way.
hypo: With Comrade Xi Jinping as the core leader of the Communist Party of China, the core leader of the party and the driving force behind the party, the scientific guidance of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, and the united and disciplined efforts of the entire party and people of all ethnic groups throughout the country, we can overcome all difficulties and create a new era of great achievements and historic goals.

src: 明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。
tgt: The 20th National Congress of the CPC will be held next year, which is a major event for the political life of our Party and country.
hypo: The二十大 of the party will be held next year, which is a significant event in the political life of the country and the party.

src: 弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳 ” 、 “六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，我们就一定能保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
tgt: We should carry forward the great spirit of Party building, insist on the fundamental principle of seeking for improvement in stability, implement the development idea in a complete, accurate and comprehensive way, accelerate construction of the new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, insist on driving development with innovation, promote high-quality development, insist on taking the supply-side structural reform as the principal line, coordinate the epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development as a whole, plan development and security as a whole, continue to implement “six-stability” and “six-guarantee” work, continue to improve people’s livelihood, lay emphasis on stabilizing macroscopic economy, keep economy operation within reasonable ranges and maintain social stability; in this way, we must be able to keep a stable and healthy economic environment, a peaceful and safe social environment, a clean and upright political environment, and welcome the successful convocation of the 20th CPC National Congress with excellent results.
hypo: Promote the great building spirit, stick to the overall working direction of stability and progress, fully and accurately implement the new development philosophy, accelerate the construction of a new development structure，全面深化改革 and开放， stick to innovation- driven development, promote high-quality and sustainable development，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展 and safety, continue to do the "six stability" and "six security" work, continuously improve people's lives, strive to stabilize the macroeconomic big board, maintain economic operation in the reasonable range, and maintain the overall stability of the society. We can certainly maintain a smooth and healthy economic environment, a social land that is rich and prosperous, and a clean and正派 political environment to迎接党的二十大胜利召开 with excellent performance.

src: 让我们更加紧密地团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识 ” 、 坚定“四个自信 ” 、 做到“两个维护 ” ， 不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，不断把新时代中国特色社会主义事业推向前进。
tgt: Let us unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Xi Jinping as the core, strengthen “four-awareness”, be steadfast in insisting on “four self-confidence”, achieve “two-maintenance”, keep improving political judgment, political perception, political execution, implement the decisions made by the Party Central Committee with practical actions, and keep promoting socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era.
hypo: Let us closerly unite with Xi Jinping，以习近平同志为核心的党中央， to strengthen the "Five Core Knowledges" and firmly adhere to the "Four Confidences" and "Two Maintaining", continuously improve political judgment, political comprehension, and political execution, and apply以实际行动 to effectively implement the central party organization's decision-making and planning, pushing the Chinese Communist Party's socialist construction in the new era forward.

src: 教育资讯：北京压缩2016年初中入学特长生比例-新华网
tgt: Education News: Beijing reduces the proportion of students with special talents in middle schools enrollment in 2016 - Xinhuanet
hypo: The news: Beijing reduces the enrollment ratio of special interest students in junior high school in 2016-新华网  注意： This sentence contains the words "enrollment in".

src: 21日、22日两日，北京市初中入学特长生考查工作由各区教委统一组织实施。
tgt: On the 21st and the 22nd, the inspection of the enrollment of students with special talents in middle schools was organized and implemented by education commissions of different districts.
hypo: On July 21st and 22nd, the application examination for middle school entrance scholarships for students from various districts in Beijing was jointly carried out by the education commissions in each district.

src: 今年，北京各区均压缩了特长生招生比例，特长生竞争更为激烈。
tgt: This year, districts in Beijing have reduced the proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment, leading to more fierce competition in students with special talents.
hypo: This year, all parts of Beijing have reduced the enrollment proportion of special interest entrepreneurs, and the competition among them is even more intense.

src: 以东城区为例，今年该区小学升初中特长生入学比例总体不超过全区招生计划数的5 % ， 计划招生人数为380人，到校比例不超过学校招生计划数的10 % 。
tgt: Take Dongcheng District as an example, the entrance proportion of students with special talents in the enrollment of middle schools does not exceed 5% of the total number in the district; the planned number is 380, and the proportion of students checking in at the school shall not exceed 10% of the enrollment plan of the school.
hypo: Taking Manzhou Avenue as an example, the enrollment rate of students who are interested in switching from primary to secondary school in this district will not exceed 5% overall, and the number of enrollments will be 380 people, and the percentage of到校 students will not exceed 10% of the school's enrollment plan.

src: 凡具有体育、艺术、科技特长且在网上报名的学生均有资格参加特长生招生考查。
tgt: Students with talent in sports, art and science and technology who applied online are all qualified to participate in the inspection of students with special talents.
hypo: All students who have demonstrated sports, arts, and technology talents and applied online are eligible to participate in the recruitment examination for特长生.

src: 为方便学生就近参加考查，东城区延续去年的考查安排方式，在每个学区分别设置1~2个考查地点，共13个考查地点。
tgt: In order to provide convenience for students to participate in the examination at a nearby location, Dongcheng District continues with the examination arrangement of the past year by setting one or two examination locations in each school district, and there are totally 13 examination locations.
hypo: To facilitate student participation in exams in near proximity, the District of东城区 will continue with the examination arrangement last year, with 1-2 examination locations set in each school district, resulting in a total of 13 examination locations.

src: 考点均按考区划分考场，以小时为单位划分时段，考查当天学生将按时段进入考点在不同考区考场内进行考查。
tgt: The examination locations are divided according to the examination districts, and the time frames are divided in hours, and students will be examined in different examination rooms after entering the examination locations according to the assigned time frame.
hypo: The exams are divided into different考区 and考场， and each exam period is divided into multiple hours. Students will enter the exams at the designated time slots in different考场 in the different考区.

src: 5月23日，区教育招生考试中心网上公示考查通过的学生名单，学生可在网上查询考查结果。
tgt: On May 23, the list of the students who have passed the examination will be publicized on the website of the Educational Admission Examination Center of the district, and students can inquire the result of the examination on the website.
hypo: On May 23rd, the school examination center in the regional area will publish on the online the list of students who passed the examination, and students can查询 the results online.

src: 波黑奥委会主席：坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会-新华网
tgt: President of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee: It is firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time - Xinhuanet
hypo: The Olympic Committee of波斯尼亚 and黑塞哥维那 believes in China's capacity to deliver a successful Olympic event during special circumstances.

src: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇近日表示，波方十分期待北京冬奥会，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会。
tgt: Message from Sarajevo of Xinhuanet on December 11, Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, said recently that Bosnia was looking forward to the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics and firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during this special time.
hypo: 新华社萨拉热窝12月11日电 The President of Bosnia's Olympic Committee, Cvetic, recently stated that Bosnia and Herzegovina is very excited for the Beijing Winter Olympics and firmly believes that China has the ability to hold a successful Olympic event in special circumstances.

src: 日前中国驻波黑大使季平在萨拉热窝奥林匹克中心会见波黑奥委会主席克韦西奇。
tgt: Ji Ping, ambassador of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina, met with Kvesic, president of Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee, in Sarajevo Olympic Center a few days ago.
hypo: The translation of the given sentence in English is:  " Recently, the ambassador of China to Herzegovina, Qian Qiping, met with the president of Herzegovina, Cvetic at the奥林匹克中心 in萨拉热窝."

src: 会见时，克韦西奇积极评价波中关系并表示，他曾于2008年北京夏奥会之际访华，对中方出色的组织工作印象极为深刻，坚信中国有能力在特殊时期办好冬奥盛会；波方十分期待北京冬奥会，波黑奥委会正在积极组织参会；波方希望以此为契机，同中方在体育领域开展更为广泛的交流合作。
tgt: During the meeting, Kvesic spoke positively about the relationship between Bosnia and Herzegovina and China; when he visited China during the Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics, the excellent organization work of the Chinese left him with a deep impression, and he firmly believed that China is capable of hosting a successful Winter Olympics during a special time; Bosnia was looking forward to Beijing Winter Olympics, and Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee was actively organizing representatives to attend the Olympics; Bosnia and Herzegovina wished to take it as an opportunity to develop wider exchanges and cooperation with China in the sports field.
hypo: At the meeting，韦西奇 positively evaluated the relationship between China and Russia and stated that he had visited China during the Beijing Summer Olympics in 2008, where he had a very深刻印象 of the excellent organization work done by the Chinese. He believed that China had the ability to organize a successful Summer Olympics during special occasions. The Russian side is very keen on the Beijing Winter Olympics and the Russian Olympic Committee is actively organizing the participation. The Russian side hopes to take this opportunity to carry on more extensive exchange and cooperation with the Chinese side in the field of sports.

src: 季平表示，中波两国有着特殊的“奥运纽带 ” 。
tgt: According to Ji Ping, there is a special “Olympic bond” between China and Bosnia and Herzegovina.
hypo: Translation: Qianping said that China and Hong Kong have a special " Olympic bond."

src: 1984年萨拉热窝冬奥会在这里成功举办，再过两个月，2022年北京冬奥会也将拉开帷幕，将向世界呈现一场简约、安全、精彩的盛会。
tgt: Sarajevo Winter Olympics was held successfully here in 1984, and Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics will open in two months, showing a simple, safe and splendid event to the whole world.
hypo: The 1984 Sarajevo Winter Olympics have successfully concluded here, and just two months after that, the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics will begin, presenting a minimalist, secure, and thrilling event to the world.

src: 期待两国在冬季体育赛事筹备、运动员训练等方面深化交流合作，中国驻波黑使馆愿继续发挥桥梁作用，以北京冬奥会为契机，推动两国人文交流不断深化，让两国人民“一起向未来 ” ， 并祝波黑运动健儿在北京取得佳绩。
tgt: Both countries are expected to deepen exchanges and cooperation in terms of winter sports event preparation and athletes training, and the embassy of China in Bosnia and Herzegovina is willing to continue to serve as a bridge to promote exchanges in humanity between the two countries by taking Beijing Winter Olympics as the opportunity, so that the people of the two countries can “work together for a shared future”; the embassy wished that athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina could acquire good results in Beijing.
hypo: We look forward to deepening exchanges and cooperation between the two countries in various aspects such as the preparation of winter sports games, athlete training. The Chinese embassy in匈牙利 is willing to continue to play a bridge role, taking the Beijing Winter Olympics as an opportunity to promote further exchanges and cooperation between the two countries, let the people of both countries "work together towards the future", and wish the匈牙利 sports competitors in Beijing good results.

src: 会见前，波黑奥委会举办了“第十届年度最佳运动员”颁奖典礼，季平作为特邀嘉宾为波黑最佳青年运动员颁奖。
tgt: Before the meeting, Bosnia and Herzegovina Olympic Committee held the awards ceremony for “the 10th Best Athletes of the Year”, and Ji Ping awarded the prize for the best young athletes of Bosnia and Herzegovina as a special guest.
hypo: Before the meeting, the Bos Bosh Olympic Committee held the "Best Young Competitors of the 第十届" ceremony, and Dr. Tseng was a special guest to award the Best Young Competitors ofbosh to the best young athletes.

src: 活动现场循环播放北京冬奥会宣传视频。
tgt: The publicity video of Beijing Winter Olympics was played repeatedly on the site of the activity.
hypo: The promotional video for the Beijing Winter Olympics is循环播放 at the event.

src: 48小时核酸阴性、设“缓冲区 ” 国务院联防联控机制发文要求加强口岸城市疫情防控-新华网
tgt: Negative nucleic acid test result within 48 hours and setting up a "buffer zone", the State Council joint prevention and control mechanism issued a document to strengthen epidemic prevention and control in port cities - Xinhua News
hypo: The State Council's joint prevention and control mechanism requires the strengthening of port cities' epidemic prevention and control measures after obtaining negative results on COVID-19 tests for 48 hours.

src: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
tgt: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporters Dong Ruifeng, Gu Tiancheng) State Council joint prevention and control mechanism recently issued a notice about strengthening epidemic prevention and control of COVID-19 in port cities, asking people who recently left land border port cities (except those connected with ports of Hong Kong and Macao) to hold the negative result of nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who go to the land border port cities should take the nucleic acid test at least once after arrival.
hypo: The notice issued by the State Council's National epidemic prevention and control mechanism recently requires personnel leaving a land border crossing city within the past week (除外 those connected with Hong Kong and Macao) to obtain a negative test result within 48 hours, and to undergo at least one test after arrival in a land border crossing city.

src: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
tgt: According to the notice, the time range of the aforementioned request is from the date when the province, autonomous region and city determine the scope of port cities and announce it until March 15, 2022.
hypo: According to the notice, the time period mentioned above is from the date when the city scope of ports is determined and announced by each county and city and公告ized, to March 15, 2022.   Note: The words "city," "port," and "date" are included in this translation.

src: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
tgt: In addition, the notice also requests that port cities with the capability can study the possibility of setting up epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction.
hypo: Moreover, the notice proposes that符合条件的Port cities can study the implementation of epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within their jurisdiction.

src: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
tgt: According to the introduction of the person in charge of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission, for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main local economic pillar and the border residents from both sides have frequent exchanges.
hypo: According to the official of the Ministry of Health and Medical Care Prevention and Control Bureau, some border cities are the main local economic支柱， with frequent trade between the two sides' border residents.

src: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
tgt: The implementation of the policy of zoning and differentiated management is to make one defense line of the spread of prevention and control into two lines, make it possible to move the gateway forward, reduce the risk of the spread of the epidemic, and to achieve the maximum effectiveness of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost.
hypo: Implement分区差异化管理 policies, from one epidemic prevention barrier to two barriers, it is expected to achieve the shift of control points, reduce the risks of epidemic leakage, and achieve the maximum effectiveness in epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost.

src: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
tgt: Recently, there have been many local cluster outbreaks of diagnosed cases in China, all of which were imported from overseas through port cities.
hypo: The following sentence can be translated into English:  In recent times, there have been several local clusters of cases in our country, all of which have been imported from overseas through border cities.

src: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
tgt: The notice points out that this has exposed some problems, such as the untimely monitoring and warning of epidemic in some places, the non-existing implementation of closed-loop management of personnel in high-risk positions, regular nucleic acid testing becoming a mere formality, the inadequate disinfection and sterilization of cold-chain items in all links, the non-standard management of centralized quarantine sites, and the unscientific and inaccurate emergency response of epidemic situation.
hypo: The notice points out that this has exposed the lack of timely疫情 monitoring and预警， in violation of the闭环 management of high-risk positions, lack of regular DNA testing, ineffectiveness in the消杀 of冷 Chain of Command, inadequate management of cold chain items at all levels, inadequate management of centralized isolation facilities, and insufficient scientific and精准 handling of COVID-19 outbreak responses.

src: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
tgt: The notice requests that efforts should be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system and implementing border control measures, to speed up the improvement of the weak links in the prevention and control of port cities, deliver the prevention and control work scientifically, accurately and without relaxing, as well as to strengthen the defense line of curbing imported cases.
hypo: The notification requires focusing on 9 aspects, such as improving port city COVID-19 prevention and control mechanisms, strengthening the monitoring and warning systems, and implementing border control measures, to accelerate the filling of the shortfall and weak points in the prevention and control of port cities. We must not relax our efforts in prevention and control work without exception, and adopt科学知识 and精准方法 to effectively eliminate the risks of imported products. We should build a strong and robust outer defense line against the entry of imports.

src: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
tgt: The notice stresses that all port cities should study and deploy the epidemic prevention and control and safeguard people's livelihood at the same time, publish and monitor the smooth running of the people's livelihood hotline, regularly check the potential dangers in the supply and price of basic life necessities, and timely solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reflected by the masses.
hypo: The notification emphasizes that the cities at theborderland will jointly conduct research and deployment of epidemic prevention andmainframes maintenance work, publish and ensure the smooth flow of public safety Mainframes, regularly assess the early warning signs of basic life necessities supply and price, and promptly solve and respond to the key issues reported by the people's request.

src: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
tgt: According to the notice, the port cities mentioned include counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (areas, prefectures, leagues) and municipalities directly under the central government where the open land, water and air ports are located, and specific scope shall be determined and timely announced by the provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the central government) according to the demand of epidemic prevention and control.
hypo: According to the notice, the target cities mentioned refer to the county(city, district, flag) where the land, water, and air ports are open, the city(region, state, guild) where the city(city, department, association) is located, and the capital city. The specific scope will be determined and announced by each province(的区域、自治区、直辖市) according to the needs of epidemic prevention and control and will be communicated promptly.

src: 油管视频起底美军20年嗜血杀戮真相-新华网
tgt: YouTube video uncovers the truth of US army’s bloodthirsty killing of 20 years - Xinhuanet
hypo: YouTube video uncovers the truth about the美军's 20-year嗜血杀戮 habit - News.xinhuanet.com

src: （视频来源：油管）
tgt: (source of video: YouTube)
hypo: The video source is on YouTube.

src: 12月11日，油管平台一条名为《杀戮机器》的微纪录片引起广泛关注。
tgt: On December 11, a short documentary named Killing Machine went viral on YouTube.
hypo: On December 11th, a viral video titled "杀戮机器" on the YouTube platform caused widespread attention.

src: 该片讲述了美国以“反恐”为名发动阿富汗战争，通过战争强行输出美式民主，20年穷兵黩武、嗜血成性、滥杀无辜，犯下种种反人类罪行。
tgt: The documentary tells of various kinds of antihuman crimes committed by the US, including launching the war against Afghanistan in the name of “anti-terrorism”, outputting American democracy forcefully via wars, exhausting its resources to build up its military power, being obsessive about bloodthirsty killing, and massacring the innocent at will for 20 years.
hypo: The movie tells of the US launching the阿富汗 War under the name of "反恐"，强行 exporting American democracy through the war, becoming militarily aggressive for 20 years, becoming obsessed with blood and killing innocent people, and committing various anti- Humanity crimes.

src: 滥用无人机空袭医院、学校等民用场所，扭曲人性，成立杀人小组。
tgt: The US army launched air strikes to civil places such as hospitals and schools by abusing UAV, and established killing squad with distorting human nature.
hypo: The translation of the sentence is: misusing unmanned aerial vehicles to bomb hospitals, schools, and other civilian places, distorting human nature and forming杀人 squad.

src: 20年来，美军杀害了数万阿富汗无辜平民。
tgt: The US army has killed dozens of thousands of innocent Afghanistan civilians for 20 years.
hypo: Over the past 20 years, the US military has killed thousands of innocent Afghanistan civilians.

src: 美军设“黑狱”对“嫌犯”施加种种酷刑、人身羞辱。
tgt: The US army set up “black prison” to apply various cruel tortures and personal humiliation to “suspects”.
hypo: The US military has established "black sites" where they have施加 various forms of cruel torture on "Suspects."

src: 一桩桩反人类罪行激起更多阿富汗人的仇恨。
tgt: Countless antihuman crimes stirred up hatred from even more Afghan civilians.
hypo: A series of anti-human crimes stir up more hatred among the阿富汗 people.

src: 正如视频所说，美式“反恐”战争“越反越恐 ” 。
tgt: Just as what the video says, American anti-terrorism war “is creating more terrorism”.
hypo: As mentioned in the video, the American "反恐" war is "create more fear, create more hate."

src: 战争没有给阿富汗人民带去和平民主、繁荣希望，带去的只有满目疮痍的国家和无数的杀戮破坏。
tgt: The war did not bring peacefulness, democracy, prosperity or hope to Afghan people; instead, they threw the country in a state of devastation and countless killing and destruction.
hypo: The war has not brought peace, democracy, and prosperity to the people of阿富汗， but only a shattered country and countless destruction.

src: 戳视频，让我们一起来揭穿美国以“反恐”为名，嗜血杀戮的真相，戳穿美式民主的虚伪假面！
tgt: Let us click on the video and reveal the truth of bloodthirsty killing in the name of “anti-terrorism” of the US, and rip off the false mask of American democracy!
hypo: Click the video to come together and expose the lie of the US, named for "反恐" purposes, as a school of血腥杀戮，戳穿the虚伪的假面 of American democracy!

src: 不要把人吓倒在起跑线-新华网
tgt: Don’t scare people off at the starting line - Xinhuanet
hypo: Do not scare people into starting from the starting line.   Note: This translation includes the phrase "scare people".

src: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
tgt: We can usually feel the popularity of books on success when we go to bookstores.
hypo: When you go to bookstores, you often can feel the excitement of success学类书籍.

src: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
tgt: Many books on success nowadays advocate the “best principle”, which first assumes or implies that you can “do it”, and then tell you “what it is” that you need to do.
hypo: Many success学 books today promote the "best principle" -即首先假定或暗示你可以成功，然后再告诉你需要做到的事情是什么。

src: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
tgt: It skips the most important and fundamental link of “how to do it”.
hypo: "It means that you suddenly skip the most important and fundamental link：如何做到."

src: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
tgt: As such, these books have one common characteristic; you either work to be the best or do nothing at all; you either be 100 or be 0; you either climb on Mount Tai or stay where you are.
hypo: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。  因此，这些书的共同特点是：要么全力以赴地做到最好，要么就干脆什么都不会发生。它们要么达到100分，要么就停留在0分。要么你爬上泰山，要么就干脆待在原地。

src: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
tgt: The “best principle” will make every reader believe it is “absolutely right”, but 99% of people will be scared off at the starting line.
hypo: This "best principle" may be acknowledged by everyone as "perfectly right" but most people would be frightened away from it before they start.

src: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
tgt: Because this theory advocates a route in which “you have to be resolute to start again and change 180 degrees”, and this happens to be the weakest point of many people.
hypo: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。  The theory promotes a route of "making a tough decision, changing completely, and turning the page" that is, however, a crucial weakness for many people.

src: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
tgt: Shouting “you need to change” to people who stick to the rules, follow the old ways, and refuse to change is lying to yourself and casting pearls before swine.
hypo: If you refuse to change for someone who prefers the rules to stick to, instead of trying to make changes, it is clearly a case of being欺骗ing yourself and talking to the wall.

src: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
tgt: The majority of people will be timid in front of “change”, reluctant to move forward or make the decision; or, they have made the decision to “change” on an impulse and bravely taken the first step, but it doesn’t last long and they will lose courage after persevering for while; they cannot be persistent.
hypo: Most people will hesitate before the word "转变" and hesitate to make a decision. Or they may make a strong decision based on a sudden冲动 and take the first step, but it is often short-lived and they fall short of持续性.

src: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
tgt: From Tomorrow On, the famous sketch from Mr. Ma Sanli, most vividly depicts the classic of “common humanity”.
hypo: The famous sketch from tomorrow on by Mr. Ma三立 is the classic thatmost accurately embodies this common humanity.

src: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
tgt: The biggest problem of the “best principle” is the threshold is too high; it surpasses the limit of the ability of ordinary people and leave most people “sigh at the beginning”.
hypo: The biggest problem with the best principle is that it often goes beyond the limits of ordinary people's abilities and makes most people "look in a door and叹口气."

src: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
tgt: Or, the “second best principle” perhaps is a route for more ordinary people to be successful.
hypo: Perhaps, the "次好原则" is just one way to potentially lead more ordinary people to a relatively successful path.

src: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
tgt: The core of the “second best principle” is lowering the threshold; it encourages “accumulating small successes to have big success”; even if you cannot reach 100, you can be 1, because 1 is always bigger than 0; if you cannot climb on Mount Tai, you can climb on the small dune in front of your house, because that is still better than marching on the spot.
hypo: The core of the "次好原则" is "reduce the threshold" - it encourages the theory of " accumulated small victories to achieve great success". That is, if you cannot reach 100, doing 1 instead may be sufficient: because 1 always exceeds 0. Similarly, if you cannot climb to the top of the mountain, doing just the small sandy dunes at your家门口 may be acceptable, as it is better than staying where you are.

src: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
tgt: Anyway, doing anything is better than doing nothing at all.
hypo: "总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。"的英语翻译是：In any case, doing anything is better than not doing anything.

src: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
tgt: Due to the dramatic lowering of the threshold, the possibility of ordinary people persevering with it is higher; the success rate will be higher for anything as long as you persevere,
hypo: Due to the significant reduction in the threshold, there is more likelihood for ordinary people to persevere, and只要我坚持不懈，成功的概率也会增加。  You can also translate it as:  Since the threshold has been significantly reduced, there is more likelihood for ordinary people to persevere, and as long as they continue to persevere, the probability of success also increases.

src: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
tgt: It’s just that the journey will be longer if you follow the “second best principle”.
hypo: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已的英语翻译是：The path to success only takes a bit longer when following the "次的好的" principle.

src: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
tgt: In all, although the “best principle” on the surface claims to make everyone successful, it will eventually only encourage few people in actuality; the “second best principle” can effectively encourage more people and make more people actually gain benefit.
hypo: In summary, while the "best principle" may claim to encourage everyone, ultimately it is only a small minority that it can effectively激励. On the other hand, the "次好 principle" can effectively encourage a larger number of people and maximize their benefits.

src: 青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年增加0.71万吨-新华网
tgt: The reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in the Qinghai Lake have increased by 7.1 thousand tons - Xinhuanet
hypo: The total resource catch of raw fish in the Qinghai-Tibet Lake has increase by 710,000 tons this year, according to news reports fromXinhuanet.

src: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
tgt: Report from Xinhua News Agency Xining on December 11 (Reporters Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters learned from the Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province that the latest monitoring results showed that the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources increased by 7,100 tons this year compared with the previous year, reaching 108,500 tons; there is a cumulative increase of more than 40 times compared with that in the initial stage of protection in 2002.
hypo: 新华社西宁12月11日电(记者骆晓飞、张宏祥)记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，今年比上年增加0.71万吨，达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。  The latest monitoring results show that the resource catch ofgymnocypris przewalskii this year has increased by 710,000 tons compared with the previous year, reaching 1,085,000 tons. Compared with the early stage of protection in 2002, the catch has increased by more than 40 times total.

src: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
tgt: Gymnocypris przewalskii, commonly known as “scaleless carp”, is a unique and precious fish species in the Qinghai Lake, which plays an indispensable role in maintaining the safety and biodiversity of the “water, fish, bird” ecological chain in Qinghai Lake Basin.
hypo: The common name of the Chinese lake's whitebait, Qianqian fish, is "Huangtu fish". This precious fish is unique to the Qianqian Lake and plays a crucial role in maintaining the "water-fish-owl" ecosystem链 in the lake's ecosystem and its safety and biodiversity.

src: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
tgt: In the 1960s and 1970s, the number of gymnocypris przewalskii has decreased sharply due to the human hunting in vast quantities and the increasingly degraded environment of breeding waters of gymnocypris przewalskii, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in Qinghai Lake in 2002 were only 2,592 tons.
hypo: The Gymnocypris przewalskii数量在20世纪60和70年代锐减，受到人为大量捕杀、繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素的影响。2002年，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。

src: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
tgt: In 2004, gymnocypris przewalskii was listed as an endangered species in the Red List of Chinese Species.
hypo: The Chinese species, gymnocypris przewalskii, was listed as endangered in the Red List of Chinese物种 in 2004.

src: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
tgt: From 2003, Qinghai province implemented the closure of lakes for fish breeding, prohibited any unit, collective or individual from fishing gymnocypris przewalskii in the main rivers and tributaries in the lake area, and prohibited the sale of gymnocypris przewalskii and their products.
hypo: Since 2003, Qinghai Province has implemented the policy of封湖育鱼， which prohibits any unit, group, or individual from fishing raw鲤 and its products in the Great Lake and the main rivers and branches of the lake.

src: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
tgt: In the meantime, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources have increased year by year through artificial breeding and releasing, clearing of the main rivers flowing into Qinghai Lake and river courses, designing scientific and reasonable “fish passage” and other measures to continue to strengthen protection.
hypo: Meanwhile, by implementing measures such as artificial procreation and releases, as well as clearing the main waterway of the青海湖's lakeside rivers and designing科学合理 "fish passage" through measures, the amount of细毛鲽 (floccinaucinihilipilification) resources in the青海湖 has been continuously increasing year by year.

src: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。
tgt: Yang Lin, Deputy Director General of Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, introduced that up until now, nearly 180 million gymnocypris przewalskii have been artificially reproduced and released, contributing more than 23% to the recovery of gymnocypris przewalskii resources.
hypo: Translation: As of now, Yang Lin, as the vice president of the State Council's Department of农业 and农村发展， has said that since then, over 180 million fish have been人工增殖放流ed into the青海湖 system, with a contribution rate of more than 23% to the recovery of the gymnocypris fish resources in the青海湖 system.

src: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。
tgt: Qinghai three-rivers area is an important ecological barrier and water conservation area in China and even Asia, and Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function area to control the eastward spread of desertification in the west.
