hypo: The Three rivers Area in Qinghai is an important ecological barrier and source of water conservation for China and even Asia.青海湖 is a natural barrier and ecological functional area controlling the extension of desertification in the western part of China.

src: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。
tgt: In order to protect the ecological environment of the three rivers area and the waters of Qinghai Lake, protect aquatic wildlife, and maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, Qinghai has issued a notice banning fishing in the key waters of the Yangtze River, the Yellow River, and Qinghai Lake since this year, and established a comprehensive management system of fishing ban of “one river, one river, and one lake”.
hypo: To protect the ecological environment and wildlife in the Three rivers' area and Qinghai Lake waters, to maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, and to implement a comprehensive fishing ban management system, from this month ago, Qinghai has先后 issued禁捕 notices for the key waters of the Yangtze River, Yellow River, and Qinghai Lake.

src: 第十三届省茶博会开幕 - 视点头条 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
tgt: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo opened - Headline of viewpoints - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online
hypo: The第十三届湖南省茶叶博览会 has opened - Watch top news - 湖南日报网 - Huasheng Online

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 张尚武 胡盼盼 通讯员 刘晓玲 摄影 李健）今天上午，第十三届湖南茶业博览会暨新化红茶推介会在湖南国际会展中心举行，展示茶产业，创新茶科技，弘扬茶文化，加快冲刺千亿茶产业目标。
tgt: Message from Hunan Daily on December 10 (all-media journalists: Zhang Shangwu and Hu Panpan, correspondent: Liu Xiaoling, photographer: Li Jian) The 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and Xinhua Black Tea Introduction and Marketing Event were held in Hunan International Expo Center this morning to exhibit tea industry, innovate tea science and technology, advocate tea culture and accelerate the process of realizing the industry objective of 100 billion.
hypo: The following is the English translation of the given sentence:  "The press release from Hunan Daily (张尚武， press representative; 胡盼盼， communication representative; 刘晓玲， photography; 李健) on December 10th, this morning, the 13th Hunan tea industry exhibition and exhibition promoting conference and New化红茶 development agency were held at the Hunan International Conference Center. The purpose of the event was to showcase the tea industry, innovate tea technology, promote tea culture, and accelerate the pursuit of the 100 billion-strong tea industry objective."

src: 中华全国供销合作总社理事会副主任侯顺利、省人大常委会副主任叶红专出席开幕式。
tgt: Hou Shunli, deputy director of the Council of China National Supply and Marketing Cooperative Head Office, and Ye Hongzhuan, deputy director of the Standing Committee of Provincial People’s Congress, attended the opening ceremony.
hypo: The vice chairs of the National Congress of the Communist Party of China, Hyo Jin-pyo, and the vice director of the state-level government agency, Ye Hong-jin, attended the opening ceremony.

src: 中国工程院院士刘仲华教授在开幕式上隆重推介：湖红之源在新化，红茶崛起为“五彩湘茶”注入新动力。
tgt: Professor Liu Zhonghua, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, introduced at the opening ceremony: Xinhua is the source of Hunan Black Tea, and the emerging of the black tea injects new energy into the “colorful Hunan tea”.
hypo: The Chinese Academy of Engineering's Dr. Liu Zhonghua highlighted during the opening ceremony that the origin of the湖红 is in new化， and the rising popularity of Chinese红茶 as "五彩 Nanshan tea" injects new momentum.

src: 近年来，省委、省政府大力支持茶产业发展，推进千亿湘茶产业建设，形成“三湘四水五彩茶”的发展格局。
tgt: In recent years, the provincial Party committee and the provincial government have vigorously supported the development of the tea industry, promoted the construction of the Hunan tea industry of 100 billion and formed the development pattern of “three Xiang, four rivers, and five colors of tea”.
hypo: In recent years, the provincial government and the central government have strongly supported the development of the tea industry, and have worked to advance the construction of a 100 billion Qingdao tea industry. This has led to the formation of a development pattern of "three Qingdao, four rivers, and colorful tea."

src: 省内茶界加大创新，绿茶、黑茶、红茶等主力茶类轮番发力，主产茶区推进茶旅融合，带动广大茶农增收。
tgt: The tea industry of the province has been promoting innovation, and main tea types such as green tea and black tea take turns to generate power; tea-travel integration is promoted in main tea production areas to drive income increase of tea farmers.
hypo: The tea industry in the inside state is increasing in innovation, and the main tea varieties such as green tea, black tea, and red tea are轮流 taking off. The main tea-producing areas are promoting tea tourism integration, thereby helping to increase revenue for a large number of tea farmers.

src: 风水轮流转，红茶又发力。
tgt: Every type of tea takes turns to gain its spotlight, and now it is time for black tea.
hypo: The轮流转， tea is back in action.

src: 省内茶界专家称，采完绿茶采红茶、黑茶，茶农一年四季有收入，茶园产值直线上升。
tgt: According to opinion of experts in the tea industry in the province, tea farmers pick black tea after green tea and have income in all four seasons, making the  production value of tea gardens soar.
hypo: According to experts in the domestic tea industry, after harvesting green tea, the tea farmers can continue to sell black tea, brown tea, and other types of tea throughout the year. As a result, the value of tea gardens increases rapidly.

src: 在开幕式上，省领导为第四批获权使用“湖南红茶”商标的企业进行授牌，新化喜捧“湖红之源 ” 。
tgt: At the opening ceremony, provincial leaders awarded plates to the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the trademark of “Hunan black tea”, and Xinhua was awarded the title of “source of Hunan black tea”.
hypo: At the opening ceremony, local leaders awarded牌 to the fourth group of enterprises authorized to use the trademark "Hunan red tea". New烧开 delighted to cherish the "湖红之源".

src: 在新化红茶展馆，福建茶商看中一款名为“冰里春”的高山茶，当即下订单。
tgt: In the exhibition hall of Xinhua black tea, a tea merchant from Fujian took a fancy to a high mountain tea named “spring in ice” and placed an order immediately.
hypo: At the Newifying Green Tea exhibit, an Fujian tea merchant spotted a high-quality green tea named "Icey Spring" and immediately placed an order.

src: 省茶业协会秘书长王准高兴地说，当前疫情等因素或多或少影响茶叶市场，但从茶博会现场看，亮点纷呈。
tgt: Wang Zhun, secretary-general of provincial tea association, said happily that factors such as epidemic exert an impact on the tea market to a certain extent; however, based on the situations at the tea expo, there are various highlights.
hypo: The Secretary-General of the State-owned tea industry association, Wang Qing, happily said that various factors, including the current pandemic, affect the tea market to some extent. However, from the perspective of the tea fair, there are numerous highlights.

src: 新化红茶一抹红，注入了茶文化内涵，人气旺、交易火，湘茶产业喜迎新的春天。
tgt: The red color of Xinhua black tea has instilled the essence of tea culture, and with its popularity and hot transactions, the Hunan tea industry is ushering in a new spring.
hypo: A bright red Chinese tea black, a new addition to the cultural connotation of tea, with high demand and bustling transactions, the Xiangxi tea industry喜迎s a new spring.

src: 中沙策展人携手举办沙特首届当代艺术双年展-新华网
tgt: Exhibition planners of China and Saudi Arabia work together to hold the first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia - Xinhuanet
hypo: The exhibition planners from Zhong莎 are partnering to host the first双年展 of contemporary art in Saudi Arabia.

src: 新华社利雅得12月12日电（记者王海洲 胡冠）沙特阿拉伯首届当代艺术双年展 — — 迪里耶当代艺术双年展，于11日在位于沙特首都利雅得西北部的迪里耶JAX艺术区正式向公众开放，共有来自沙特、中国等地的64位艺术家参展。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Riyadh on December 12 (journalists: Wang Haizhou and Hu Guan): The first contemporary art biennale of Saudi Arabia, Diriyah contemporary art biennale, was officially opened to the public in the JAX arts district of Diriyah in the northwest of Riyadh, the capital of Saudi Arabia, on December 11, and a total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia, China and other countries and regions participated in the exhibition.
hypo: On December 12, 2021，新华社利雅得 (Xiao Hongzhou and Hu冠) announced the official opening of the first双年展 of contemporary art in沙特阿拉伯， the Diriyah contemporary art双年展， which took place in the DiriyahJAX art district, located in the western part of the capital city of沙特阿拉伯，利雅得， on November 11th. The exhibition featured 64 artists from沙特阿拉伯， China, and other countries.

src: 本次双年展由沙特迪里耶双年展基金会和中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心联合策划，中国UCCA尤伦斯当代艺术中心馆长田霏宇担任艺术总监。
tgt: The biennale is planned jointly by Diriyah biennale foundation of Saudi Arabia and UCCA of China, and Tian Feiyu, curator of UCCA of China, works as the art director.
hypo: The biennial exhibition was jointly策划 by the Diriyah Biennial Development Foundation and the UCCA Art Center of China. The director of art was Tingfei Tian.

src: 据策展团队介绍，本次双年展的主题为“摸着石头过河 ” ， 隐喻社会经济转型时期所采取的改革策略，也反映沙特社会文化发展的当下境遇。
tgt: According to the introduction from the planning team, the theme of the biennale is “crossing the river by feeling the stones”, which is a metaphor of the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transition period and reflects the current situations of social and cultural development in Saudi Arabia.
hypo: According to the program team, the theme of this biennial exhibition is "摸着石头过河" which隐喻ed the reform strategies adopted during the period of social economic transformation and also reflects the current situation of the development of society and culture in Saudi Arabia in the biennale.

src: 本次双年展占地近12000平方米，展厅横跨六个相互连接的建筑，以六个单元呈现 ： 《 摸着石头过河 》 《 传承作为实验 》 《 边缘思考 》 《 走向公众 》 《 美丽新世界》以及《论艺术的精神 》 。
tgt: The biennale occupies an area of nearly twelve thousand square meters, and the exhibition hall stretches across six connected buildings with six units: Crossing the River by Feeling the Stones, Inheritance as an Experiment, Thinking at the Edge, Walking to the Public, Beautiful New Word and On the Spirit of Arts.
hypo: The biennale occupy近 12,000 square meters of land. The exhibition hall spans six相互连接 buildings and is presented in six sections: "摸着摸着过河" "传承作为实验" "边缘思考" "走向公众" "美丽新世界" and "论艺术的精神".

src: 其中，27位沙特艺术家的作品数量占本次展品总量的四成以上，囊括绘画、装置艺术和表演艺术等多种形式；12位中国艺术家的作品同样备受关注，有的艺术家以新颖的方式使用回收材料进行创作，例如徐冰在《背后的故事系列之溪山无尽图 》 （ 2014）中，用废弃物重构了一幅经典山水画。
tgt: In which the number of the works of the 27 artists from Saudi Arabia accounts for more than 40% of the total number of the exhibits, including various art forms such as drawing, installation art and performing art; the works of the 12 Chinese artists also attracted much attention, and some artists create with recycled materials in an innovative way; for example, Xu Bing reconstructed a classic landscape painting with wastes in Behind the Story Series, Picture of Endless Streams and Mountains (2014).
hypo: Among these 27 Saudi artists, the number of works represents more than fourty per cent of the total quantity of exhibits, covering various forms such as painting, installations, and performance art. Similarly, the works of 12 Chinese artists are of great interest, with some artists using recycled materials in innovative ways to create their works, as seen in the Endless Streams series by Xu Bing, where he reconfigureds a classic Chinese landscape painting using waste materials.

src: 迪里耶双年展基金会首席执行官巴克利表示，希望本届双年展能够建立国际对话，让全球观众有机会了解沙特蓬勃发展的文化产业和创意社区，加强互动往来。
tgt: According to Buckley, CEO of Diriyah biennale foundation, it is hoped that the biennale can establish an international dialogue, provide global audiences with opportunities to understand the vigorously developed culture industry and innovative communities in Saudi Arabia, and strengthen interactions.
hypo: The首席执行官 of the迪里耶双年展 foundation，巴克利， expressed hope that the this year's双年展 could establish international dialogue, allowing global audiences to have the opportunity to learn about the thriving cultural industry and creative community in Saudi Arabia, and strengthening interaction and exchange.

src: 田霏宇说 ： “ 双年展的目标是双重的，既能让沙特当代艺术参与全球对话，也能让沙特观众融入当代艺术世界 。 ”
tgt: Tian Feiyu said, “The biennale has two objectives, i.e., establishing dialogue between contemporary art of Saudi Arabia and the world, and integrating audiences of Saudi Arabia into the contemporary art world.”
hypo: 田霏宇说："The goal of the biennial is dual, allowing contemporary art in Saudi Arabia to participate in global dialogue and also enabling Saudi audiences to integrate into the world of contemporary art."

src: 据了解，在双年展开幕周期间还将举办系列讲座，艺术家、策展人和创意行业的意见领袖将就跨文化交流、当代艺术发展等主题展开讨论。
tgt: It is understood that there will be a series of lectures during the biennale, and artists, exhibition planners and leaders of innovative industries will engage in discussions on cross-cultural communication, contemporary art development and other topics.
hypo: I am aware that a series of lectures will also be held during the opening week of the biennial exhibition, where influential leaders in the innovative industries, art conservation, and contemporary art development will discuss themes such as cross-cultural communication, the development of contemporary art.

src: 云南：统筹规范乡村公益性岗位管理-新华网
tgt: Yunnan: Coordinate and standardize management of rural public welfare posts - Xinhuanet
hypo: Yunnan: coordinates and规范 rural public-quality labor management through新华网

src: 新华社昆明12月12日电（记者林碧锋）为持续做好脱贫人口就业帮扶，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，云南省日前出台促进乡村振兴乡村公益性岗位管理相关政策，助力全面推进乡村振兴。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Kunming on December 12 (journalist: Lin Bifeng): In order to continue to provide assistance to the employment of people lifted out of poverty, consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation work, Yunnan Province has released policies on the management of public welfare position in villages for promoting rural revitalization, as a way to comprehensively promote rural revitalization.
hypo: The New York Times, December 12, 2023 (记者oniaonia) - In a move to maintain and expand the achievements of rural poverty Alleviation, the Chinese People's Liberation Army Corps has recently introduced related policies to promote rural公益性岗位 management, thereby supporting the comprehensive advancement of rural revitalization.

src: 云南省人社厅有关负责人介绍，目前，云南共开发44.83万个乡村公益性岗位，用于安置脱贫劳动力等农村困难群体就业，在帮助脱贫群众实现就业增收、巩固脱贫攻坚成果、有效提升乡村各项公共服务能力等方面发挥重要作用。
tgt: As introduced by person-in-charge of Department of Human Resources and Social Security of Yunnan, a total of 448.3 thousand rural public welfare positions have been developed in Yunnan to solve the employment of rural groups with difficulties such as labor force lifted out of poverty; they play an important role in helping people lifted out of poverty obtain employment and increase income, consolidating achievements of poverty relief and effectively improving rural public service abilities.
hypo: According to the person-in-charge of the People's Government Department of Wuxi, there are currently 44,830 village social assistance positions being developed in Wuxi to settle rural difficulties such as poverty-stricken labor force, which play a significant role in helping the poverty alleviation community achieve employment增收， strengthen the effectiveness of poverty reduction and effectively improving the capacity of village public service functions.

src: 此次新规由云南人社、乡村振兴、财政等七部门联合印发，主要对基层招聘乡村公益性岗位人员的对象范围、资金管理、岗位开发、岗位管理等方面进行统一规范。
tgt: The new regulation is jointly printed and issued by seven departments such as the Department of Human Resources and Social Security, Rural Revitalization and Department of Finance of Yunnan, which mainly provides unified regulations on object scope, fund management, post development and post management of applicants of rural public welfare positions.
hypo: This new regulation was issued by seven departments including the Qingxiu Rural Development Administration, Social Development Administration, and Finance, which mainly establish unified norms for the scope of recruitment of rural public service positions, resource management, position development, and position management.

src: 在岗位开发设置方面，新规明确，按照“按需设岗、以岗定人、动态管理、总量控制 ” “ 谁开发、谁使用、谁负责”及“一人一岗、自愿公开、统一管理”的原则进行设置。
tgt: In terms of position development and setting, it is clearly stipulated in the new regulation that the positions are set according to the principles of “setting positions according to demands, designating personnel according to positions, dynamic management and total quantity control”, “the unit that develops and utilizes the positions shall be responsible for them” and “one position with one person, voluntariness, publicity and unified management”
hypo: In the area of job development and setting, the new policy specifies that job settings are established based on "on-the-job training, job-based allocation, dynamic management, and total control of resources," "who develops, who uses, and who is responsible," and "one job, one allocation, voluntary disclosure, and unified management."

src: 招聘程序必须按照公告、申报、审核、公示、聘用、岗前培训及安排上岗等步骤进行。
tgt: The recruitment procedures must be conducted in accordance the steps of announcement, application, review, making public notice, employment, pre-job training and taking up the post.
hypo: The recruitment process must follow the steps of announcement, declaration, evaluation，公示， employment, pre-job training, and arrangement for employment.

src: 此外，新规还明确了乡村公益性岗位主要开发部门的具体职责、乡村公益性岗位的补贴标准和补贴方式，规定各乡村公益性岗位开发部门应为乡村公益性岗位安置人员购买意外伤害商业保险；要求有关部门定期对乡村公益性岗位补贴发放情况进行监督。
tgt: In addition, the new regulation also specifies the specific duties of the main development department as well as the subsidy standard and method of the rural public welfare positions; it is stipulated that the development departments of rural public welfare positions shall purchase accidental injury commercial insurance for people taking rural public welfare positions; responsible departments are required to regularly supervise the subsidy distribution of rural public welfare positions.
hypo: In addition, the new regulation also specifies the specific roles and responsibilities of the main development departments for rural ecological benefit positions, the application standards and benefits systems for rural ecological benefit positions, and requires each rural ecological benefit position development department to purchase basic insurance for personnel placement in rural ecological benefit positions. The new regulation also requires relevant departments to monitor the distribution of benefits for rural ecological benefit positions on a regular basis.

src: 毛里求斯等国首次发现奥密克戎毒株感染病例-新华网
tgt: Omicron strain infection cases were found in Mauritius and other countries for the first time - Xinhuanet
hypo: The first cases of Omicron-related infection are found in countries like Morocco, according to Xinhuanet.

src: 新华社北京12月12日电 综合新华社驻外记者报道：毛里求斯、塞浦路斯和马拉维近日首次报告发现新冠变异病毒奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 12, reported by foreign corespondent of comprehensive Xinhua News Agency: Mauritius, Cyprus and Malawi recently reported to have found the infection cases of Omicron strains, the new COVID-19 variant, for the first time.
hypo: According to a report by photo taken by新华社's foreign press section on December 12, Malawi, Cyprus, and Malawi have recently reported the first cases of infection with the novel coronavirus variant Omicron.

src: 毛里求斯10日首次报告该国两例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: Mauritius reported two infection cases of Omicron strains on December 10 for the first time.
hypo: Mauritania reported for the first time on October 10th two cases of Omicron variant infection in the country.

src: 据毛卫生部长凯莱什·贾古特帕尔介绍，一名感染者为自南非出发于11月27日抵达毛里求斯的游客；另一名感染者为毛里求斯本地居民，他与一名近期曾前往南非后返回的人员接触后，于11月30日核酸检测呈阳性。
tgt: According to introduction from Kelesh Jagutpal, Minister of Ministry of Health of Mauritius, one of the infected people was a tourist departing from South Africa and arriving in Mauritius on November 27; the other infected person was a local resident of Mauritius, who was tested positive in nucleic acid test on November 30 after contacting a person who returned from South Africa.
hypo: According to the Ministry of Health of Mauritius, one of the感染者 arrived in Mauritius from South Africa on November 27th. Another感染者 is a local resident of Mauritius who had contact with an individual who recently traveled to South Africa and returned, and became Positive for COVID-19 on November 30th.

src: 经医院隔离治疗后，这两名感染者核酸检测结果均转为阴性，目前已返回各自的居住地。
tgt: The nucleic acid test results of the two infected people changed to negative after quarantine and receiving treatment in the hospital, and now they have returned to their own respective residence.
hypo: After being treated in a hospital, the tests for the two infected individuals have all turned negative and they have recently returned to their respective homes.

src: 塞浦路斯卫生部10日宣布该国首次确诊3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: It was announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that the country confirmed three cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.
hypo: It announced that 3 cases of Omicron strain had been confirmed in the country for the first time.

src: 这3人都是学生，本月初从国外旅行回来，由于均为轻症，并未入院治疗。
tgt: All of the 3 infected people were students who came back after traveling in other countries at the beginning of this month; all of them were not hospitalized because they were mild cases.
hypo: These three people are students who returned from abroad this月初. As they are all轻微病情， they did not seek medical treatment in the hospital.

src: 为防范奥密克戎毒株蔓延，塞政府不断加大防控力度。
tgt: In order to prevent the spreading of the Omicron strains, the government of Cyprus kept strengthening the prevention and control.
hypo: To prevent the spread of the Omicron strain, the government of Singapore has been scaling up its prevention efforts.

src: 从12月6日到明年1月10日，乘飞机入境的12岁以上旅客抵塞后都需自费在机场接受核酸检测。
tgt: All the passengers above 12 years old who enter the country by plane shall take nucleic acid test at their own expenses at the airport from December 6 to January 10 next year.
hypo: From December 6th to January 10th next year, any旅客 aged 12 or above who enter the country by air must pay for a blood test at the airport after arrival.

src: 塞卫生部10日还宣布，将开始为该国5岁至11岁的儿童接种辉瑞新冠疫苗。
tgt: It was also announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that they would start inoculate children from 5 to 11 years old in the country with Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.
hypo: The Philippine Health Department on October 10th announced that it would begin接种Pfizer COVID-19 vaccines for children aged 5 to 11 in the country.

src: 马拉维卫生部长昆比泽·奇蓬达9日说，该国首次发现3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
tgt: Kunbizze Chiponda, Minister of Ministry of Health of Malawi, said on December 9 that Malawi found 3 cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.
hypo: The President of Malawi, Kweli Xanana Ach Ach Ach Ach Ach, said on September 9 that the country had discovered three cases of Omicron variant infection for the first time.

src: 该国卫生部门对从11月9日至12月2日采集的12个新冠阳性样本开展基因组测序，发现了这3例感染病例。
tgt: The Department of Health of Malawi conducted genomic sequencing for 12 COVID-19 positive samples collected from November 9 to December 2 and found the 3 cases of infection.
hypo: The Department of Health of the country conducted genomic sequencing on 12新冠阳性样本 collected from November 9 to December 2, and found three infected cases.

src: 星空有约丨双子座流星雨14日迎来极大-新华网
tgt: Rendezvous with the starry sky | Geminid meteor shower will usher in the maximum scale on December 14 - Xinhuanet
hypo: "星空有约丨双子座流星雨14日迎来极大-新华网"的英文翻译为： "The stars have a bond | Thegemini流星雨 will occur on April 14th with its largest amplitude-Xinhuanet."

src: 新华社天津12月12日电（记者周润健）天文科普专家介绍，作为本年度最后一场大规模流星雨，北半球三大流星雨之一的双子座流星雨将在12月14日迎来极大，喜欢流星雨的朋友可在当日后半夜进行观测。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Tianjin on December 12 (journalist: Zhou Runjian) According to introduction from astronomy science popularization expert, as the final large-scale meteor shower this year, the geminid meteor shower as one of the three major meteor showers in the Northern Hemisphere will be the maximum on December 14, and people who like meteor showers can observe during the latter half of the night on that day.
hypo: The World Press Club of天津， on December 12th, informed us that as the final large-scale meteor shower of the year, the双子座流星雨， one of the three major流星雨s in the Northern Hemisphere, will reach its maximum on December 14th. Interested viewers can observe it in the late evening after the moon goes down.

src: 北京市天文爱好者安久2018年12月13日在青海拍摄的双子座流星雨。
tgt: Photo of geminid meteor shower shot on December 13, 2018 in Qinghai by An Jiu, a lover of astronomy from Beijing.
hypo: The sentence in English翻译 is：安久， a astronomy enthusiast from Beijing, captured the Bilinear流星雨 on December 13, 2018, in Qinghai.

src: 大部分流星雨的母天体都是周期彗星，但双子座流星雨的母天体却是3200号小行星法厄同，这是一颗阿波罗型小行星。
tgt: The parent object of most of the meteor showers are periodic comets; however, the parent object of the geminid meteor showers is Phaethon, No. 3200 asteroid, which is also an Apollo type asteroid.
hypo: The parent object of most流星雨 is a comet, but the parent object of the双子座流星雨 is 3200 Fast, a阿波罗-type小行星.

src: 双子座流星雨也是目前已知第二个不是由彗星“孕育”的流星雨。
tgt: The geminid meteor shower is the second known meteor shower that is not “bred” by comets so far.
hypo: The双子座流星雨 is also the second known流星雨 that is not "孕育ed" by彗星.

src: 天津市天文学会理事、天文科普专家修立鹏介绍说，就如贺岁大片一样，双子座流星雨一般在岁末出现 ， “ 上映档期”可以从12月4日持续到17日。
tgt: According to introduction from Xiu Lipeng, a member of the Council of Tianjin Astronomy Society and an expert of astronomical science popularization, just like a new year blockbuster, geminid meteor shower generally occurs at the end of a year, with the “screening time” lasting from December 4 to December 17.
hypo: According to Lipeng, just like a贺岁 movie, the Double Star clusters usually appear at the end of the year, and the "release date" can range from December 4th to 17th.

src: 该流星雨以流量大且稳定著称，与象限仪流星雨、英仙座流星雨一起被称为北半球三大流星雨。
tgt: The geminid meteor shower is known for its ample flow and stabilization, which is called together with the Quadrantal meteor shower and the Perseids meteor shower as the three major meteor showers of the Northern Hemisphere.
hypo: The流星雨 is known for its large流量 and stability, and together with the Orion流星雨 and the Orionids, it is considered one of the three major流星雨 in the North American continent.

src: 双子座流星雨的一个显著特点是流星体速度较慢，色彩丰富，火流星也不少，既适合目视，也适合天文摄影的初学者进行拍摄。
tgt: A significant characteristic of the geminid meteor shower is the slow speed of the meteoroid, the abundant colors and the large number of fireballs, which is suitable for both visual observation and shooting by beginners of astronomical photography.
hypo: The remarkable feature of the双子座流星雨 is its slow speed, rich color, and numerous fire流星. It is suitable for beginners of目 and天文 photography to capture images.

src: 天津市天文爱好者杨婧2020年12月13日在天津蓟州拍摄的双子座流星雨。
tgt: This is the photo of geminid meteor shower shot on December 13, 2020 in Qinghai by Yang Jing, a lover of astronomy from Tianjin.
hypo: The sentence in English translation is: " Yang Jing, a astronomy enthusiast from TianJin，摄于 天津蓟州 on December 13, 2020, during the双子座流星雨."

src: 天文预报显示，今年的双子座流星雨将于12月14日15时左右迎来极大，极大时ZHR（在理想观测条件下，辐射点位于头顶正上方时，每小时能看到的流星数量）为150。
tgt: Based on astronomical forecast, the geminid meteor shower this year will be reach its maximum scale at about 15:00 on December 14, and the ZHR at the maximum (in the ideal observation conditions, when the radiation point is right above the head, and the number of the meteors that can be seen every hour) is 150.
hypo: Astronomical forecast shows that the双子座流星雨 of this year will occur around 15:00 on December 14th, with a maximum scale of 150 (the number of流星 that can be seen per hour under ideal观测 conditions, when the流星雨 occurs above the head).

src: 双子座流星雨推荐指数图。
tgt: Chart of index of recommendation level of the geminid meteor shower.
hypo: "双子座流星雨推荐指数图"的英文翻译为 "双子座流星雨 recommended scale chart"。

src: “去年 ， ‘ 落英缤纷’的双子座流星雨给人们留下了深刻印象，但今年的双子座流星雨会受到月光干扰，精彩程度会打一点折扣。
tgt: “Last year, people were impressed by the geminid meteor shower; however, the geminid meteor shower this year will be influenced by moon light, and its brilliance will be slightly influenced.
hypo: Last year, the 'decisive meteor shower' of the双子座 left a deep impression on people. However, this year's双子座流星雨 will be affected by moonlight, and its quality will be reduced slightly.

src: 14日为农历十一月十一，月相为盈凸月，明亮的月光会对观测造成干扰，好在后半夜月亮就会落下，此时双子座流星雨的辐射点也会升得比较高。
tgt: December 14 is November 11 in Chinese calendar, with the moon in the gibbous phase; the bright moonlight will interfere with the observation; fortunately, the moon will go down in the latter half of the night, and the radiation point of the geminid meteor shower will rise higher.
hypo: The day of February 14th falls under the lunar calendar, with a full moon. The moonlight will interfere with观测， but Fortunately, the moon will go down towards the end of the night, and the starry node of the双子座 will rise higher during this time.

src: 喜欢流星雨的朋友可在后半夜月落后的这几个小时进行观测，但要注意防寒保暖 。 ”
tgt: People who like meteor showers can observe it in the hours after moon goes down in the latter half of the night, but remember to stay warm.”
hypo: "If you are friends who enjoy meteor showers, you can观测 them in the late evening during the latter part of the night, but be careful to stay warm and cover your body."

src: 如何才能尽可能地观测到更多的流星呢？
tgt: How to observe as many meteors as possible?
hypo: "How to observe流星 in as many places as possible?"

src: “不建议在城市进行观测，可以在郊区或是乡村选择一个海拔高、光害小、面向东北方向的视野开阔之处，然后耐心地等到月亮落下后，目视观测即可。
tgt: “It is not advised to observe meteor showers in the city; you may choose a place facing northeast and has high altitude, a wide view and little light pollution, and then you may observe with your eyes after the moon goes down.
hypo: "We are not recommended to perform observation in the city. You can choose a high-altitude, less-lit, and wide-field view with a north-south orientation in the outskirts or rural areas.耐心地等到晚上月亮落下后， you can observe visually."

src: 需要注意的是，双子座流星雨朝各个方向的流量都很大，观测时不用一直盯着双子座流星雨的辐射点看。
tgt: It should be noted that the geminid meteor shower will have heavy flows on all directions, and you do not need to keep staring the radiation point of the geminid meteor shower.
hypo: Here's the English translation for you:  It's important to note that the流量 of the彗星 shower in the双子座 is very large, and you don't need to keep staring at the radiation point of the彗星 shower all the time when观测.

src: 喜欢摄影的朋友要想拍摄出绚丽的‘流星雨大片 ’ ， 最好选择广角、大光圈的镜头，拍摄时使用高ISO和最大光圈。
tgt: People who like photography can select wide angle lens and large aperture, and use high ISO and the maximum aperture while shooting if you want to take marvelous shots of the meteor shower.
hypo: If you want to capture an impressive "流星雨大片" while enjoying photography, it's recommended to choose a wide-angle lens with a large aperture, set high ISO for the scene, and adjust the aperture to achieve maximum light.

src: 基于稳定性和持续性考虑，三脚架、备用电池和快门线也必不可少 。 ”
tgt: Based on consideration of stability and sustainability, a tripod, a standby battery and a shutter release are also necessary.”
hypo: Based on stability and sustainability considerations, a tripod, spare battery, and shutter release are also indispensable.

src: 修立鹏提醒说。
tgt: Xiu Lipeng reminded.
hypo: Xu Lin朋提醒说。

src: 越南人民报网 - 越南政府总理范明正出席第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛
tgt: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website – Fan Mingzheng, the Prime Minister of the Vietnam Government, attended the third Vietnam National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum
hypo: 越南人民报网 - The third National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum is being held by Prime Minister Vu Dong Binh of Vietnam.

src: 第三次越南国家数字技术企业发展论坛期间举行两场主要会议，讨论议题围绕着数字技术企业与国家数字化转型、数字技术企业与新冠肺炎疫情中和疫情后经济复苏与发展两大主题。
tgt: Two main conferences were held during the third Vietnam National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum, and discussions were held with two main topics, digital technology enterprises and national digital transformation, and digital technology enterprises and economic recovery and development during and after the epidemic.
hypo: There were two main sessions during the third越南 National Digital Technology Enterprise Development Forum, which addressed topics related to digital technology enterprises and digital transformation of the country, as well as the challenges and opportunities of the COVID-19 pandemic and post-pandemic economic recovery and development.

src: 通信传媒部部长阮孟雄表示，2021年，尽管新冠肺炎疫情持续蔓延，但越南数字技术企业的数量和营业收入仍保持增长势头，达近10 % 。
tgt: According to Ruan Mengxiong, Minister of Communication and Media Department, in 2021, despite the continuous spreading of the epidemic, the quantity and operation revenue of Vietnamese digital technology enterprises kept increasing, with an increase rate of nearly 10%.
hypo: The Minister of Communication and Media, Ruan Mengxiong, said that in 2021, despite the ongoing spread of the COVID-19 pandemic, the number and revenue of越南 digital technology enterprises continue to grow at nearly 10%.

src: 2021年，越南典型数字产品数量耕作，集中解决越南面临的各大难题，许多数字产品已走出国门，越南数字技术排名已提升。
tgt: In 2021, the quantity of typical digital products of Vietnam solved various major difficulties Vietnam was facing; many digital products have walked out of the country, and the ranking of the digital technology in Vietnam has climbed up.
hypo: In 2021，越南 focused on producing a large number of typical digital products to address various major challenges facing the country. Many digital products have been exported, and the ranking of越南 in digital technology has improved.

src: 阮孟雄部长呼吁数字技术企业负起发展国家数字化转型平台的责任，担当发展这些国家数字平台的任务就是担当国家使命。
tgt: Minister Ruan Mengxiong appealed to digital technology enterprises to shoulder the responsibility as a platform to develop national digital transformation; undertaking the task of developing these national digital platforms is undertaking the mission of the country.
hypo: The Minister of Ningbo has called on digital technology enterprises to take responsibility for developing the national digital transformation platform, and taking the task of developing these national digital platforms is also a national mission.

src: 在论坛上，各部门和国家机关领导，正在研究、发展、应用、转让数字技术的企业、组织和个人分享了动员和汇集全社会资源来发展越南技术企业，携手推动国家数字化转型，朱慧疫情后经济复苏等的各突破性设想和解决方案。
tgt: At the forum, leaders from various departments and government agencies as well as the enterprises, organizations and individuals engaged in research, development, application and transfer of digital technologies shared experience and advocated to pool resources from the whole society to develop technology enterprises in Vietnam, work together to promote digital transformation of the country, and seek breakthrough plans and solutions for economic recovery after the epidemic.
hypo: At the forum, individuals and organizations led by various departments and national government agencies who are studying, developing, applying, and transferring digital technologies shared various breakthrough ideas and solutions to动员 and aggregate the entire society's resources for the development of越南 technological enterprises, promote digital transformation of the country, and support economic recovery after the COVID-19 pandemic.

src: 范明正总理在论坛上发表讲话时强调，数字化转型是世界必由之路，是发展的客观需求。
tgt: Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng emphasized at the forum that digital transformation is the only way for the world and the objective demand for development.
hypo: When Mr. Van M. Manh正 the Prime Minister spoke at the forum, he emphasized that digital transformation is a necessary path for the world and an objective need for development.

src: 数字化转型已成为全球性问题，数字化转型服务全民，因此需动员全民参与。
tgt: Digital transformation has become a global problem; digital transformation serves all the people, and therefore it is necessary to motivate all people to participate in it.
hypo: Digital transformation has become a global problem, and it serves the whole people, therefore, it requires the participation of the whole people.

src: 人民和企业是数字化转型的核心、主体、目标和动力。
tgt: People and enterprises are the core, main subject, objective and motive power of digital transformation.
hypo: The people and enterprises are the core，主体， goal, and motivation of digital transformation.

src: 因此，一切政策需为了人民和企业。
tgt: Therefore, all the policies shall be made for the people and enterprises.
hypo: Therefore, all policies should be designed for the people and enterprises.

src: 范明正总理强调，数字化转型需体现民族精神，需以内力为主、战略、长期和决定性因素，外力为重要和突破口。
tgt: As emphasized by Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng, digital transformation shall reflect national spirit, with internal force as the core, strategic, long-term and decisive factors, and external force as an important breakthrough.
hypo: Prime Minister范明正 emphasizes that digital transformation needs to reflect the national spirit, which requires both internal and external forces, including strategic, long-term, and decisive factors.

src: 他同时认为，数字化转型需驱动向纵深发展和可持续发展，参与新冠肺炎疫情防控、经济复苏和发展、应对其后变化、克服自然资源枯竭现象，助力绿色转型、发展绿色能源。
tgt: He also believed at the same time that digital transformation should drive in-depth and sustainable development; it should participate in the prevention and control of COVID-19, in economic recovery and development, cope with subsequent changes, overcome depletion of natural resources, assist in green transformation and develop green energy.
hypo: He also believes that digital transformation requires driving deep and long-term development and sustainability. It involves participating in the prevention and recovery of the COVID-19 pandemic, economic经济复苏 and development, addressing subsequent changes, overcoming the problem of natural resource depletion, and supporting a green transformation and development of green energy.

src: 数字化转型需参与保护和弘扬有关国家文化价值、历史传统、国家风土人情等的数据库建立工作，推动银行、税务、土地管理和开发数据库以及物流等领域数字化转型。
tgt: Digital transformation needs to participate in the protection and advocation of the setup of databases including national cultural values, historical traditions as well as local conditions and social customs, to promote digital transformation in fields such as banks, taxes, land management, database development and logistics.
hypo: Digital transformation requires involvement in the creation and protection of databases related to the preservation and promotion of national cultural values, historical traditions, and national natural phenomena and people's customs, and in promoting digital transformation in areas such as banking, tax, land management, and development databases, as well as logistics.

src: 数字化转型的最大目标是让人民更幸福，国家日益繁荣发展。
tgt: The biggest goal of digital transformation is to make people happier and to make the country increasingly prosperous.
hypo: The biggest goal of digital transformation is to make people more happy and to promote the country's growing prosperity.

src: 范明正总理要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中需加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神上推动对数字技术企业发展。
tgt: Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng required governments and institutions of various levels and enterprises to strengthen leadership and guidance in digital technology development, to improve awareness of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve the system about digital transformation, strengthen national management, and to promote the development of digital technology enterprises in the spirit of respect, communication, listening and proactiveness.
hypo: 总理范明正要求各级政府、各级机关和企业在发展数字技术中加大领导和指导力度，提高对数字化转型的认识，继续制定和完善关于数字化转型的体制，加强国家管理度和本着尊重、沟通、倾听、积极和主动的精神推动数字技术企业发展。  This sentence in English翻译 is:  Prime Minister Wang Mingzhu requests governments, institutions and enterprises at all levels to strengthen leadership and guidance in the development of digital technology, improve understanding of digital transformation, continue to formulate and improve structures related to digital transformation, enhance national control and promote the development of digital technology enterprises in a spirit of respect, communication, listening, active and proactive.

src: 论坛期间，范明正总理出席了2021年“越南制造”优秀数字产品奖颁奖仪式及“越南制造”数字产品展开幕式。
tgt: During the forum, Prime Minister Fan Mingzheng attended the 2021 “Made in Vietnam” excellent digital product awarding ceremony and the opening ceremony of “Made in Vietnam” digital product exposition.
hypo: During the conference, Prime Minister Van Mochtar Nhu attended the ceremony for the award presentation of the outstanding digital products of "越南制造" and the opening ceremony of the "越南制造" digital product exposition in 2021.

src: “智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会开幕 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
tgt: “Smart Hunan” 2021 China International Rail Transport and Equipment Manufacturing Industry Talent Summit opened - Rolling News - Hunan Daily Online - Huasheng Online
hypo: "Smart Hunan" 2021 China International Summit on Electric Trains and Machine Building Industry Venue  opens

src: 湖南日报12月10日讯（全媒体记者 周帙恒）9日 ， “ 智汇潇湘”2021中国国际轨道交通和装备制造产业人才峰会在株洲开幕。
tgt: Report from Hunan Daily on December 10 (all-media journalist: Zhou Zhiheng), on December 9, “Smart Hunan” 2021 China International Rail Transport and Equipment Manufacturing Industry Talent Summit opened in Zhuzhou.
hypo: The Chinese People's Press, on December 10th (print media journalist Zhou Yuh恒), opened the 2021 China International轨道交通 and Equipment Industry Talent峰会 in Zhuzhou on December 9th.

src: 省委常委、省委组织部部长王成出席启动仪式并讲话。
tgt: Wang Cheng, a member of the Standing Committee of CPC Provincial Committee and Director of the Organization Department of Provincial Party Committee, attended the opening ceremony and delivered a speech.
hypo: Standing, attended, official statement, government official

src: 王成指出，举办人才峰会是贯彻落实中央人才工作会议和省第十二次党代会精神的重要举措，彰显了湖南重视人才、渴求人才、用好人才的真心诚意。
tgt: Wang Cheng pointed out that hosting the talent summit was an important measure to implement the spirit of the talent working conference of the central government and the spirit of the 12th Party Congress of Hunan, showing the sincerity of Hunan in terms of putting emphasis on talents, being eager for talents and making full use of talents.
hypo: Wang Cheng pointed out that hosting a talent summit is an important measure to carry out the spirit of the central talent work conference and the twelveth parliamentary committee meeting of the province, which demonstrates the genuine and sincere interest in talent in Henan.

src: 湖南有识才爱才敬才的优良传统、助力人才发展的广阔平台、实现美好生活的环境条件，近年来深入实施人才引领发展战略，以芙蓉人才行动计划为牵引，构建起引育留用全链条人才工作格局，成为了人才成长成就的沃土、创新创业的热土、宜居宜业的乐土。
tgt: With the good tradition of recognizing talents, cherishing talents and respecting talents, the wide platforms that assist in talent development and the environmental conditions for realizing beautiful life, Hunan has implemented the talent development strategy in recent years, and has constructed the full-chain talent work pattern by taking Furong talent action plan as the pulling strength, forming the fertile soil for talent growth and achievement, the favored place for innovation and entrepreneurship, and the paradise for living and working.
hypo: The Chinese region of Henan has a的优良传统 of recognizing and loving talent, as well as a vast platform to support talent development and a favorable environment for achieving a good life. In recent years, the region has heavily implemented a talent- led development strategy and has built a full-chain talent work system, guide and retain talent, and promote innovation and entrepreneurship. Today, it has become a land of talent growth and achievements, a hotbed of innovation and entrepreneurship, and a place of good living and work.

src: 当前，湖南正在全面落实“三高四新”战略定位和使命任务，将进一步广开引贤纳才之门，为人才创新创业出台更优政策、集中更多资源、创造更好条件，期待各界优秀人才共同为湖南高质量发展聚智汇力。
tgt: At present, Hunan is comprehensively implementing the “three-high and four-new” strategic positioning and mission tasks, and will further introduce talents, provide more policies for talent innovation and entrepreneurship, concentrate more resources and create better conditions; all excellent talents are welcomed to work towards high-quality development of Hunan.
hypo: At present, Hunan is fully implementing the strategic positioning and mission tasks of the "Three Highs and Four New" strategy. It will further open up a wider welcome door for talents and invite more talents to participate in innovation and development. We expect more excellent policies, more resources, and better conditions to be established to support talent innovation and development. We look forward to unite talents from various fields to集思广益 and contribute to high-quality development in Hunan.

src: 活动现场设置了长沙、株洲、湘潭展馆和湖南自贸试验区展馆，省科技厅、省工信厅、省人社厅发布了先进制造相关产业科技创新重点需求清单、智能制造产业人才需求目录、博士后流动站智能制造产业青年人才需求目录。
tgt: Changsha Exhibition Hall, Zhuzhou Exhibition Hall, Xiangtan Exhibition Hall and Hunan Pilot Free Trade Zone were set on the site of activity, and the List of Key Demands of Scientific and Technological Innovation in Advanced Manufacturing Related Industries, List of Talents Demands of Intelligent Manufacturing Industry, Directory of Talent Demands of Intelligent Manufacturing Industry and Directory of Young Talent Demands of the Postdoctoral Research Station of Intelligent Manufacturing Industry were released by Hunan Department of Science and Technology, Hunan Department of Industry and Information, and Hunan Department of Human Resources and Social Security Bureau.
hypo: The活动现场设置有长沙、株洲、湘潭展馆和湖南自贸试验区展馆，省科技厅、省工信厅、省人社厅发布了先进制造相关产业科技创新重点需求清单、智能制造产业人才需求目录、博士后流动站智能制造产业青年人才需求目录。

src: 中国中车、中联重科、远大科技等48家大型企业现场揽才，近千名相关专业应届毕业生、社会人才参与了人才项目对接。
tgt: 48 large enterprises including CRRC, Zoomlion and Broad Group recruited talents on the site, and nearly one thousand new graduates and social talents of related specialties participated in the talent project.
hypo: The English translation for the sentence is: 48 large enterprises such as China Central Railway, China Zhenhua Technology, and China Everlight Technology Recruitment on the site, and近千名相关专业应届毕业生和社会人才 participated in the talent project match-up.

src: 长江干流实现水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖-新华网
tgt: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas has been realized in the main stream of the Yangtze River - Xinhuanet
hypo: The complete coverage of the Yangtze River mainstream with an on-water green service area.

src: 新华社武汉12月11日电（记者王贤）重庆市涪陵水上绿色综合服务区10日如期建成投入运营，这是继8日四川省泸州水上绿色综合服务区挂牌运营后，长江上游正式运营的第2个水上绿色综合服务区。
tgt: Message from Wuhan Xinhua News Agency on December 11 (Reporter: Wang Xian): Chongqing Fuling on-water green comprehensive service area was completed on schedule and put into operation on December 10, which was the 2nd on-water green comprehensive service area officially put into operation on the upper reaches of Yangtze River after the Sichuan Luzhou water green comprehensive service area started operation on December 8.
hypo: The Water Green Comprehensive Service Center in浮山陵 in China's Zhejiang Province was completed and operated on December 10th as scheduled. This is the second water green comprehensive service center in the upper Yangtze River上游 to be正式 operational after the Hangzhou Water Green Comprehensive Service Center was挂牌 operation on December 8th, in the state-owned enterprise Zhejiang Water and Chemical Technology Company.

src: 至此，水上绿色综合服务区已覆盖长江上、中、下游。
tgt: Up until now, on-water green comprehensive service areas have covered the upper reaches, the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River.
hypo: To the best of my knowledge, this sentence in Chinese does not contain the words "green comprehensive," "on-water green," or "middle." Therefore, the English translation for this sentence is:  By now, the on-water green comprehensive area has covered the upper, middle, and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.

src: 交通运输部长江航务管理局副局长邱健华介绍说，此前，湖北、湖南、江西、安徽、江苏等省份已在长江中游、下游建成运行10个水上绿色综合服务区，得到了广大船员的认可，为推进长江航运高质量发展发挥了重要作用。
tgt: According to introduction from Qiu Jianhua, deputy director general of Yangtze Navigation Administration Bureau of Ministry of Transport, before that, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui and Jiangsu had constructed and put into use 10 on-water green comprehensive service areas in the middle reaches and the lower reaches of Yangtze River, which had been recognized by sailors and had played an important role in promoting high-quality development of shipping in the Yangtze River.
hypo: Here's the English translation for the given sentence:  CuiGUI Huayue said that before, several states such as湖北，湖南，江西，安徽， and江苏 had建成运行 10 aquatic green comprehensive service areas in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, which had been recognized by the large number of pilots and船员 and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping.

src: 水上绿色综合服务区全覆盖是长江绿色航运建设的又一里程碑事件，长江船舶污染物接收、航运服务能力得到显著提升。
tgt: Full coverage of on-water green comprehensive service areas is another milestone event for the construction of green shipping of the Yangtze River, which has greatly improved the abilities of pollutant collection and shipping services of the Yangtze River.
hypo: The complete coverage of the aquatic green service area is another significant milestone in the construction of green shipping in the Yangtze River. The delivery of污染物 and shipping services have been significantly improved.

src: 据介绍，水上绿色综合服务区是为广大船舶、船员提供全方位生产、生活服务，帮助广大船员解决“急难愁盼”问题的重要设施。
tgt: As introduced, on-water green comprehensive service areas are important facilities that provide ships and sailors with comprehensive production and living services, and help them solve “emergent and difficult” problems.
hypo: According to the description, the waterborne green production and service area is an important facility for providing comprehensive production and生活服务 to large-scale vessels and crew members, helping them solve the "急切难题忧虑期待" problems.

src: 此次建成运行的长江上游两处水上绿色综合服务区，集生活服务、生产服务和政务服务为一体，以绿色环保为主题，以船舶维修与船舶应急救援服务为特色，实现港内船舶“一次靠泊、多项服务 ” ， 将使得常年航行在长江的船员工作更高效、生活更便捷。
tgt: The two newly established on-water green comprehensive service areas in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River are integrated with life services, production services and government services; with environmental protection as the theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the features, they realize “multiple services at an anchoring” along the shore, providing sailors working in the Yangtze River all year long with more efficient work and more convenient life.
hypo: The two水上绿色综合服务区 in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River are now in operation, which combine生活服务， production services, and government services with a focus on environmental protection, and feature boat repair and emergency response services as their unique features, enabling ships at the port to receive "one泊位， multiple services". This will make the船员 working more efficiently and living more convenient in the Yangtze River regularly.

src: 中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习圆满结束-新华网
tgt: The “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam completed successfully - Xinhuanet
hypo: The "Peaceful Assistance-2021" military security joint exercise of the Central and Southern Vietnam armies was completed byXinhuanet.

src: 新华社河内12月12日电（周娜 滕怀金）12日上午，参加中越两军“和平救援-2021”卫勤联合演习的中方参演分队全部安全返回中国广西境内，标志着此次持续7天的演训任务顺利完成。
tgt: Message from Xinhua News Agency Hanoi on December 12 (journalists: Zhou Na and Teng Huaijin): in the morning of December 12, all the Chinese squads participating in the “Peaceful Rescue-2021” military health service joint exercise of armies of China and Vietnam returned to Guangxi, China, indicating the successful completion of exercise and training tasks which lasted 7 days.
hypo: According to news from the People's News Agency of China, on the morning of December 12th (Zhi Neng Xinjin), the Chinese team that had participated in the "Peace Help-2021" military security joint演习 and returned to China's Guangxi Province safely，标志着此次持续7天的演习任务顺利完成.

src: 此次联演，中越两军围绕人道主义医学救援这一重大课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务，按照实战化标准完成了联合卫勤指挥、联合现场救援、批量伤员处置等课目内容，有效提升了两军卫勤保障能力。
tgt: In this joint exercise, the armies of China and Vietnam completed joint military health service command, joint field rescue, batched treatment of the wounded and other content according to practical combat standard on the major topic of humanitarian medical assistance and the mission of healing the wounded and rescuing the dying; it effectively improved the military health service support ability of the two armies.
hypo: In this joint exercise, the armies of China and Vietnam紧密围绕the major issue of humanitarian medical assistance这一课题，紧扣卫勤救死扶伤使命任务， successfully completed joint卫勤指挥， joint on-site rescue, and批量伤员处置等课目内容， effectively improving the combat support service capabilities of both armies.

src: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。
tgt: The results of the exercise have won recognition from both armies of China and Vietnam.
hypo: 演习成果得到中越两军的肯定。  The results of the training演习 have been confirmed by the Chinese and South Vietnamese military.

src: 越方演习指导委员会主任、越南人民军后勤总局副主任兼参谋长阮雄胜在演习结束仪式上说，通过此次演习，越南军医从中国军医身上学到了演习组织及专业活动方面的知识，也见识了中方的医疗、保障设备。
tgt: Ruan Xiongsheng, Director of the Exercise Guiding Committee of Vietnam and the Deputy Director and the Chief of Staff of the Administration of Logistics of People’s Army of Vietnam, said at the ending ceremony that military doctors of Vietnam learned knowledge about exercise organization and specialized activities from military doctors of China, and widened their knowledge of medical and logistics equipment of China.
hypo: The Chief of Vietnam's演习指导 commission，阮雄胜， said that through the exercise, Vietnamese military doctors had learned about the organization and professional activities of the exercise from Chinese military doctors and had also seen the medical and的保障 equipment of the Chinese side.

src: 演习取得的成果证明了两国军医力量在医疗援助、疫情防控方面的专业能力。
tgt: The achievements made from the exercise proved the specialized ability of military doctors of two countries on medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.
hypo: The outcome of the演习 demonstrates the professional ability of the military doctors from both countries in medical assistance and epidemic prevention and control.

src: 中方指导协调组组长、中央军委后勤保障部卫生局副局长陈春明表示，此次演习是在2018年成功举办联合义诊活动的基础上又一次开拓创新实践，具有非常重要的里程碑意义。
tgt: According to Chen Chunming, leader of Guidance and Coordination Group of China and Deputy Director of Health Bureau of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, the exercise is another pioneering practice based on the joint voluntary clinics event held in 2018, which has an essential milestone significance.
hypo: Chen Chen Ming, head of the coordination and guidance team of the Chinese side and member of the Office of Health Logistics of the military Commission, said that this exercise is another innovative practice built on the successful joint research and development activities in 2018, and it has significant significance.

src: 演习期间，中国人民解放军向越南人民军捐赠了医用防护口罩、医用防护服、快速核酸检测仪器等卫生防疫物资。
tgt: During the exercise, Chinese People’s Liberation Army donated health and epidemic prevention materials such as medical masks, medical protective suits and quick nucleic acid detectors to People’s Army of Vietnam.
hypo: During the exercise, the People's Liberation Army Navy supplied medical essential equipment such as医用口罩， medical masks, rapid diagnostic test kits, and other health security items to the越南 People's Army.   Note: "nucleic acid" /n.k.a. "DNA" or "RNA" is a term used to refer to the genetic material in cells.

src: 先说结论，我个人认为《四海》是一部全方位的烂片，从各种意义上来说都是。
tgt: I will say my conclusion first; I think Only Fools Rush In is utterly a terrible film in any sense.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation:  "Let's start with the结论. In my opinion, 'The四海' is a total disaster from every aspect, and in any sense, it's not a good movie."

src: 但你要说这部电影是不是一个亮点也没有，那倒也不是至少配乐选的挺好。
tgt: But it is not without any highlight; at least the music is good.
hypo: But it, at least, movie.

src: 烂片分很多种，让你能在电影院里酣然入睡的算一种，让你看完后义愤填膺的也算一种，《四海》对观众来说就像是峨眉山上的猴子，它能用无数种方式来点燃你的怒火。
tgt: There are many types of terrible films; some make you sleep soundly in the cinema, some make you angry after watching it; Only Fools Rush In is like monkeys on Mount Emei; it can ignite your anger in countless ways.
hypo: The bad movies come in many forms, one of which is allowing you to fall asleep in the cinema while watching it, and another is feeling upset after watching it. "The Four Seasons" is like a monkey on Mount Everest, which can点燃 your anger in countless ways.

src: 在侮辱观众这点上，韩寒真的是天赋绝伦。
tgt: Han Han is super talented in insulting the audience.
hypo: In terms of侮辱观众， Han Han truly has exceptional talent.

src: 这部片子最让人感到痛苦的就是它仿佛是克系小说里的造物，难以名状，漏洞多的就像是小马哥身上的风衣。
tgt: The most painful part of the film is that it is hard to describe like a monster in Cthulhu novels, and has as many loopholes as the holes on the trench coat on Javier Mascherano.
hypo: The most painful thing about this film is that it seems like a creation in凯文·凯利's Kafka novel, difficult to describe, with many gaps like the trench coat that小马哥 wears.

src: 甚至看完后你会怀疑这里面是否有导演暗含的隐喻，但当你仔细思考之后发现它其实就是一坨屎。
tgt: After watching it, you may even wonder if there is metaphors the director planted in it; but you will find that it is only a piece of shit after close examination.
hypo: Even after watching it, you may doubt if there is a director's hidden symbolism in it, but after careful thinking, you will find that it is actually nothing but a pile of diarrhea.

src: 先简单的说下我很难理解的一些情节。
tgt: I’ll first briefly talk about some plots that are hard to understand.
hypo: "ll first, briefly talk, talk about" 的英语翻译为 "ll first, briefly discuss, discuss"。

src: 男主居住地应该是偏南方的某个小岛上，和他的奶奶相依为命。
tgt: The male leading role lives with his grandma on some island in the south.
hypo: The male's居住地 should be a small island in the southern part, where he is inseparable from his grandma.

src: 她奶奶有个愿望是想看下雪，然后剧情就安排邻里中的一个大爷开着小面包车送她去东北看雪。
tgt: His grandma has a wish, watching the snow, and the a old male neighbor drove a minibus to take her to watch the snow in the Northeast.
hypo: Her grandmother has a wish to see snow, and then the story arranges for one of her neighbors' uncles to drive her to东北 to see the snow with a small minibus.

src: 高龄老人坐着面包车从南方到东北看雪？？
tgt: An elderly goes to watch the snow in the northeast from the south in a minibus? ?
hypo: "高龄老人坐着面包车从南方到东北看雪？"的英语翻译为：  "An elderly person is sitting in a pickup truck from the south to the northeastern part of the country to see snow."

src: 他和他爹对此还非常放心。
tgt: He and his father were okay with it.
hypo: "He and his father"

src: 然后这位老人就没下文了。
tgt: And then there is no follow-up on this old lady.
hypo: then, this old man...

src: 在废弃轮船上开酒店，女主他哥怎么拿到营业执照的？
tgt: Opening a hotel on an abandoned ship; how does the brother of the female leading role get the license?
hypo: Translate: How did the女主's brother obtain a business license to open a hotel on a abandoned ship?

src: 岛上飞车党小混混为什么能轻轻松松就把一段山路做到封路？？
tgt: How do the racing bike gang on the island easily block a mountain road? ?
hypo: Why are the island racing bikers' young streetscar friends able to easily block a mountain road?

src: 然后路中间送钢筋的卡车就停在路边，四周连卡车司机都找不到。
tgt: Then the truck delivering steel bars in the middle of the road just stopped at the roadside, and the truck driver was nowhere to be found.
hypo: Then a truck delivering concrete stopped at the edge of the road, and even the driver of the truck couldn't find it anywhere.

src: 这道具感也太明显了吧。
tgt: They are obviously props.
hypo: This propfulness is实在是太明显了。

src: 一个征信不行的且有违法嫌疑的小混混飞车党为什么会成为一名辅警？
tgt: Why could a little gangster biker with poor credit and who was suspected of breaking the law become an auxiliary policeman?
hypo: Why would a结交不良少年且信誉不好的 biker with a criminal suspect become an auxiliary policeman?

src: 面对高利贷为啥不报警，电影里警察还特地问了是否有难处？
tgt: Why didn’t he call the police when there was usury involved, and the police specifically asked if there was any problem.
hypo: "Why didn't you call the police when you faced high interest loans, and in the movie, the police even asked if there was a problem?"

src: 一个成年人懂得用智能手机，却不知道在旅馆如何用房卡开门，然后强行安排找不到旅馆老板，坐在房间门外睡一宿？
tgt: An adult who knows how to use smart phone doesn’t know how to use the card to open the door at the hotel, and it was forcefully arranged for him not being able to find the owner of the hotel and so he slept outside the hotel for the night?
hypo: "A成年人 who is knowledgeable about smartphones but却不知道 how to open a room door in a hotel with a room card, will be forced to arrange for someone else to find the hotel owner and sleep outside the room for a night?"

src: 这种莫名其妙的情节充斥在整个影片里，由于情节过于离谱以至于我回忆它们时都会令我感到痛苦。
tgt: Such ridiculous plots were everywhere in the film; the plots are so ridiculous that I feel painful when I remember them.
hypo: This bizarre plot fills up the entire movie, and it's so unrealistic that it makes me feel pain when I remember it.

src: 除了情节外，更糟糕的是电影的主旨，或者说这电影根本没有主旨，就是一个面目可憎的缝合怪。
tgt: In addition to the plots, the theme of the film is even more terrible, or you can say there is no theme in the film; it’s just a horrible monster that is stitched together.
hypo: The worse thing about the film is not only its plot, but also its theme, or else it is nothing more than a miserable stitching together of unrelated elements.

src: 影片开头你会以为他想拍个喜剧片，20多分钟后你猜它也许是个励志片，看一半时你觉得它可能是个想体现小镇青年生存不易的剧情片，看完后你就压根也不知道自己究竟看了个啥，随之而来的是对自己深深的怀疑，大过年的为什么要跑到电影院去欣赏大便。
tgt: In the beginning of the film, you may think he wants to make a comedy; after twenty minutes, you may guess it’s an inspiration film; after a half of it, you may think it’s a drama showcasing the hardship of a small town boy; after you watch all of it, you don’t even know what you have watched; what follows is deep doubt in yourself; why would you go to the cinema to watch a piece of shit during the Spring Festival?
hypo: At the beginning of the movie, you would think he wants to make a comedy movie. After twenty minutes, you think it might be a motivational movie. When you are half-way through the movie, you think it might be a drama movie about the difficulties of the young people in the small town. After watching the whole movie, youdon't even know what you just watched. This is followed by a deep怀疑 of yourself, why would you go to the movie theater to watch大便 during a happy holiday?

src: 对于大部分人来说其实也都非常熟悉各类电影的套路了，比如你要想拍摩托车手，那就励志＋喜剧然后告诉观众一个有天赋的菜鸟是如何一步步走向成功的。
tgt: Most people are familiar with the routines of various films; for example, if you want to make a film about a biker, then make it an inspiration + comedy to tell the audience how a talented rookie achieves success step by step.
hypo: For most people, they are also very familiar with the formulas of various films. For example, if you want to make a film about摩托车手， you can combine励志 and comedy, and tell the audience how a talented beginner can gradually achieve success through step by step progress.

src: 如果你想拍爱情片，那你就老老实实讲喜欢骑摩托的小镇青年和服务员妹子之间的恩怨纠葛。
tgt: If you want to make a love film, just tell the story about a small town boy who loves to ride motorcycle and a girl who works as a waitress.
hypo: If you want to make a romantic film, then you should tell the story of the interesting town boy and the server girl's complicated relationship.

src: 如果你想反映现实，那最起码你的情节不能出现和正常世界相悖的东西。
tgt: If you want to reflect reality, then the plot should not have anything that is contradictory to the normal world.
hypo: If you want to reflect reality, at the very least your story should not contain things that are inconsistent with the normal world.

src: （比如尹正演的那个新摩托刚被烧了，然后还能唱歌的角色），就不能去开一些连肯尼迪看了都遭不住的脑洞。
tgt: (Such as the character played by Yin Zheng who sang after his new motorcycle was just burned ) please don’t think about ideas that are ridiculous.
hypo: "Motorcycle was, by Yin, just about to be burned up and he could still sing."

src: 至于女主明明不是弱智可在某些方面表现的就像个5岁小孩，我真不知道这是演技的原因还是导演的要求。
tgt: As for why the female leading role acts like a five-year-old child when she is not retarded at all, I really don’t know if there is problem with her acting or it was demanded by the director.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation:  Regarding the女主， who is not actually mentally disabled but still performs like a five-year-old in some aspects, I am not sure whether it is due to acting or the requirements of the director.

src: 还有一点我也挺想不明白，韩寒作为一个赛车手为什么这么热衷于在他自己的电影里添加撞车情节？
tgt: And one more thing I don’t understand is why Han Han as a racer is so keen on adding the plot of car crash in his films?
hypo: I also have an issue with how keen韩寒， as a racer, is to include traffic collisions in his own movie.

src: 这样的电影安排在春节档里，难道是为了给观众添堵吗？
tgt: Is such a film being arranged in the Spring Festival season to humiliate the audience?
hypo: Is it just for the sake of adding frustration to给观众？   (Note: The translation uses the word "frustration" rather than "堵" to convey the idea of adding inconvenience or discomfort to the film's release.)

src: 感谢今天的支持者，80盒全部送出去了！
tgt: Thank you to all the supporters today; all 80 boxes have been given out!
hypo: Thank you for your支持者 today, all 80 boxes have been sent out!

src: 美容养颜汤的材料：
tgt: Ingredients of beauty soup:
hypo: The ingredients for a delicious and nourishing soup to help with beauty:  Please make sure to include these words: soup.

src: 白木耳的作用：味甘、性平，归肺、胃、肾经；有强精、补肾、润肠、益胃、补气、和血、强心、滋阴、润肺、生津、壮身、补脑、提神、美容、嫩肤、延年益寿之功效；用于治肺热咳嗽、肺燥干咳、妇女月经不调、胃炎、大便秘结等病症；对阴虚火旺不受参茸等温热滋补的病人是一种良好的补品
tgt: Functions of tremella: sweet in taste and neutral in nature, belong to channels of lung, stomach and kidney, have the effects of strengthening sperm, tonifying kidney, moistening intestine, nourishing stomach, tonifying vitality and blood, strengthening heart, nourishing yin, moistening lungs, promoting secretion, strengthening body, tonifying brain, refreshing beauty, tendering skin and prolonging life; it is used for treatment of diseases such as lung-heat type cough, dry-lung cough, menstrual irregularity of women, gastritis and constipation; it is a good tonic for patients with excessive heat and yin deficiency but are not suitable for warm tonic such as ginseng and velvet antler.
hypo: The function of white木耳： It has a sweet and neutral taste, belongs to the lung, stomach, and tailing channels; it has the ability to strengthening the male organ, nourishing the kidney, improving digestion, providing energy, strengthening the body, rejuvenating the mind, improving beauty, making the skin smooth, and promoting aging. It is suitable for treating air pollution cough, dry and cough in the lung, female irregular heartbeat, stomach discomfort, and constipation; it is a good supplement for patients who are low in red blood cells and high in blood pressure who cannot get warm nourishment like herbs and spices.

src: 桃胶的作用：味苦，性平，归大肠，膀胱经。
tgt: Functions of peach glue: bitter in taste, mild in nature, belong to the large intestine and bladder channels.
hypo: The functions of peach qi: bitter, mean, belongs to the master復宫， and goes to the liver and畅肠 in the process of ×uj neng.

src: 功效：和血，通淋，止痢，止痛，也可以补水，润肠，如果有便秘的人，可以多吃桃胶。
tgt: Effects: tonify blood, dredge lymph, stop dysentery and pain, replenish water, moisten intestines; people with constipation can eat more peach glue.
hypo: The effects: binding blood, helping with diarrhea, binding constipation, helping with digestion, can also provide moisture，润肠道. If someone has constipation, they can eat more pomegranate seeds.

src: 枸杞子的作用：性平，味甘，归肝，胃经。
tgt: Effect of fruits of Chinese wolfberries: neutral in nature and sweet in taste, belonging to the channels of liver and stomach.
hypo: The effect of  wolfberries: they are性平， taste sweet, and are directed to the liver and stomach.

src: 益肝明目，滋补肝肾，美白养颜，补虚生津，延缓衰老。
tgt: Nourish the liver and the eyes, tonify the liver and the kidney, whiten and nourish the skin, nourish deficiency, produce secretion and delay aging.
hypo: Evicvict the liver, nourish the liver and kidney, illuminate the face, replenish the bating blood, and enrich the aging process.

src: 红枣的作用：味甘，性平，归脾，胃经，有补脾和胃，益气生津养血安神，如果脾胃虚弱，气血不足失眠者可以多服用红枣。
tgt: Functions of red dates: sweet in taste, calm in nature, return to the spleen, go through stomach channel, tonify the spleen and stomach, replenish qi, generate fluid, nourish blood and calm nerves; people whose spleen and stomach are weak, whose Qi and blood are insufficient, and who suffer from insomnia can eat more red dates.
hypo: The function of 太阳枣： It has a sweet taste and a mild temperature, belongs to the spleen and the泰山ira, can nourish the stomach and body, help with retention of fluids and blood, and improve sleep quality. If there is a lack of spleen and blood, sleep disorders, people can take more太阳枣 to improve their sleep.

src: 龙眼肉的作用：味甘性温，归心,脾经，适用于心脾两虚者。
tgt: Functions of arillus gongan: sweet in taste, warm in nature, return to the heart, spleen channel, suitable for those with deficiency of both heart and spleen.
hypo: The effect of Mooncake猪肉： its taste is warm and sweet, it belongs to the heart and spleen, and is suitable for those who have both heart and spleen deficiencies.

src: 龙眼肉还能润肤美容，养血安神,,补益心脾，壮阳益气，贫血的人也适合服用，失眠者也适合。
tgt: Arillus gongan can also moisturize and beautify the skin, nourish blood and calm the nerves, tonify the heart and spleen, invigorate Yang and Qi, and is also suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.
hypo: The meat of the eastday plant can also nourish and beauty skin, provide red blood cells, support your heart and liver, and nourish blood. It is suitable for people with anemia and insomnia.

src: 莲子的作用：味甘涩，性平，归心，脾，肾经。
tgt: Functions of lotus seeds: sweet and astringent in taste, flat in nature, return to heart, spleen and kidney channels.
hypo: The effect of ELSA (Eponaona盖茨) : its taste is sweet, but also astringent, located in the heart, wing, and fast nerve.

src: 养心安神，心悸失眠，胃虚，健忘，心烦口渴，滋养补虚，止遗涩精。
tgt: Nourish the heart and calm the nerves, treat palpitations, insomnia, stomach deficiency, forgetfulness, vexation and thirstiness, nourish and replenish deficiency, and prevent spermatorrhea and premature ejaculation.
hypo: "养心安神，心悸失眠，胃虚，健忘，心烦口渴，滋养补虚，止遗涩精。"  这句话的英语翻译是：To nourish and soothe the mind, alleviate insomnia, have poor memory, feel lonely and sick, and nourish and strengthen the stomach.

src: 因此，这个养颜美容汤不仅是一道甜品，而且还可以养生！
tgt: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert, but also helps you stay healthy!
hypo: Therefore, this beauty soup is not only a dessert but also a healthy meal!

src: 多吃，能使您心神安康！
tgt: Eating more can make you healthy both physically and mentally!
hypo: Eating more can make you feel good about yourself and keep your mind and spirit sharp.

src: 而且又不会像燕窝那么贵，多吃不会使你口袋破大洞！
tgt: Plus, it won't be as expensive as bird’s nest, so eating a lot will not make you spend a lot!
hypo: Sure, here's the translation:  "Moreover, it won't be as expensive as 燕盏 and it won't fill your wallet with holes."

src: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
tgt: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.
hypo: I want to try playing tennis, but I am afraid I may not stick with it, so I want to start by finding a price that is about right to practice with.

src: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
tgt: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.
hypo: The English translation of the above sentence is:  "Not friendly, in fact, the price often成正比 with the friendly程度. If one cannot distinguish, then the expensive ones are usually more friendly than the便宜的 ones, which are actually industrial垃圾."

src: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
tgt: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.
hypo: These are low-intensity; when a ball is hit on the拍， there is a large vibration; hard balls are difficult to handle for experts.

src: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
tgt: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.
hypo: Their existence implies that they are there to deceive or mislead people. Since you don't want to learn how to play网球， and you don't have the money to buy expensive equipment, they will offer you a cheaper version, which you can play twice and then stop playing. Since the equipment is cheaper, you won't feel too guilty. This way, they can make money off of your purchase while pretending to be helpful.

src: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
tgt: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.
hypo: If you really can distinguish between good and bad, then it means you have improved. When you come here to buy the expensive thing later on, I will earn money twice for you.

src: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
tgt: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?
hypo: Suggest spending the same amount of money to buy a slightly better second-hand camera, choose prince or dpreview, as these two brands are quite unknown, so good cameras are not sellable for a reasonable price. A new camera costs around 500 or 600, and a second-hand one costs 200, isn't it delicious to have the experience of a thousand-dollar camera?

src: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
tgt: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.
hypo: The sentence in English is: "It's quite friendly to new learners, but once they pass the beginner stage, it becomes treachery. However, most people, especially girls, cannot overcome the beginner stage."  Here's the translation with the words you provided:  "It's quite friendly to new learners, but once they pass the beginner stage, it becomes treachery. However, most people, especially girls, cannot overcome the beginner stage."

src: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
tgt: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.
hypo: The 十八届"World Beverage Innovation Awards" is a collaboration between FoodBev Media and the German Nuremberg International啤酒，酿酒， and beverage industry exhibition ( Brau Beviale).

src: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
tgt: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.
hypo: The competition attracted 279 works from 25 different countries and 22 categories.

src: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
tgt: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).
hypo: On October 15th, the list of candidates for the final round was announced, and the final winners' list will be published online on November 11th ( British standard time ).

src: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
tgt: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.
hypo: We see that Vipin森林's LP28 non-sweet dairy milk is shortlisted for the Best dairy drink award，伊利安慕希's "GOGO 武汉" marketing campaign is shortlisted for the Best marketing campaign, and the packaging of百事可乐 and The Daily Times's new media collaboration is shortlisted for the Best packaging design/ Label award.

src: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
tgt: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.
hypo: Laura Nettle，高级市场营销总监 of FoodBev Media, stated that she was pleased to celebrate the 18th annual World Food Innovation Awards with Brau Beviale.

src: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
tgt: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.
hypo: From new flavors, new concepts, and new functions to brand, packaging, and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen trends in the beverage industry.

src: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
tgt: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.
hypo: The World饮用水创新奖 recognized the most ambitious new products and developments in the global beverage industry this year among both old and new brands.

src: 以下是每个类别的决赛入围者的完整榜单。
tgt: Here is the complete list of all the finalists of each category.
hypo: Here is the complete list of candidates for the final round for each category.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.
hypo: The technology developed by the Ardagh Group can recycle 100% of recycled glass into new瓶子.

src: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。
tgt: The packaging of the bagged water in the box is 100% recyclable, which can reduce packaging by 66% and carbon emission by 97%.
hypo: The box contains water in袋 form, and the packaging material uses 100% recyclable materials, reducing packaging waste by 66% and carbon emissions by 97%.

src: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
tgt: Latcub is 100% biodegradable; it uses less paper, and does not use glue or tape that is harmful to the environment.
hypo: LatCub is 100% bio降解 and uses less paper than traditional paper products without the use of environmentally harmful printing scripts or tape.

src: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化制成新的瓶子。
tgt: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.
hypo: The technology developed by the Ardagh Group can recycle 100% recycled glass into new瓶子.

src: 最终获奖名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）在FoodBev Media的 YouTube频道公布，FBIF将持续为您报道，敬请期待！
tgt: The final list of the winners will be published on the YouTube channel of FoodBev Media on November 11 (BTS), and FBIF will continue to report for you, so stay tuned!
hypo: The final名单 will be announced on the FoodBev Media YouTube channel on November 11th ( British Summer Time ). FBIF will continue to report on it and look forward to it.

src: 2021年什么最火？
tgt: What is the hottest thing in 2021?
hypo: 1. What did/did not go well in 2021? 2. What popular topics were/ were not discussed in 2021? 3. What was the most controversial/mainstream in 2021? 4. What events/trends were the most notable/ significant in 2021?

src: 无疑是东京奥运会。
tgt: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.
hypo: Certainly, the Winter Olympics will be undoubtedly held in东京.

src: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
tgt: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
hypo: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win a prize?
