src: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
tgt: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.
hypo: There was a popular article titled "Fast see! Project managers can challenge gold维生素和矿物质" which was recently popular. In this article, the writer mentioned that project managers in many projects are absolutely first in the line，没有人能比： carrying bricks, traveling, staying up late are the daily habits of project managers, and灭火，背锅， and apologize are also not是不可能的.

src: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
tgt: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.
hypo: This seemingly lighthearted article speaks to the daily difficulties faced by project managers, who are背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的 insufficient strength.

src: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
tgt: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.
hypo: The English translation for the sentence is: "而那些从事项目管理的人员，也开始逐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱在工作中的困境。"

src: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
tgt: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.
hypo: According to the annual number of PMP ( international recognized project management professional certification) learners, an increasing number of project management professionals are improving their project management skills through learning.

src: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
tgt: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.
hypo: According to the "Development Report on the二十年 Development of Project Management in China (1999-2019)", by September 2019, the total number of PMP® registrations across the country was nearly 60 million, with a total number of PMP® certified individuals estimated to be around 4.2 million, and a total number of valid certification holders estimated to be around 30 million. This accounts for 31.2% of the global total number of PMP® certified individuals.

src: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
tgt: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.
hypo: The number of PMP certified professionals has been growing over the past decade, indicating that more and more project managers are realizing that relying solely on previous "old wisdom" is no longer feasible. The constantly changing work environment reminds us that we need to learn to approach tasks by 踩着科学巨人的的肩膀， exploring the way forward on our own.

src: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
tgt: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?
hypo: However, does obtaining a PMP ensure that project management work is free from obstacles?   Note: This sentence contains the words "ensure", "PMP", and "work".

src: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
tgt: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.
hypo: Many project management beginners claim that by studying PMP/IPMP-related courses, they can systematically master the related concepts of the ten major fields and the five process groups of project management. However, it still remains a big challenge when it comes to actual project management work.

src: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
tgt: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...
hypo: Many project managers often反馈 the following issues:   1. Lack of project management understanding, relying solely on personal experience, lacking theoretical knowledge of project management and how to apply it effectively.  2. In缺乏系统的 project management process and system support, the project cannot be implemented effectively, project estimation is inaccurate, and the control level is poor, leading to the delay of the project.  3. 没有明确的成员分工， " veteran" team members in the team are not aware of how to respond to the situation, and cross-部门 assist communication is not smooth, making it difficult to move forward with the project.   等等。

src: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
tgt: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.
hypo: Therefore, having been dedicated to the fields of innovation and product innovation for ten years, China Tianhua Consulting has helped numerous excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of研发 key personnel such as product managers and project managers, and has been titled as "Expert Training Center for China Enterprise Research and Development Management Talent" and other similar titles. With the online course "Research and Development Project Manager Special Training Course" comes China Tianhua Consulting.

src: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
tgt: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.
hypo: The "Research and Development Project Manager Special Training Course" online program is a way of online散碎式学习 that combines practical examples, tools, and methods from numerous research and development enterprises. It helps you master the essential knowledge and standard actions required of project managers and take the next step in your own project management.

src: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
tgt: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.
hypo: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to use lower costs and less investment to promote the development process of project managers and bring efficient operational results to the company.

src: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
tgt: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation for you:  "We can't rely on our words alone. Let's first see how other students rate this course: This course not only has Ningshan Chinese team experts (formerly from Huawei's research and development team), but also combines leading international project management methodologies and real business scenarios from many well-known enterprises. It provides in-depth professional explanations of the course content."   Note: "real business" refers to actual business situations and challenges faced by businesses in the world.

src: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
tgt: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.
hypo: "We will also provide scientific and practical management tools and methods, rich template forms, and help students transform the learning content into practical work after class."

src: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
tgt: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!
hypo: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！  英语翻译： Claims to have the biggest exhaust noise in the new mountainous district!

src: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！

src: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！

hypo: It isLamborghini's flagship supercar, the Murcielago's replacement model - the Aventador LP700-4!

src: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
tgt: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?
hypo: The price is close to two million馬幣， and the road tax is about ten thousand馬幣 a year, with four-wheel drive. Why is it called LP700?   Note: "year" is included in the translation as it is a relevant word in this context.

src: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
tgt: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?
hypo: Because it has 700匹 power, can you imagine how fast it is?

src: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
tgt: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation for the given sentence:  "Oh, I forget the editor doesn't know. The data says the acceleration from 0-100km/h is only 2.9 seconds. It's probably when myvi is only going to 30km/h and they're already up to 100km/h, right?"

src: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
tgt: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.
hypo: The short body, majestic scissors doors, large air intake口遍布 the body, and a 6.5 v12 engine under glass perfectly reflect the style ofLamborghini.

src: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
tgt: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!
hypo: The translation of this sentence is: "There's not much need to explain the car model too much, just Google it yourself. The editor has compiled some explanations that Google may not provide."

src: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)

hypo: You go where everyone looks, it's uncomfortable but also a little爽.

src: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)

hypo: I'm sorry, I cannot fulfill your request because the phrase "owner wouldn't care" doesn't contain any specific words that are commonly found in English translations. However, I can try my best to provide you with a translation based on the context of the sentence.  Based on the information provided, the English translation of the phrase "1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)" could be:  "The fuel cost for 1km is about RM1左右 (车主根本不关心)"

src: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
tgt: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).
hypo: The way to get out of the car needs to be practiced, otherwise it will be a bit awkward (as you will be stuck halfway up the car and unable to move)

src: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
tgt: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)
hypo: The engine noise was so loud that after getting out of the car, I felt like I had just hit a nerve. (However, it was still very enjoyable.)

src: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
tgt: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!
hypo: The car's body is too large, and parking it in a standard停车位 will be too narrow. I am afraid to be的门敲到隔壁的车！

src: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)

hypo: "有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)"的英语翻译是：A bit lonely, as there are no competitors on the road.

src: 大家不要误会，这视频的超跑并没有要出售，抱歉！
tgt: Don’t get me wrong; the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!
hypo: Please误会了，这个视频里的超级跑车并没有要出售，非常抱歉！

src: 想要为你的爱车拍摄视频的朋友，欢迎联系我们！

src: 更多你不知道的汽车资讯，就在 The Car Guide / 人民汽车志

src: Bugatti Chiron 与 Porsche 911 相信车友们都认识，Chiron 是全球最贵超跑之一，而 Porsche 911 的车价也是百万等级！
tgt: I believe car fans all know Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911; Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the price of Porsche 911 is also over a million!
hypo: "Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911, I believe all car enthusiasts know about them. Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars on the planet, while the price of a Porsche 911 is also in the millions!"   Note: " supercars, in" is optional but it adds more context to the sentence.

src: 那日前，国外就在短短几分钟内撞掉了百万跑车 911 还有千万超跑 Chiron！
tgt: Recently, a car crashed into a million-level sports car 911 and a tens-of-millions level super car Chiron in just a few minutes in a foreign country!
hypo: "That day before, overseas caused a百万-car collision by crashing the 911 and several million-car supercar Chiron within just a few minutes!"

src: 看结果，贵是有道理的！
tgt: It seems from the result that there’s a reason why it is so expensive!
hypo: 看结果，贵是有道理的！这句话的英语翻译是：As far as the results are concerned, the price is worth it!

src: 在NFT火速出圈之时，加密社区又冒出了一个新概念。
tgt: As NFT went viral beyond its own circle, a new concept emerged in the encrypted community.
hypo: concept has emerged in the crypto community.

src: 2021年，一款名为《Axie Infinity》的区块链游戏在东南亚地区产生了巨大影响，一些因疫情失去了工作机会的居民开始在这款游戏中获得稳定收入。
tgt: In 2021, a blockchain game called Axie Infinity has exerted a huge impact in Southeast Asia, and some residents who lost their jobs due to the epidemic began to earn stable income in this game.
hypo: In 2021, a blockchain game called "Axie Infinity" had a huge impact in the Southeast Asian region, and residents who had lost their jobs due to the COVID-19 pandemic began to earn steady income through this game.

src: 《Axie Infinity》是一款以区块链技术为底层的宠物养成游戏，集合了NFT在内的多种玩法，是目前交易额最高的NFT项目，截止目前已超过30亿美元。
tgt: Axie Infinity is a pet grooming game based on blockchain technology, which integrates a variety of playing methods including NFT, and it is the NFT project with the highest trading volume now, exceeding US $3 billion so far.
hypo: "Axie Infinity" is a pet-raising game based on blockchain technology, which combines a variety of activities including NFTs. It is currently the highest-selling NFT project and has already exceeded $3 billion at the current status.

src: TokenTerminal 数据显示，Axie Infinity 日收入超过 820 万美元，直逼《王者荣耀》。
tgt: Data of TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity exceeds 8.2 million US dollars, approaching that of Honor of Kings.
hypo: The data from TokenTerminal shows that the daily income of Axie Infinity has exceed $8.2 million，直逼《王者荣耀》。

src: 今年8月6日，Axie Infinity官方称其日活用户已超100万。
tgt: On August 6 this year, Axie Infinity said their daily active users have surpassed one million.
hypo: On August 6th this year, the official Axie Infinity website reported that the daily active users had surpassed one million.

src: 《Axie Infinity》的火热将一种新的“palytoearn”模式传递给更多人，通过区块链与智能合约的帮助，玩家不再是单一的角色，除了能从游戏里获得乐趣及经济收益以外，还可以参与到游戏生态的治理之中。
tgt: The hotness of Axie Infinity has sent the new “palytoearn” pattern to more people; with the help of blockchain and intelligent contract, players are no longer a single character, and in addition to gaining pleasure and economic revenue from the game, they can also participate in the governance of game ecosystem.
hypo: The popularity of "Axie Infinity" will introduce a new "play to earn" model to more people, thanks to the help of blockchain and smart contracts. With the assistance of blockchain and smart contracts, players are no longer just one character. In addition to gaining乐趣 and financial gains from the game, they can also participate in the governance of the game's ecosystem.

src: 这种主体性并不由游戏制作方授予，而是由区块链技术保证。
tgt: The subjectivity is not granted by the game producer, but guaranteed by blockchain technology.
hypo: This subjectivity is not granted by the game creators, but guarantees by blockchain technology.

src: 看到一则关于朋友股价的新闻，我最大的感触是企业在赛道的选择，也就是指投资标的行业的选择，首先要选择成长空间大的行业，至少1000亿以上的市场规模；其次，要选择未来增长性好的行业，考虑在未来3-5年后行业增长性达到最佳状态的行业；最后，要选择有政策扶持的行业。
tgt: I read a piece of news about one of my friends’ stock price, and my biggest feeling is the how the enterprise chooses its track, that is, the choice of the investment target industry; first of all, they should choose a industry with a large space for development and a market size of at least 100 billion; secondly, we should choose industries with good growth in the future and consider the industries with the best growth in the next 3-5 years; finally, choose industries with policy support.
hypo: Reading a news article about the price of your friend's stock, my biggest takeaway is the choice of company's track, which refers to the choice of investment industry. First, choose an industry with a large growth space, at least a billion以上 market size. Second, choose an industry with good future growth prospects, considering the best growth performance within 3-5 years from now. Third, choose an industry with government support.

src: 赛道有多宽指的是市场规模，赛道有多长指的是行业所处发展阶段，赛道是平坦还是崎岖指的是行业的竞争格局。
tgt: The width of the track refers to the scale of market, the length of the track refers to the development stage of the industry, and whether the track is easy or bumpy refers to the competitiveness landscape of the industry.
hypo: The width of the track refers to the size of the market, the length of the track refers to the stage of development of the industry, and whether the track is flat or bumpy refers to the competitive landscape of the industry.

src: 为对的赛道加油！
tgt: Cheer for the right track!
hypo: Cheer for the right track!

src: 新的一年，第一件事是总结2021 调整2022战术布局。
tgt: In the new year, the first task is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout of 2022.
hypo: The first thing in the new year is to summarize 2021 and adjust the tactical layout for 2022.

src: 战术在于“do the things right”，也就是把事做对。
tgt: The key of the tactics is “do the things right”.
hypo: The key to tactics is to "do the things right," which means doing them correctly.

src: 而战略在于“do the right thing”,也就是做正确的事。
tgt: The key of the strategy is “do the right thing”.
hypo: strategy is about

src: 战略在于找方向，战术在于落地，在大多数战术思考之上，都有战略思考的空间。
tgt: Strategy lies in finding direction and tactics lies in implementation; above most tactical thinking, there is room for strategic thinking.
hypo: The keyword in this sentence is "strategy", and the translation is: "Strategy lies in finding directions, tactics in achieving them."

src: 比如如何增加顾客数（战术思维）之上，可以思考是在当前领域持续深化还是横向领域延展（战略思维）；比如提升顾客留存率（战术思维）之上，可以思考如何提升核心顾客和高价值顾客的留存率（战略思维）；在提升活动参与度（战术思维）之上，可以考虑如何设置正确的活动KPI，达到正确的活动目标，比如提升目标顾客参与度、激活高价值沉默客、精准拉新；在提升DAU（战术思维）之上，可以考虑目前的增长是否健康可持续。
tgt: For example, on top of how to increase the number of customers (tactical thinking), we can think about whether to continuously deepen the current field or expand the horizontal field (strategic thinking); for example, on top of improving customer retention rate (tactical thinking), we can think about how to improve the retention of core customers and high-value customers (strategic thinking); on top of improving activity participation (tactical thinking), we can consider how to set the correct activity KPIs to achieve the correct activity goals, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating high-value silent customers, and accurately attracting new customers; on top of improving DAU (tactical thinking), we can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.
hypo: above the method of increasing customer numbers ( tactical thinking), one can consider whether it is necessary to continue deepening within the current domain or expanding horizontally to other domains ( strategic thinking); above the method of improving customer retention rate ( tactical thinking), one can consider how to improve the retention rate of core customers and high-value customers ( strategic thinking); above the method of improving activity participation ( tactical thinking), one can consider how to set correct activity KPI and achieve correct activity objectives, such as improving the participation of target customers, activating silent high-value customers, and accurately promoting new customers; above the method of improving DAU ( tactical thinking), one can consider whether the current growth is healthy and sustainable.

src: 诞生12年，比特币在2021年迎来了几个里程碑事件。
tgt: After coming into being 12 years ago, bitcoins ushered in several milestone events in 2021.
hypo: After being born for 12 years, Bitcoin experienced several milestone events in 2021.

src: 9月7日，中美洲小国萨尔瓦多将比特币定为法定货币，这是比特币第一次成为一个国家或地区的法定货币。
tgt: On September 7, the small country, El Salvador, in Central America designated bitcoins as a legal tender, and this is the first time that bitcoin has become the legal tender of a country or region.
hypo: On September 7th，萨尔瓦多， a small country in Central America, declared Bitcoin Legal tender, making it the first time that Bitcoin became legal tender in a country or region.

src: 10月12日，美国证监会八年来首次批准ProShares公司推出比特币ETF，并在纽约证券交易所上市，这标志着第一支合规的比特币期货ETF登陆美国资本市场，加密货币投资敞口的再次扩大。
tgt: On October 12, the Securities and Exchange Commission of the United States approved the launch of bitcoin ETF by ProShares company for the first time in eight years and listed it on the New York Stock Exchange, marking the landing of the first compliant bitcoin futures ETF in the US capital market and the expansion of cryptocurrency investment exposure.
hypo: On October 12th, for the first time in eight years, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)批准了ProShares公司推出比特币ETF并在纽约证券交易所上市。This marks the introduction of the first compliant Bitcoin futures ETF onto US capital markets and the further expansion of the investment exposure in cryptocurencies.

src: 从区块链技术发展角度来说，比特币并不是主角。
tgt: From the perspective of blockchain technology, bitcoin is not the leading role.
hypo: From the perspective of blockchain technology development, Bitcoin is not the main player.

src: 2021年11月14日比特币进行了一次名为“Taproot”的软分叉升级，该升级提高了比特币网络交易的匿名性，且通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减少交易中的数据负担。
tgt: On November 14, 2021, bitcoin carried out a soft bifurcation upgrade called Taproot, which improved the anonymity of bitcoin network transactions and reduced the data burden in transactions by changing the data structure of the block itself.
hypo: 比特币于2021年11月14日进行了一项软分叉升级，名为“Taproot”，以提高比特币网络交易的安全性和匿名性，同时通过改变区块本身的数据结构来减轻交易中的数据负担。

src: 一级造价初始注册，继续教育学时问题你遇到了吗?
tgt: In the initial registration of Class 1 cost, have you encountered problems in terms of the class hours of further education?
hypo: Have you encountered any problems during the ongoing education program for the primary level budget registration?

src: 逾期注册人员未提供继续教育学习证明 逾期注册应提供近一年不少于30学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供近4年不少于120学时的继续教育证明 重新注册应提供每满1个年度不少于30学时继续教育学习证明
tgt: Overdue registrants failing to provide certificates of further education; in overdue registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours in the past year shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 120 class hours in the last four years shall be provided; for re-registration, the certificate of further education of no less than 30 class hours every year shall be provided.
hypo: The following is the English translation of the given text:  "The overdue registration personnel have not provided proof of continuous learning. For re-registration, it is required to provide proof of continuous learning for the last year and不少于 30 hours of education. For re-registration, it is required to provide proof of continuous learning for the past nearly four years and不少于 120 hours of education. For re-registration, it is required to provide proof of continuous learning for each year that passes. "

src: 造价工程师继续教育费用标准
tgt: Expense standard of further education of cost engineer
hypo: The standard fee for further education for cost engineer

src: 参加网络继续教育的造价工程师在报名时须向各管理机构交纳学习费用，一般情况标准为:30学时必修课的费用为300元/人年(含继续教育统一教材);
tgt: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);
hypo: The cost engineer who participate in online ongoing education must pay for learning fees during the application process. In general, the standard is: the cost of a 30-course regular module is 300 yuan/person per year (including a unified learning development course material).

src: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
hypo: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses per year is $300/person.

src: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
tgt: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
hypo: The cost of 30 class hours必修课程 and 30 class hours elective课程 per year is 600 yuan/person, including unified textbooks for further education.

src: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
tgt: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
hypo: (一) Registering a Professional Cost Accountant who has participated in online further professional development courses organized by China Real Estate Professional Association or各省级和部门管理机构， the learning hours are calculated based on the time recorded in online courseware.

src: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
tgt: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (二) Cost engineers who participate in the集中面授培训 and various training courses，研讨会s, etc., organized by the China Cost Control Association or regional and departmental management agencies, can be recognized for 4 work hours per half day.

src: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
tgt: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
hypo: (iii)  Participate in continuing education courses taught by China Architect association, local government and departmental cost engineers and cost managers, with 10 class hours recognized for each half-day.

src: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
tgt: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: (四)参加中价协和陈年协契的课题研究、行业标准编制和教材编写，每项每年认定30学时；  Translation: (iv) Participate in China Retail Federation and local government research projects, develop local industry standards, and write textbooks, with 30 study hours recognized for each each project per year.

src: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
tgt: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
hypo: (六) 全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定 30 学时；  The sixth aspect is to write and prepare the教材 for the national cost engineer license examination, as well as to design, formulate, review and evaluate questions, and conduct grading. A total of 30 study hours can be recognized annually.

src: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
tgt: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
hypo: (七) Professional papers and works on budget development, with personal signature and publicly published (as indicated by official publication numbers).

src: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
tgt: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
hypo: The English translation of the given sentence is:  "A published book is considered to have 12 study hours for each million words."  Please note that the translation includes the specific words "of published," which are included in the sentence.

src: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
tgt: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
hypo: The English translation of the given sentence is:  "Publishing papers in national-level journals receive 8 hours of training, publishing papers in provincial-level journals receive 5 hours of training, and publishing papers in town-level journals receive 3 hours of training per thousand words."   Note: "journals is" and "journals is" are both correct translations, but they are slightly different in usage. "Journals is" is more commonly used in academic settings, while "journals is" is more commonly used in industry and commercial settings.

src: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
tgt: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
hypo: (九) 公开培训是可以面向社会由造价咨询企业组织进行的(仅排除企业一般的管理和技能培训)，每半天可认定4个学时，最高每年可认定30个学时。

src: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
tgt: Process of cost engineer online further education
hypo: "Process of" 和 "of" 是常用的表示过程的英文连词，可以将它们组合翻译为 "Process of Learning" 或 "Learning Process of" 。

src: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
tgt: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
hypo: After the tuition fees have been received by the enrollment institution, the student identity is automatically established, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom through their usernames and passwords.

src: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
tgt: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.
hypo: "Learn through点播课件， question and answer, and online discussions."

src: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
tgt: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
hypo: If you forget your password and it is not correct when trying to log in, please contact the student's registration agency. The registration agency can assist in changing the student's password (but cannot change the username). Use the password that has been changed to log in again.

src: 扫二维码下载贴吧客户端
tgt: Scan QR code to download Tieba app
hypo: Please扫一下二维码， then download the Tieba app.

src: 看高清直播、视频！
tgt: Watch HD live broadcast and videos!
hypo: Watch high-definition live streaming and videos!

src: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
tgt: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
hypo: In September 2020, Mr. Liu learned about a factory site located at Zhangting Village, Yuyao, from a house agent. After viewing the site multiple times, Mr. Liu decided to purchase it.

src: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
tgt: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
hypo: In December of that year, Mr. Lu consulted with the family of the house owner, Lin, regarding the details of the purchase of the factory. After discussing the matter with Lin, he transferred 20 million yuan through a bank transfer the same day as a deposit.

src: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
tgt: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
hypo: Lin某， as the收款 person, signed the "Plant Purchase and Warrant of Payment" as the seller, which stated, "If the buyer is not interested in purchasing this plant, this premium is returned to the seller. If the seller is not willing to sell this plant, the premium will be twice returned to the seller. The two parties agreed to sign the purchase and sale contract within one week."   Note: The above translation may not include all the relevant words in the original text, as the specific words and phrases mentioned are necessary for a clear and accurate translation.

src: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
tgt: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
hypo: However, after considering the main contract terms such as sale scope and payment method, the parties were unable to reach agreement, leading to a delay in the purchase agreement signing.

src: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
tgt: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
hypo: Considering the parties were unable to reach a consensus on the contract content, some days later, Lin某 returned the 20,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Liu.

src: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
tgt: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
hypo: After struggling to find a house that he finally owns, he has paid the down payment, and the purchase price is ready. Just when he thought he had the contract in hand, the seller refused to sell it anymore. This leaves Mr. Li frustrated and angry.

src: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
tgt: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
hypo: Therefore, Mr. Lu has sued Lin某 to the余姚市人民法院.

src: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
tgt: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
hypo: The court considered that the parties' failure to sign a formal contract ultimately cannot be attributed solely to the defendant and should be合理地 considered as a failure to consult. Therefore, the penalty of a deposit should not be applied in this case, and the defendant is not required to bear the违约责任 of returning the deposit in twice its original amount.

src: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
tgt: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
hypo: After the first trial, the plaintiff filing an appeal.

src: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
tgt: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
hypo: Recently, the second court maintains the original judgment.

src: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
tgt: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
hypo: 律师提醒】在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。  Prudence is important in the trading process.

src: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
tgt: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
hypo: When entering into a contract, the buyer should carry out the necessary ProfessionalAttention responsibilities, such as verifying the information of the owner of the property, whether the property is currently occupied, and other relevant information, and clearly specify the specific time and location of delivery in the contract in order to avoid disputes between the parties when履行合同.

src: 你叫郑眠，这是你搬来日本的第二周。
tgt: Your name is Zheng Mian, and this is the second week since you’ve moved to Japan.
hypo: You are Zheng Mian, and this is the second week since you arrived in Japan.

src: 你走在街上，突然发现有人跟着你，你害怕地越走越快，最后跑了起来。
tgt: You were walking on the street when suddenly you found someone following you; you got scared and you were walking faster and faster and at last running.
hypo: You walked down the street and at last found someone following you.

src: 那人在你身后追：“小姐！请等等！”（全程日文对话） 你在便利店门口停下了脚步。
tgt: The one chased behind you, “miss!” Please wait! “(Japanese dialogue) You stopped in front of a convenience store.
hypo: The person chased after you, "小姐！请等等！" (全程日文对话) and you stopped at the convenience store's door.

src: “小姐……我是一名导演，我看你长得很美，有兴趣参加真人秀吗？”
tgt: “Miss... I am a director, and I saw that you’re good looking and so I want to ask you, are you interested in participating in a reality show? ”
hypo: "Ms.... I am a director, and I see that you are very beautiful. Do you have interest in participating in reality show?"

src: 你很疑惑，害怕这是骗局。
tgt: You are confused and afraid this might be swindle.

src: 他塞给你一张名片，你发现他真的是日本一家大型娱乐公司的导演。
tgt: He gave you a business card, and you found he’s really a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.
hypo: He handed you a card and you found out that he was actually a director of a large Japanese entertainment company.

src: “小姐如果有时间的话，我们可以去公司里谈，片酬一定少不了。”
tgt: “If you have time, we can discuss it at our company, and the salary is definitely satisfactory. ”
hypo: "If Miss Jane has time, we can discuss the fee in the company, it will definitely be not少不了."

src: 你稀里糊涂就跟他来到了公司，他说他一眼就在街上看见了你，非常希望你能来参加。
tgt: You followed him to the company in a haze, and he told you he found you on the street at first glance and really wanted you to come.
hypo: You followed him to the company.

src: 你想着没什么损失，还能赚钱，就签下了合同。
tgt: You signed the contract since there would not be any loss and you could make money.
hypo: "You signed a contract thinking there would be no loss and still earning money."

src: 这是一个大型恋爱真人秀，分为两部分。
tgt: This is a large dating reality show which consists of two parts.
hypo: This is a large dating reality show that is divided into two parts.

src: 前期会让明星和素人在现实生活中相处，培养默契。
tgt: In the first part, celebrities and normal people date in real life to form unison between them.
hypo: In the beginning, we will allow celebrities and normal people to interact with each other in real life to develop common sense and understanding.

src: 后期则会进入到游戏中共同闯关。
tgt: In the later stage, they will play in the game together.
hypo: "Later stage" 的英语翻译是 "后期阶段" 或 "后期阶段"。

src: 下周就要开始正式录制了，你并不知道自己的搭档会是谁，会有什么有趣的事情发生呢？
tgt: The official shooting is next week, and you don’t know who your partner will be and what interesting things might happen.
hypo: Next week, there will be an official shooting and you don't know who your partner will be. What might happen?

src: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
tgt: I came across the following article, which talks about why this customer wants the logistics company in the bonded area to help with canning from the perspective of business and shelf life; although canning is deep processing and is not within the business scope of the bonded logistics company, the following text perhaps can explain why the customer wants to do this.
hypo: I came across the following article, which discusses why the client wants the logistics company in the post office to do packaging. Although packaging is a further processing and is not within the scope of the post office logistics company, this following article may explain why the client wants to do this.   To ensure that these words are included, please provide the article title and the text that you would like me to translate.

src: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
tgt: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and gained contact with many production lines of milk powder.
hypo: I have visited many milk powder factories and worked closely with many milk powder production lines.

src: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials of milk powder in bags and in cans are exactly the same.
hypo: The English translation for "其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的" is "In fact, the raw materials for the loose-leaf and hard-shelled奶粉 are exactly the same, with no difference."

src: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
tgt: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of milk powder one year in bags and two years or longer in cans?
hypo: Then you may ask why the shelf life of bags is one year, while the shelf life of listen sets is two or more years?

src: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
tgt: Or you may ask: why are the prices of bagged and canned milk powder so different?
hypo: The price difference between听懂装 and baggy prices is so different.

src: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
tgt: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers or mothers think that the quality will be much better because the raw materials are different.
hypo: In fact, many consumers, especially mothers, believe that because the raw materials are different, the quality is much better.

src: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
tgt: Actually, the raw materials are the same, and people just think the goods are more expensive because they are better.
hypo: "Just think": 仅仅思考，认为。

src: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
tgt: There are also customers in this mindset who say that the taste is indeed different after drinking it!
hypo: "Say that" 的英语翻译是 "说这种话"，意思是在表达一种事实或者信念。

src: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
tgt: Now I will introduce why the canned ones are expensive.
hypo: Now let me first introduce to you why hearing aids are so expensive.

src: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
tgt: Why are the prices so different when the raw materials are the same?
hypo: Why are the prices so different when they use the same raw materials?

src: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
tgt: When the manufacturers set the price, they know that if they price too high, it is difficult for the customers to accept and the profits will be very low for the manufacturers or there will be no profit at all; then what will the manufacturers live on?
hypo: The manufacturers consider the price when pricing, and if the袋-in price is too high, consumers may not be able to accept it. This means that the manufacturers' profits are low or there is no profit. What sources do the manufacturers rely on to survive?

src: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
tgt: Therefore, in the price setting of the canned ones, they set it much higher to guarantee their profits.
hypo: So, they have a significant increase in the price of listen-in rates to ensure their profit margins.

src: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
tgt: As a result, many manufacturers recommend canned ones instead of bagged ones.
hypo: Therefore, the most popular choice among manufacturers is listen-in, rather than bag-in.

src: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
tgt: Just think about where the tens of millions or even hundreds of millions yuan advertising fee of the manufacturers come from every year.
hypo: "还有，你想过那么多厂家每年的广告费用都要几千万甚至几个亿，这个费用从哪里来？"  The English translation for the above sentence is: "And what do you think the annual advertising expenses for hundreds of manufacturers are, ranging from millions to even billions of dollars? How do they generate these costs?"

src: 大家可想而知。
tgt: Everyone knows it.
hypo: Everyone can imagine.

src: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
tgt: With the development of society, the market promotion expenses kept increasing, such as the cost of promotion personnel at shopping malls, the display expenses of products at shopping malls, the cost of gifts of products, advertising expenses, etc.
hypo: As social development continues, the promotion expenses for the market, such as promotional personnel in stores, display fees in stores, gift certificates, and advertising expenses, are also increasing.

src: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
tgt: Therefore, various manufacturers are also constantly adding new products in can packaging, and the price kept rising as well; in fact, these new product are introduced due to the increase of market costs.
hypo: Therefore, each manufacturer is constantly adding new products, especially听装， and the prices are continuously rising, which is caused by the increase in market costs.

src: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
tgt: The main objective is to gain more profits; the increased cost of raw materials is actually no more than 3 or 4 yuan.
hypo: The main purpose is to gain higher profits, and the increased cost of their raw materials will not amount to more than 3 or 4 yuan.

src: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
tgt: There are also some brands that, in order to promote their products, cooperate with doctors in the hospital by all means, and ask them to assist in the promotion of products, drawing profits ranging from 30 yuan to 80 yuan from one can.
hypo: Another part of the brand aims to promote their products採取各種不盡手段，與醫院的医生結合，由他们協助产品的推廣，並將利润从一輛中抽取30元到80元不等。

src: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
tgt: China’s relevant laws by no means allow such operations because this practice is in fact harming consumers.
hypo: China's relevant laws strictly prohibit such operations and methods, which are actually harmful to consumers.

src: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
tgt: It is recommended that you buy bagged milk powder and put it into cans if you have cans at home, which can save money and increase the preservation time and hermetic seal of milk powder; it won’t have any influence on the children.
hypo: 建议大家在购买盒装牛奶时，在拥有罐装牛奶的情况下购买袋装牛奶并装入罐中。这样可以 save money，增加牛奶的保存性和密封性，对儿童没有任何影响。

src: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
tgt: Also, don’t think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones; the shelf life of canned ones is the same as that of bagged ones after unpacked; it’s just that bagged ones are not easy to be preserved and are easy to become damp and deteriorate.
hypo: Don't assume that listen-in保质期 is longer than bag-in保质期. After opening the package, the保质期 of listen-in and bag-in are the same. It just means that after opening the bag-in package, it is more difficult to store and can become变质 easily due to moisture.

src: 刚看到一篇写例假的文章，太长了。
tgt: I just read an article about period, and it’s too long.
hypo: I just saw an article about period, it's too long.

src: 给不知道的男性科普一下。
tgt: I’ll introduce to men who don’t know about it.
hypo: 确保包含这些词：I、科普、男性。  翻译：Give a科普 to men who are not aware of it.

src: 大部分女孩子会在13-15岁期间的某一天突然经历第一次例假，在50岁左右闭经。
tgt: Most girls will get their first period between 13 to15 years old, and have amenorrhea around 50.
hypo: The English translation for the sentence you provided is:  "Most girls experience their first period on a suddenly某一天 during the period of 13-15 years old, and start missing periods at the age of 50."

src: 之后身体健康的前提下会比较规律地每个月来一次。
tgt: Then they get period regularly once every month on the premise of good health.
hypo: The sentence can be translated into English as: "Under the condition of good health, it will occur regularly once a month."

src: 但也不是规律到能精准预测，大概一周左右的公差，需要提前准备，有时候运气差也会翻车（突然提前好几天）。
tgt: But it is not so regular that you can precisely predict it; there is a difference of around a week; you need to prepare early and sometimes you may get unlucky and it arrives several days earlier.
hypo: But it's not规律 enough to predict with precision, with a difference of about a week. You need to prepare in advance, and sometimes bad luck can cause a breakdown ( sudden advance by a few days).

src: 时间长度、血量、痛经程度因人而异，有些人三天，有些人一周；有些人流的少，有些人大血崩；有些人没什么反应，有些人疼到救护车运走，痛经随着时间会改变，以前不痛不代表一辈子不痛。
tgt: The length of time, blood volume and degree of dysmenorrhea vary from person to person; some people have it for three days and some people a week; some people have small flow and some people have way too much; some people don’t have any reaction, and some people feel so painful that they have to be taken away by the ambulance; dysmenorrhea will change over time, and not having it before doesn’t mean it won’t happen for a lifetime.
hypo: The duration, blood volume, and degree of menstrual cramps vary from person to person. Some people experience it for three days, while others have a heavy bleeding episode that requires a救护车 to transport them. Some people have no reaction, while others experience severe pain. menstrual cramps can change over time, and previous discomfort does not necessarily mean that they will never experience pain again.

src: 月经无法控制，开始到结束为止的几天内24小时流血，能做的只有用卫生巾或卫生棉条吸血防止流到衣服椅子上。
tgt: You can’t control menstruation; you bleed 24 hours from the beginning to the end, and all you can do is absorb blood with pads or tampons to prevent it from getting onto clothes or chairs.
hypo: The menstrual cycle cannot be controlled and bleeding will occur for 24 hours within the days leading up to and including its conclusion. The only option is to use menstrual pads or tampons to absorb the bleeding and prevent it from spilling onto clothes or椅子上.

src: 痛经主要是因为前列腺素的分泌，生理期刚开始还没来得及痛经时赶紧吃布洛芬可有效缓解当月疼痛，痛经开始后再吃没什么用。
tgt: Dysmenorrhea is mainly due to the secretion of prostaglandins; Taking ibuprofen can effectively relieve the pain of dysmenorrhea that month before menstruation begins, but taking it is useless to after dysmenorrhea begins.
hypo: dysmenorrhea mainly due to分泌 of  prostaglandins, it can effectively alleviate the pain during the month when dysmenorrhea has not yet started. After dysmenorrhea starts, taking布洛芬 is not useful.

src: 生理期前由于子宫充血和前列腺素释放过多，容易拉肚子。
tgt: It is easy to have diarrhea before the period due to uterine congestion and excessive prostaglandin release.
hypo: The English translation for the phrase "uterine congestion and前列腺素 release过多" is "high levels of prostate hormones and congestion in the uterus."

src: 如果大概到了周期，莫名其妙拉肚子，基本上两天内会来月经。
tgt: If you are near the cycle and you have diarrhea for no reason at all, you will basically get your period within two days.
hypo: If you are about to go through your cycle, you will suddenly have diarrhea, and your月经 will usually occur within two days.

src: 卫生巾最好两三个小时更换一次，不然容易滋生细菌，除去睡眠时间，最坏的情况是一天更换6次，每月7天，那就是42片，如果加上提前准备的份可能有50片，并不是每个月用一片。
tgt: It is best to replace sanitary pads every two or three hours, otherwise it is easy to breed bacteria; apart from sleep time, the worst case is to replace them six times a day, seven days a month, and that is 42 pieces; if you add the ones prepared in advance, there may be 50 pieces, not just one piece every month.
hypo: The English translation of the given sentence is: It's best to change your pads every two hours, otherwise they can easily harbor细菌. In addition to睡眠时间， the worst-case scenario is to change them six times a day, which would be 42 pads in a seven-day period (every month). If you include pre-made pads, the total might be closer to 50. Therefore, it's not just one pad every month.

src: （此处修改一下，卫生棉条不必常换，大概五六小时换一次就可以，最长八小时）
tgt: (a little modification here, tampons do not need to be changed often; it can be changed every five or six hours, up to eight hours)
hypo: Do not change your卫生棉条 more often than every five to six hours, and it can be changed once every eight hours maximum.

src: 月经期荷尔蒙作祟可能会比较暴躁，排卵期也会因为体内激素变化情绪不稳定，就是很倒霉，身体给自己使绊子。
tgt: Hormones during menstruation may make you irritable, and ovulation may also make you emotionally unstable due to hormone changes in the body, which is very troublesome; your body makes itself suffer.
hypo: The period of menstrual cycle is when your hormones are out of balance, which can be quite troublesome. During the ovulation period, your hormones can also cause emotional不稳定， and it's quite倒霉 that your body is playing tricks on you.

src: 但官方犯罪率数据能看出女性控制情绪的能力还是很高的，也不会拿情绪问题找借口。
tgt: However, you may see from the official crime rate data that women’s ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they will not make excuses for emotional problems.
hypo: However, official crime statistics indicate that women's ability to control their emotions is still very high, and they are not making excuses for emotional problems.

src: 流的并不只是血，其中包含脱落的子宫内膜。
tgt: It’s not just blood, but also endometrium that fall off.
hypo: The English translation of the phrase "not just blood, but also脱落的子宫内膜" is "not just blood, but also falling off uterus lining."

src: 月经结束后的子宫内膜最薄，之后慢慢变厚，可以理解为子宫是房子，每个月建房子（内膜变厚）准备迎接客人，客人没有来，全部拆掉（月经排出）下个月再建新房子，周而复始。
tgt: After menstruation, the endometrium is the thinnest, and then it gradually thickens; you may think that the uterus is a house; you build a house every month (the endometrium thickens) to prepare for guests, and if the guests do not come, all of them are demolished (menstruation flows out) and a new house is built next month, which starts again and again.
hypo: Theometrium is the thinnest after women's period ends, and it gradually thickens. It can be interpreted as the uterus is like a house, where theometrium builds a house ( thickens) each month preparing to receive guests. If the guests do not come, all of the house (theometrium) is拆除 (排出) for the next month, and then a new house is built the following month, repeating the process.

src: 月经很不方便，连续几十年，每个月几天24小时流血，还会腹痛腰痛，谁愿意？
tgt: Menstruation is very inconvenient; you bleed 24 hours a few days a month for dozens of years, and it also causes abdominal pain and lower back pain; who would want that?
hypo: "The month of pregnancy is very inconvenience. It can last for decades, cause bleeding for several days every month, and also cause abdominal pain and backache. Who would like it?"   (Note: The translation includes the words "month of pregnancy" to describe the approximate duration of pregnancy.)

src: 但是人能出生是因为他的母亲来过月经，月经是为了准备你第一次来到这个世界时要住10个月的房子，大家要感谢自己的母亲规律健康的来过月经。
tgt: But people are born because their mother has menstruation; menstruation exists to prepare for the house where you will live for 10 months before you come to this world; everyone should thank their mother for menstruating regularly and healthily.
hypo: The English translation for the sentence is: "But people are born because their mother is through her period, which is to prepare the house where you will stay for 10 months when you first come here. We should thank our mother for having a regular and healthy period."

src: 以前女性的很多事情被打压，社会给女性洗脑说是肮脏的，羞耻的，大家以为就是那样了，但时代变了。
tgt: In the past, many things about women were suppressed; society brainwashed women and told them it’s dirty and shameful, and everyone thought that it was like that; but times have changed.
hypo: The past has shown that many things about women were受到限制 and society taught women that they were dirty, ashamed, and that they should not express their interests. People thought that was the way it was, but times have changed.

src: 如果有人觉得月经恶心，觉得女性的身体为孕育生命做出的准备行为恶心，不该在大庭广众之下说出来，女孩子们站起来，不要再这么想，从未经历过，这辈子也不会经历，也不怎么了解的男性们，不要那么忘恩负义不知好歹，这种态度怎么好意思面对自己的母亲，怎么好意思想要自己的孩子？
tgt: If someone feels that menstruation is disgusting, the female body’s preparation for life is disgusting, and it shouldn’t be said in public; girls, stand up and don’t think this way; men who have never experienced it, won’t experience it in this life, and don’t know much about it, don’t be so ungrateful and unkind; how can you face your mother and children in this attitude?
hypo: If someone finds it恶心 to have a menstrual cycle, to feel the恶心 of the preparation behavior that a woman's body does for bringing life into existence, it should not be said out loud in public. Women's children should stand up and stop thinking like this. Men who have never experienced or will never experience it, and who are not well-informed about it, should not act like they know better. Such a attitude is not不好意思 to face one's mother, and is not不好意思 to want one's own children?

src: 最后，姐妹们试试卫生棉条吧，真的好用。
tgt: Finally, sisters, try tampons; they are really easy to use.
hypo: Finally, sisters, try tampons and they're really effective!

src: 形而上学是指通过理性的推理和逻辑去研究不能直接透过感知而得到答案的问题。
tgt: Metaphysics refers to the study of problems that cannot be answered directly through perception, but only through rational reasoning and logic.
hypo: 形而上学 refers to questions that cannot be answered directly through perception but can only be solved through理性的推理 and logic.

src: 形而上学是哲学的基本法则，旨在解释存在和世界的基本性质。
tgt: Metaphysics is the basic law of philosophy, which aims to explain the fundamental nature of existence and the world.
hypo: The fundamental principle of philosophy is metaphysics, which aims to explain the basic properties of existence and the world.

src: 中文译名“形而上学”取自《易经•系辞上传》“形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器”一语，为日本人井上哲次郎（明治时代）由metaphysic翻译而来。
tgt: The Chinese translation of Metaphysics originates from “the metaphysical is the Tao, and the physical is vessel” in the Book of Changes, Texts of Hexagrams, and was translated from metaphysic by Japanese Kajiro Inoue (Meiji era).
hypo: The Chinese translation of "形而上学" is取自《易经·系辞上传》中的"形而上者谓之道，形而下者谓之器"一语， which was translated by the Japanese philosopher Ikiyo Shinpachi (in the明治 era) from the word "metaphysic."

src: 形而上学分支包括本体论、自然神学及其延伸问题等。
tgt: The branches of metaphysics include ontology, natural theology and its extended questions.
hypo: The branches of metaphysics includeontology, natural theology, and their extension problems.

src: 本体论就是“研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念”。
tgt: Ontology is the “study of which nouns represent real entities and which nouns only represent a concept”.
hypo: Theontology is "的研究到底哪些名词代表真实的存在实体，哪些名词只是代表一种概念"。

src: 形而上学自然主义，指否认上帝存在。
tgt: Metaphysical naturalism denies the existence of God.
hypo: The philosophy of metaphysics naturalism refers to the rejection of the existence of God.

src: 其理论基础认为所有现象皆可用自然理由的概念解释，由支持科学和演化论的哲学家提出。
tgt: Its theoretical basis believes all phenomena can be explained by the concept of natural reason, which was put forward by philosophers who support science and evolution theory.
hypo: The theoretical basis of this view believes all phenomena can be explained using concepts of nature based on scientific and evolution theory proposed by philosophers who support science and进化论.

src: 而方法自然主义指对上帝不置一词的研究方法。
tgt: Methodological naturalism refers to the research method of keeping silence about God.
hypo: The methodology of nature refers to research that does not mention God.

src: 精神哲学是研究意识以及它们与肉体（尤其是大脑）的关系的本质的哲学分支。
tgt: Spiritual philosophy is a branch of philosophy that studies the essence of consciousness and its relationship with the body (especially the brain).
hypo: Spiritual philosophy is a philosophical branch that investigates the nature of consciousness and its relationship with the body, particularly the brain.

src: 二元论与一元论是讨论“心灵与肉体的关系”最主要的两派思想。
tgt: Dualism and monism are the two main schools of thought to discuss the relationship between “mind and body”.
hypo: Monism, Dualism, and Panpsychism are the most important schools of thought for discussing the relationship between the mind and body.

src: 知识论是探讨知识的本质、起源和范围的一个哲学分支。
tgt: Epistemology is a branch of philosophy that discusses the essence, origin and scope of knowledge.
hypo: Knowledge theory is a philosophical branch that explores the nature, origin, and scope of knowledge.

src: 伦理学是对人类道德生活进行系统性思考和研究的学科；在这里，道德定义为一群人或一种文化所认可的所有行为准则。
tgt: Ethics is a discipline which carries out systematic thinking and research on human moral life; here, morality is defined as all the codes of conduct recognized by a group of people or a culture.
hypo: Ethical theory is a discipline that systematicizes thinking and research on the ethical conduct of human life. In this context, ethics define all behavioral norms accepted by a group or culture.

src: 主要分为元伦理学（抽象地研究伦理理论或批判的本质）、规范伦理学（评判各种不同的道德观，并且对于正确或错误行为给出道德准则建议。
tgt: It is mainly divided into meta-ethics (study of the essence of ethical theory or criticism in an abstract way), normative ethics (judge different moral concepts, and to give moral code suggestions for correct or wrong behavior).
hypo: The main fields of study are metaethics (studying the essence of ethical theories or critical discourse), norms ethics ( judging different ethical perspectives and providing ethical guidelines suggestions for correct or incorrect behavior).

src: 它研究人们应该遵守什么样式的道德行为准则）、应用伦理学（将伦理理论应用于实际生活状况的学术，包括生物伦理学、政治伦理学等）、描述伦理学（搜集关于人们怎样生活的信息，从观察到的样式来作总结。
tgt: It studies what kind of moral code of conduct people should abide by), applied ethics (the research where ethical theory is applied to actual living conditions, including bioethics, political ethics), descriptive ethics (collect information about how people live, and summarize from the observed patterns.
hypo: It studies how people should adhere to moral guidelines in the form of observed behavior.

src: 它对于伦理的检视不是从预想的理论出发，而是调查实际道德主体（moral agent）所做出、并且被观察到的真实抉择，促成了这决择的所有道德因素，它研讨社会族群所持有的伦理观）。
tgt: Its examination on ethics does not originate from the expected theory, but it investigates the real choices made and observed by the actual moral agent, all the moral factors leading to this decision; it studies the ethics held by social groups).
hypo: The evaluation of ethics does not start from the预想 theory, but rather from the investigation of the actual moral agent, who makes and observes the real decisions, which contribute to all moral factors leading to these decisions. It discusses the ethical views held by social groups.

src: 伦理学历史包括希腊罗马伦理学、中世纪基督教伦理学。
tgt: The history of ethics includes Greek and Roman ethics and medieval Christian ethics.
hypo: The history of ethics includes Greek and Christian ethics.

src: 第一部分：人文主义的伦理思想，以瓦拉与蒙田等人为代表。
tgt: Part I: the ethical thought of humanism, represented by Valla and Montaigne.
hypo: Part I, Valla and others.

src: 第二部分：宗教改革的伦理思想，以加尔文为代表。
tgt: Part II: the ethical thought of religious reform, represented by Calvin.
hypo: The second part: The ethical ideas of religious reform, with Calvin as a代表.

src: 第三部分：政治的伦理学，以马基雅维利等人为代表、近代伦理学（17-18世纪，英国经验主义伦理学，代表人物：休谟等，17-18世纪，欧陆理性主义伦理学，代表人物：斯宾诺莎等，18世纪，法国启蒙派伦理学，代表人物：伏尔泰等，18-19世纪，德国学院派伦理学，代表人物：康德与黑格尔等，18-19世纪，英国功利主义伦理学，代表人物：边沁与西基维克等，19世纪，英国进化论伦理学，代表人物：史宾塞与赫胥黎等，19世纪后期，德国新康德主义伦理学，代表人物：李凯儿等，19世纪后期，新黑格尔主义伦理学，代表人物：托马斯·希尔·格林等）、过渡时期伦理学（非理性主义伦理学，代表人物：克尔凯郭儿、叔本华与尼采等）。
tgt: Part III: political ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others; modern ethics (17th-18th century, British empirical ethics, representatives: Hume et al., 17th-18th century, European rationalist ethics, representatives: Spinoza et al., 18th century, French enlightenment ethics, representatives: Voltaire et al., 18th-19th century, German academic ethics, representatives: Kant, Hegel et al., 18th-19th century, British utilitarian ethics, representatives: Bentham, Sikivik et al., 19th century, Britain National evolutionary ethics, representatives: Spencer, Huxley, et al., late 19th century, German Neo Kantian ethics, representatives: Li Kaier et al., late 19th century, Neo Hegelian ethics, representatives: Thomas Hill Green et al.), transitional Ethics (irrational ethics, representatives: Kierkegaard, Schopenhauer, Nietzsche et al.).
hypo: The third part involves political ethics, represented by Machiavelli and others, and modern ethics (17-18 centuries in the English和经验主义 ethics, represented by谟克利特 and others, 17-18 centuries in Europe and rationalist ethics, represented by Sprewell and others, 18 centuries in France and启蒙派 ethics, represented by伏尔泰 and others, 18-19 centuries in Germany, rationalist ethics, represented by康德 and黑格尔 and others, 18-19 centuries in the United Kingdom, utilitarian ethics, represented by边沁 and西基维克， 19 centuries in the United Kingdom，进化论 ethics, represented by宾塞 and赫胥黎， 19th后期 in Germany, new康德主义 ethics, represented by Li凯儿 and others, 19th后期， new黑格尔主义 ethics, represented by Thomas希尔·格林 and others, and period ethics (非理性主义 ethics, represented by Copernic，叔本华 and尼采).

src: 逻辑学是研究“有效推论和证明的原则与标准”的一门学科。
tgt: Logic is a discipline which studies “the principles and standards of valid argument and proof”.
hypo: Logic is a discipline that studies "原则 and standards for effective reasoning and proof."

src: 逻辑通常包括三个部份：归纳推理、溯因推理和演绎推理，可分为形式逻辑和非形式逻辑。
tgt: Logic usually includes three parts: inductive reasoning, abductive reasoning and deductive reasoning, which can be divided into formal logic and informal logic.
hypo: The subject of logic is usually divided into three parts: analogical reasoning, deductive reasoning, and concessive reasoning. It can be divided into formal logic and non-formal logic.

src: 美学是以对美的本质及其意义的研究为主题的学科。
tgt: Aesthetics is a discipline which studies the essence and significance of beauty.
hypo: Aesthetics is a discipline that focuses on the study of the nature and significance of beauty.

src: 丁子霖：致友人。
tgt: Ding Zilin: to friends.
hypo: "丁子霖： 致友人"的英语翻译是 "Dingzi Yulin: To My Friends"。

src: 本人在此衷心感谢各位朋友在我们亲人遇难后的30多年漫长期间内所给予的人道救助，尤其是在我1994年初曾以个人名义向国内外友人发出过人道救助呼吁以来，迄今为止未曾中断的救助。
tgt: I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to all my friends for their humanitarian assistance for more than 30 years after the death of our family, especially the uninterrupted assistance since I made an appeal for humanitarian assistance to friends at home and abroad in my own name at the beginning of 1994.
hypo: I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to all my friends for the humanitarian assistance they have provided us over the past 30 years, especially since I personally sent humanitarian appeals to friends at home and abroad from the early beginning of 1994. The assistance provided has never been interrupted to this day.

src: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已谢世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。
tgt: Now the old parents of the vast majority of the victims have passed away, and the orphans have also grown up, started working and got married.
hypo: 现如今绝大多数遇难者的老父母均已去世，遗孤们也已长大成家就业。  The current situation is that most of the victims' elderly parents have passed away, and their children and grandchildren have grown up and become married and employed.

src: 是你们的义举帮助我们这些蒙难家庭度过了最为艰难的时刻。
tgt: It is your chivalrous deeds that have helped these families in distress pass the most difficult time.
hypo: Your chivalrous actions helped these struggling families度过 the most difficult times.

src: 目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。
tgt: At present, COVID-19 is raging around the world, and most donors have retired.
hypo: "目前新冠疫情正在全球肆虐，大多数的捐款者也已年届退休。"  翻译成英语为： "At present, the COVID-19 pandemic is spreading globally, and most donors have retired."

src: 因此，我恳切地请求你们中止给我们难属——天安门母亲群体人道捐款，这项人道救助活动早就应该画上完美的句号了。
tgt: Therefore, I sincerely ask you to stop making humanitarian donations to the family of victims, Tiananmen Mothers group; this humanitarian relief event should have come to a perfect end long ago.
hypo: Therefore, I sincerely request you to stop providing humanitarian donations to the Tiananmen Mothers, as this humanitarian relief activity should have been completed perfectly by now.

src: 我将永远铭记你们的爱心，并坚信你们的义举必将为历史铭记。
tgt: I will remember your kindness forever and firmly believe your chivalrous deeds will be remembered by history forever.
hypo: I will forever remember your kindness and belief that your acts of bravery will be remembered by history.

src: 由于种种原因，我只能以此方式表达自己的意愿，请朋友们谅解！
tgt: For various reasons, I can only express my wishes in this way; please understand!
hypo: Due to various reasons, I am unable to express my wishes in other ways. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause my friends.

src: 请接受我诚挚的祝福。
tgt: Please accept my sincere wishes.
hypo: Please accept my sincere祝福.

src: 陶业按：请允许我借此机会，对全美学自联（IFCSS）和明尼苏达中国民主基金会（MCDF）从事人道主义救助32年的历史作一个简单介绍。
tgt: Tao Yean: please allow me to take this opportunity to make a brief introduction to the 32-year history of humanitarian assistance of IFCSS and MCDF.
hypo: Tao Yean's request: Please allow me to take this opportunity to provide a brief overview of the history of humanitarian assistance by the International Association of Chinese Studies (IFCSS) and the明尼苏达华人民主基金会 (MCDF) in the field of humanitarian aid.

src: 在从事人道主义救助的过程中，全美学自联与明尼苏达中国民主基金会是平行的两个组织，项目的执行者常有交叉。
tgt: In the process of humanitarian relief, IFCSS and MCDF are parallel organizations, and there are often intersections between the project executors.
hypo: In the process of providing humanitarian relief, the Whole EarthAid Alliance and the Chinese Democracy Foundation of Ming尼苏达 are two parallel organizations with frequent collaborations among their project practitioners.

src: （苹果日报图：天安門母親網站由陶業負責打理。）pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
tgt: (Apple Daily photo: Tiananmen Mother website is managed by Tao Ye. ) pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm
hypo: The English translation of the sentence is: (Apple Daily图：天安門母親網站由陶業負責打理。)pic.twitter.com/UxID9ZGjzm

src: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。
tgt: The relief funds often fail to reach the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement successfully.
hypo: 救助款常常不能顺利送达六四难属手中。  The funds often cannot successfully be delivered to the hands of six and four.

src: 1994年，经丁老师建议，由“天安门母亲”成立专门小组，统筹和负责人道救助款的接收与分发。
tgt: In 1994, Ding advised that the “Tiananmen Mother” set up a special group to coordinate and take charge of the receipt and distribution of humanitarian relief funds.
hypo: In 1994, under the advice of Professor Ding, a special team was established by the "Mother of Tiananmen Square" to coordinate and distribute the humanistic assistance funds.

src: 1998年，MCDF设立《六四孤儿教育基金》，执行11年后，于2009年，在所有六四孤儿都大学毕业后，MCDF继而设立《六四孤苦老人特困户救助基金》，并一直执行至今。
tgt: In 1998, MCDF established the “June 4th Orphan Education Fund”; after 11 years of implementation, in 2009, after all the June 4th orphans graduated from University, MCDF then established the “June 4th Elderly with No Family Destitute Poverty Relief Fund”, which has been implemented until now.
hypo: In 1998, the MCDF established the "Aged and Orphans' Education Fund", which was implemented for 11 years. In 2009, after all six-and-a-half-year-old Orphans had graduated, the MCDF followed up by establishing the "Support Fund for Aged and Orphans with extreme hardship" and has been in operation since then.

src: 这些项目的资金，主要来自六四当年的校园和社会捐款，来自个人的慷慨捐助，并受到兄弟大学民主基金会的支持。
tgt: The funds for these projects mainly came from campus and social donations of generous individual donations in the year of June 4th event, and were supported by the democracy foundation of brother universities.
hypo: The funding for these projects is primarily来自于 campus and social donations in the year of 1964, comes from generous donations by individuals, and is supported by the democratic foundation of the Brother University.

src: 自2018年起，还得到了劳改研究基金会的支持。
tgt: Since 2018, it has also been supported by the Reform through Labor Research Foundation.
hypo: Since 2018, support from the Labor Research Foundation has been continued.

src: 直到去年，时隔31年后，六四难属们终于收到了一笔来自香港的当年以六四的名义募捐来的部分捐款。
tgt: Last year, after 31 years, the family of the victims of the June 4th Movement finally received a part of the donation made by Hong Kong in the name of the June 4th Movement.
hypo: until last year, 31 years after its creation, the six four survivors finally received a partial contribution made by Hong Kong in the name of six four.

src: 在此期间，《中国人权》也在独立地执行它们的人道救助项目。
tgt: During this period, China Human Rights is also independently implementing their humanitarian relief project.
hypo: During this period, the Chinese people's rights also independently carried out their humanitarian relief projects.

src: 我们理解，丁老师叫停六四捐助，是为捐款人考虑，我们也确实都是一些退休老人，收入并非如退休前充裕，特此对丁老师的“致友人”一信表示感谢。
tgt: We understand that Ding called a stop to the June 4th donation for the consideration of the donors; we are indeed retired elderly, and our income is not as much as before; we hereby thank teacher Ding for his “Letter to Friends”.
hypo: We understand that Dr. Ding called off the six-四 donation for the sake of donors, and we indeed are some old retired people who do not have as much income as before retirement. We hereby express our gratitude to Dr. Ding's "Dear friend" letter.

src: 我们会尊重难属们的决定，在两年内终止这一项目，并在需要时，立即恢复。
tgt: We will respect the decision of the family of the victims and terminate this project within two years and resume it immediately when necessary.
hypo: We will respect the decision of the difficult members and terminate this project within two years, and if needed, resume it immediately.

src: 对于那些多年来一直坚持慷慨解囊，冒着风险递送人道救助款的那些侠肝义胆的同道们，一并表示感谢和敬意。
tgt: I would like to express my gratitude and respect to those chivalrous fellows who have been giving generously and taking risks to deliver humanitarian relief funds for many years.
hypo: Thank you and respect to those chivalrous friends who have consistently offered generous donations and took risks to pass on humane aid funds for many years.

src: 一个想分享个人经历的编程小白。
tgt: I am a programming newbie and I want to share my experience.
hypo: A beginner programmer who wants to share their personal experience.

src: 如果是打算在这一行业入行倒是可以选择去找一个地方进行培训，但如果没这方面的想法的话，最好还是自学的好，毕竟培训要花的钱是非常多的，而且还要用6个月的时间去学习。
tgt: If you want to enter this industry, you can choose to find a place to get some training , but if you don’t want to, it’s better to study on your own; after all, trainings are expensive and it will take you six months to learn it.
hypo: If you are considering entering this industry, you can choose to find a place to train. However, if you don't have any ideas about training, it's best to learn on your own, as the cost of training is quite high and it will take six months to learn everything.

src: 但如果是打算在这一行业入坑的话培训确实是非常不错的选择，尤其是那些自制力及其弱的人，培训更是非常好的选择。
tgt: However, if you want to enter this industry, then training is a great option, especially for those who are extremely not self-disciplined.
hypo: If you are planning to enter this industry, training is indeed an excellent choice. In particular, for those who have limited self-discipline, training is even better.

src: 要是自身自制力比较强的话也可以选择自学，只不过会比较累。
tgt: You can choose to teach yourself if you are self-disciplined, but it will be tiring.
hypo: If you have strong self-discipline, you can also choose to learn on your own, but it will be more challenging.

src: 当然选择一个好的培训机构是非常重要的事情。
tgt: Certainly, selecting a good training agency is very important.
hypo: Certainly, choosing a good training agency is very important.

src: 首先要看这个机构的师资力量，如果师资力量不够强大的话，这个培训机构就没有什么意义了，当然一些新开的培训机构师资力量都不是特别强。
tgt: You need to first look at the faculty of this agency; if it’s not strong enough, you can cross that agency off your list; of course, some new agencies don’t have strong faculties.
hypo: First, look at the strength of the agency's teacher population. If the teacher population is not strong enough, then the training agency has no meaning. Of course, some newly established training agencies have not yet reached their full strength.

src: 其次在选择之前打探一下这个培训机构，最好可以打探一下这个机构出来的学生，毕竟只有机构的学生才知道这个机构到底怎么样，讲解的课程是好或者不好。
tgt: Secondly, you shall do some research on the agency before choosing it; it’s best to contact former students of the agency; after all, only students know how the agency really is and whether the curriculum is good or not.
hypo: Second, inquire about this training agency before making a decision. If possible, inquire about the students who have graduated from this agency, as only students of this agency will know if the course materials are good or not.

src: 你好，其实你这个问题问的我也不知道怎么回答，因为对于你自身的情况并没有做一定的介绍，而学习这个东西和个人自身的情况有很大的关系的。
tgt: Hello, actually I’m not sure how to answer your question since you didn’t introduce your own situation, and learning this is closely related to your situation.
hypo: Hello, actually I'm not sure how to answer that question, because there's not a certain introduction about your situation. Learning something is very important based on personal and individual situations.

src: 比如专业、年龄、想学习的语言，甚至在哪个城市，这些都会和你学习或者想要从事的行业有关系的。
