tgt: Such as your major, age, the language you want to learn, and even which city you are in; all of these are related to what you want to learn or what industry you want to go into.
hypo: The translation of the given sentence in English is:  For instance, your professional background, age, desired language, and even the city where you want to study or work, all play a role in determining your field of study or career path.

src: 如果你是学生的话并且还没有毕业，或者是计算机专业的已经毕业的，那么如果时间充足我个人建议自学，这个是效率和成本最低的，现在很多的线下线上的培训机构其实也很不错，但是一学习成本高，二投入的时间比较多，基本需要集中培训3-6个月。
tgt: If you are a student who haven’t graduated yet, or if you are a computer major and have graduated, then I recommend learning it yourself if you have time, and this is the method with lowest efficiency and cost; many offline and online training agencies are good now, but it comes with great cost and takes a lot of time; it basically needs a concentrated training of three to six months.
hypo: If you are a student and have not graduated yet or if you are a computer science graduate, if you have the time, I personally recommend self-study, which is the lowest in terms of efficiency and cost. Many online and offline learning agencies are also very good. However, learning costs a lot, and you need to put in a lot of time. basically, you need to集中培训 3-6 months.

src: 但是如果是我说的这些情况的话，自学就很方便，现在网络上的很多学习资源都是免费的，或者去b站也有很多的培训资源，如果你不会找资源，你也可以通过简介联系到我，获取免费的资源，或者详细的咨询也行。
tgt: However, if you are in the same situation as I mentioned, it is convenient to learn it yourself; many learning resources are free online, or you can gain access to a lot of training resources on Bilibili; if you don’t know how to search for them, you can contact me according to my bio and get free resources or detailed consultation.
hypo: If it is under these circumstances, self-study is very convenient. Many learning resources on the internet are now free, or you can find training resources on YouTube. If you don't know how to find resources, you can also contact me through an introduction, obtain free resources, or get detailed consultation, either.

src: 另外还有一些比较经典的书籍可以结合视频综合学习。
tgt: There are also classic books to supplement your study with videos.
hypo: There are also some classic books that can be的综合 learning with videos.

src: 如果你不是计算机专业的，但是也能够支付一定的学习金钱和时间成本，那么建议去培训机构学习，这样学习不用很费劲，老师讲解的也很详细，有问题也有人专门解答，另外在学习规划或者监督方面也有帮助。
tgt: If you are not a computer major, but you can pay certain amount of money and devote your time to your learning, then I suggest you go to an agency to study; it’ll be easier this way as the teachers will explain in detail and there will be designated people answering your questions; in addition, it’ll be helpful to your study planning or help you get supervision.
hypo: If you are not computer science major and you can afford the cost of learning and time, suggest you go to an educational institution to learn. This will not require much effort and the teacher will explain things in detail. There will also be someone to answer any questions you have. Additionally, it may be helpful for learning planning or supervision.

src: 而且现在很多的培训机构都会签就业协议，有内推名额，学习之后推荐去公司，这样后面找工作的面试环节也能够省不少事情。
tgt: Further, many training agencies will sign employment agreement; they have quota for internal promotion, and you can be recommended to a company after your learning, so that the job interview process can be easier.
hypo: Many training agencies now sign employment agreements, offering internal promotion opportunities and recommended placements. This helps to save time and effort later in the job search process by providing recommendations to companies.

src: 以上就是我的一些看法，前面说的因为不了解你的情况，所以只大概介绍也并不详细，如果你有其他的想咨询的，可以随时联系我进行交流沟通。
tgt: The above is my opinion; as I said, I don’t know about your situation so my introduction is not detailed; if you want to consult other things, you may contact me any time.
hypo: The above is my take on it. As I mentioned earlier, I don't have a good understanding of your situation, so I'm only introducing it briefly. If you have any other questions or concerns you'd like to discuss, feel free to contact me.

src: 本人，承接各种（安装、清洗，维修）、壁挂炉热水器，净水器，洗衣机、空调、马桶、灶头、油烟机、装灯具、擦玻璃，专业美缝，家政服务
tgt: I undertake all kinds of housekeeping services including installation, cleaning, and maintenance of wall mounted water heater, water purifier, washing machine, air conditioner, toilet, stove, range hood, lamp installation, glass cleaning, and professional sewing.
hypo: I can handle various kinds of installations, cleaning, and maintenance for flat wall stove热水器，净水器，洗衣机，空调，马桶， stovetop，烟灶， lighting installation, and professional glass cleaning.

src: 感谢那些默默给我点赞的人 ，为了生活努力拼搏 生活很累但要继续
tgt: Thanks to everyone who liked my post; I will carry on working hard although life is difficult.
hypo: Thank you for the默默点赞 people who have given me a thumbs up, although life is tough, we need to work and struggle for our daily lives.

src: 生活不会辜负每一个努力的人 ，喜欢就关注我吧 ，感谢那些默默给我点赞的人
tgt: Life will not let hardworking people down; follow me if you like me; thank you to everyone who have liked my post.
hypo: Life will not let hardworking people down.  Please note that the translation includes the words "let hardworking people down."

src: 生活就是这样，别人只看结果，自己独撑过程，面对生活，我们除了坚强，就是继续，别无选择，路可以回头看但不能回头走……
tgt: This is life; others only see the result and you must go through it alone; in the face of life, we can only stay strong and carry on; there is no other choice; you can look back on life, but you cannot relive it...
hypo: Life is like that, others only see the results, but we handle the process ourselves. In面对生活， we have only two options: to be strong and to continue. We cannot relive the past, but we can look back at it with a fresh perspective.

src: 保洁是工作，也是职责，生活因服务而美丽，服务因用心而精彩。
tgt: Cleaning is a job and a responsibility; life is more beautiful with services, and services are wonderful because we work hard.
hypo: The cleaning is a job and a responsibility, and living is beautiful because of services, and services are精彩 because of hard work and dedication.

src: 保洁我们虽然做的是最脏的活，但我们会用最认真的态度把客户家每个角落打扫的干干净净，看到客户满意的笑容和竖起的大拇指，那一刻所有的累都值了，付出终有回报！
tgt: Although we do the most dirty work in cleaning, we will try to clean all the corners of the client’s house with our hard work; the moment I see the client’s smile and big thumb up, all the efforts spent are worthwhile; your hard work will pay off!
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation:  "Although we do the most dirtiest work, we will take the most meticulous attitude to打扫 every corner of the client's home. At that moment, all the effort is worthwhile because we see the client's satisfied smile and竖起大拇指. It's finally worth it to know that付出终有回报！"

src: 我的日常工作
tgt: My daily work
hypo: My daily work.

src: ——您的要求，我的服务。
tgt: - your requirements, my service.
hypo: "Your requirements, my service."

src: 用心服务，用心清洁，留住美好。
tgt: Keep the beauty with attentive service and cleaning.
hypo: 用心服务，用心清洁，留住美好。  attentive service: 服务质量好的服务，指客户在提供服务的过程中感受到服务员的认真、用心和关注。  attentive cleaning: 认真清洁，指服务员在清洁过程中非常用心，使客户感受到清洁的认真和细致。  留住美好：指保留住美好的事物或回忆，使客户感受到产品或服务的美好和珍贵。

src: 您关心的细节，丰桂家政帮你做到了“净”我所能，服务爱家。
tgt: Feng Gui Housekeeping will try our best to care for the details you care about and love your house with our services.
hypo: The details you care about, Fung green home service helps you get "clean" with our services. We are dedicated to providing care and love for our home.

src: 保万家洁净，树家政囗碑，服务到位，洁净到家。
tgt: Keep thousands of houses clean, establish a brand of housekeeping; standard service, in-house cleaning.
hypo: Establish an in-house cleaning碑 to keep thousands of homes clean, provide quality in-house cleaning services, and deliver洁净到家门。

src: 室内外保洁 ，我的日常工作
tgt: Indoor and outdoor cleaning, my daily work
hypo: "室内外保洁，我的日常工作" 的英语翻译为：  "Cleaning both inside and outside, my daily work."

src: 水晶灯虽然华丽，但长时间不清洗也会黯淡无光，只有清洗后才可以溢放光彩，人生亦是如此
tgt: Although the crystal lamp looks luxurious, it will be dim if it has not cleaned for a long time; only after cleaning, can it shine brightly, and so is life.
hypo: Although crystal lights are elegant, they will become dull and dim after not being cleaned for a long time. Only after cleaning can they shine brightly. Similarly, life is like this.

src: 用心去做方能成功，用细致去塑造精致，美缝我们是认真的。
tgt: Do it with heart and we can succeed; we are serious about creating exquisite things with our attention to details, and we are serious about cleaning seams.
hypo: Only by doing it with heart can success be achieved, and we are serious about creating exquisite beauty by meticulous attention to detail.

src: 给我机会，一定会让你满意的，质量说明一切，因为专业值得被信赖，你的认可是我最鼓励！
tgt: Give me a chance and you will be satisfied; quality is everything, because professionalism is worth trusting; your recognition is the best encouragement to me!
hypo: Give me the opportunity, and I will make you satisfied, quality is everything, because professionalism is trusted. Your recognition is what I most encourage!   (Note: The translation includes the words recognition is, your recognition, because professionalism.)

src: 当下的各行各业都不好干啊！
tgt: At present, there is not one industry that is easy to do!
hypo: The current fields in everyone's life are not easy.

src: 但是我始终相信，只要认真态度，够坚持，够努力，我就会比别人好一点，至少总比坐着抱怨强吧”！
tgt: But I always believe that as long as I am serious, persistent and hard-working, I will be slightly better than others; it’s at least better than sitting around and complaining!”
hypo: But I always believe that as long as I have a serious attitude, stick to it, and work hard, I will be better than others, at least it's better than sitting and complaining!

src: 一天之计在于晨，所有的美好从清晨开始 希望你携带着快乐、幸运、健康、如意出发 开始新的一天，保持一整天的好心情 早安
tgt: Morning is the most important time of the day; all the good things begin in the morning; I hope you can start a new day with happiness, luck, health and joy; keep a good mood all day long; good morning.
hypo: "Morning is the best time for everything. Good things start in the morning, so I hope you start your day with happiness, luck, health, and good fortune."

src: 小时候，幸福是一件东西，拥有就幸福； 长大后，幸福是一个目标，达到就幸福； 成熟后发现，幸福原来是一种心态，领悟就幸福。
tgt: When we were children, happiness was a thing, and we were happy when we had it; when we grow up, happiness is a goal, and we will be happy when we reach it; after maturity, I found that happiness is actually a state of mind, and understanding is happiness.
hypo: When I was young, happiness was something that I had, having it was always happy; as I grew older, happiness became a goal that I achieved, being happy was just a feeling.

src: 做最真实最善良的自己，依心而行，无憾今生；人生一条路，走自己的路；人生两件宝：身体好、心情好，漂漂亮亮活到老！
tgt: Be the truest and kindest self, act according to your heart, and leave no regrets in your life; life is a road, go your own way; there are two treasures in life: good health and good mood, and you will live a beautiful life!
hypo: Be the true and kindest version of yourself, act according to your heart, and never regret your life; life is just one path, choose your own path; there are two treasures in life: good health and positive mood, keep looking good and keep living happily all through your life!

src: 人生的每个阶段，都会遇到不同的难题。
tgt: We will encounter different difficulties in different stages of life.
hypo: Every stage of life will encounter different difficulties.

src: 很多时候，束缚住你的并不是能力，而是积极面对的勇气。
tgt: Often times, what is restraining you is not you ability but your courage to face it actively.
hypo: Many times, the challenge that holds you back is not your ability, but the courage to face it head on.

src: 既然无法躲避，不如坦然面对。
tgt: Since you cannot hide, you’d rather face it.
hypo: Since it's impossible to avoid, rather than facing it head-on.

src: 你越害怕，越会被困难击倒；你若迎难而上，问题终会迎刃而解。
tgt: The more scared you are, the easier you will be knocked down by difficulties; if you take it head on, the problem will be solved.
hypo: If you are afraid, you will be knocked down by the difficulties; but if you persist in facing them, the problems will eventually be solved.

src: 二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。
tgt: 2. Although the Rightists had their time in history, it was not long, and the reason why it was short was they were over their head once they got a tiny bit of sweetness; a little success will lead to insatiable desires, and just one blow and they will lose their ground to exist.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation of the given sentence:  "二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。"  Google TranslateTranslate your text into English by using the translation tools.Type the text you want to translate into English, then click the "Translate" button, and wait for the translation to finish.https://translate.google.com/

src: 但实事求是来说，右派在社会进步过程中起到过积极作用。
tgt: But to speak the truth, the Rightists have once played a positive role in the process of social progress.
hypo: However，实事求是地说，右派 have played a positive role in the process of social progress.

src: 从结束文革定义真理标准，发展经济提高科技以及促进行政制度化和人权保障等方面，右派的积极意义不该否定。
tgt: The positive significance of the Rightists should not be denied in terms of ending the cultural revolution, defining the standard of truth, developing the economy, improving science and technology, and promoting the institutionalization of administration and the protection of human rights.
hypo: The positive aspects of the rightist party should not be discounted in terms of ending the Cultural Revolution to define the standard of truth, developing the economy to improve technology, and promoting the institutionalization of administration and human rights protection.

src: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
tgt: 3. For me, although I don’t fully agree with some of Li Weidong’s statements, I really care about his statements and respect Li Weidong; Because he is conscientious, he is serious about China, and he also takes China’s social problems seriously.
hypo: 三、对我来说，尽管我不完全同意李伟东的一些观点，但我非常在意他的说法，并且尊重他这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国非常认真，并且对中国社会问题持认真的态度。

src: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
tgt: But I oppose his anti-communist theory; I believe that unnecessary revolution should be opposed to; revolution will inevitably lead to social unrest and damage to people’s livelihood; political groups will be mixed, and foreign countries will avail themselves of the opportunity to get in.
hypo: However, I disagree with his anti-communist theory. I believe that revolution is necessary, but that it will inevitably lead to social instability, damage to民生， a mix of diverse political groups, and the capture of the opportunity by foreign powers.

src: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
tgt: 4. Changing or improving China requires patience and the attitude to be responsible for the country and the people; those who try to make money from political opportunities are not Rightists, but bastards.
hypo: "四、改变或改善中国需要有耐心和对国家人民负责的态度。那些企图在政治危机中取利的人，那不是右派，是混蛋。"

src: 再聊聊左。
tgt: Let’s talk about Leftists.
hypo: Let's talk about left again.

src: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
tgt: Leftists, in fact, are a group of outcasts of the times and politics.
hypo: "Leftists," in this context, is actually a弃儿 of a time and a place.

src: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
tgt: If the Rightists are of positive significance to society, and the Communist Party will listen to some of the Rightists’ remarks and analyze their thoughts when necessary, the Leftists don’t have such luck, because what the Leftists want is the dross thrown away by the Communist Party!
hypo: If the right has a positive impact on society, the Communist Party may still listen to some rightist statements and analyze their ideas when needed. However, the left is no longer capable of this grace, as what the left needs is the trash that the Communist Party discarded!

src: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
tgt: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the rebels and crazy Leftists at the same time, and they got really angry; I don't think it’s necessary at all.
hypo: "五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得我觉得大可不必。" 的英语翻译是：  "I just saw some friends refuting anti-authority figures while驳斥ing left-wing ideologies, and they were still angry and full of vinegar. I think it's a waste of time."

src: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
tgt: Don’t try to reason with rebels and crazy Leftists; they are all one track minded and unreasonable.
hypo: When dealing with rebels and democrats, don't try to reason with them. They are completely rigid and don't have any room for logic or reason.

src: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
tgt: Don’t try to prove we are right, and don’t even think about asking rebels and crazy Leftists to admit it; why bother?
hypo: Don't try to prove yourself right, nor consider seeking recognition from rebels and left-wingers. Why on earth would you do that?   Note: The phrase "rebels and left-wingers" is included in the translation to convey the idea that the speaker is not interested in aligning themselves with those who are against them or who identify as left-wing.

src: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
tgt: I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!
hypo: I tell my friends this: when the rebels call you a five-percenter and the left-wingers call you a right-wing dog, it恰恰 proves that our middle path is the correct track!

src: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
tgt: Many people had dreams when they were young, but they forgot about them when they got older; or, they pursue their dreams and become paranoid.
hypo: Many people have had dreams when they were young, but as they get older, they forget about them or pursue them, but end up becoming paranoid.

src: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
tgt: They drift apart from their dreams and the young Dragon Slayer will eventually become a vicious dragon.
hypo: The boy who dreamed of dragon肉 has finally become a dragon with his drift towards evil.

src: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
tgt: I think left and right generally refers to restraint and freedom; the innate genes of China’s history and culture make China overall relatively left.
hypo: I think "左右" generally refers to constraints and freedom, and it is implied that China's inherent historical and cultural roots should lead to a generally向左-oriented society.

src: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
tgt: The domestic Rightists are free and stress efficiency and development, while the Leftists strengthen supervision and pay more attention to fairness and safety.
hypo: The国内的右派注重自由，注重效率和发展。同时，左派则加强了监管，更加注重公平和安全。

src: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
tgt: At present, society overall hopes to pay more attention to justice; at the same time, it is certain that when China and the United States fight, it is bound to lean towards left, which is estimated to continue for many years.
hypo: The overall society now wants to focus more on fairness, while China and the United States are competing with each other, it is certain that the society is slightly left-wing and it will continue for many years.

src: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
tgt: Just like it if you don’t understand.
hypo: "虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦" 的英语翻译是：  Although you don't understand, simply subscribing and liking the post is all it takes.

src: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
tgt: No need to say more, Huahua is generous.
hypo: "啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义" 的英语翻译是：I don't need to say anything, Huahua is just so elegant.

src: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
tgt: In the past two years, the blockade and interception of the US on Huawei chips not only made Huawei fall into an unprecedented difficult position but also made “American” enterprises suffer from huge losses.
hypo: In the past two years, the封锁 and blockage of Huawei's chips by the US has not only put Huawei in an unprecedented困境 but also caused huge losses to "US-based" enterprises.

src: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
tgt: The US suppresses China’s chips industry and required its own enterprises and relevant enterprises of its allies to block China’s chip industry at the same time; the direct consequence was that the number of orders and profits of global chip suppliers were affected, resulting in the decrease in the investment of research and development and production capacity of chip manufacturers, which further led to the disorder of chip supply chain shortages on a global scale.
hypo: The US wants to suppress the Chinese chip industry, and requires its own enterprises and those of its allies to simultaneously封锁 the Chinese chip industry. The direct consequence is that the orders and profits of global chip suppliers are affected, causing investments in research and development by chip manufacturers to reduce and production capacity to decrease. This has led to the disruption of the global chip supply chain, resulting in shortages and disruptions at all levels.

src: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
tgt: Today, “lack of chips” has affected all major industries of the world, resulting in the suspension of production of car enterprises and rise in prices of mobile phones; almost all the industries using chips are greatly impacted.
hypo: 如今的 "缺芯" has affected almost all industries that use chips, such as automotive plants, with their production suspended and phone prices rising, causing widespread hardship.

src: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
tgt: To gain the right to make their own decisions on “chips”, more and more countries’ tech giants are taking the path of “de-Americanized”.
hypo: In order to grasp the自主权 of "chips", tech giants from越来越多的 countries are turning to the "de-Americanized" path.

src: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
tgt: In order to firmly holding the right to control global semiconductor in its hands and pin down the development of China’s semiconductor industry, the United States have made frequent moves recently such as hosting the “chip summit”, inviting the giants of 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance and allocating funds to support the local technology giants in the United States; in order to regain its leading position in the chip industry, Intel, an old technology giant in the United States, spent $ 20 billion to build two wafer processing plants in Arizona, US and opened its chip OEM business.
hypo: To tightly control the global semiconductor market and牵制 China's semiconductor industry development, the US has been making frequent moves. It has hosted "Semiconductor Summits" and invited 64 national giants to form a semiconductor alliance. It has also contributing funds to support American本土 technology giants, such as Intel, which is a well-established technology giant in the US. In order to regain its lead in the semiconductor market, Intel, an old American technology giant, has built two chip plants in Arizona，花费200亿美元， and has opened up its chip manufacturing business to the public.

src: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
tgt: When most people think Intel’s move will make certain impact on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and even steal their job.
hypo: When most people thought that Intel's move would cause a certain冲击 to TSMC, and it was likely to抢夺 TSMC's "饭碗."

src: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
tgt: They are sure about it because Intel, as an old tech giant in the US, worked diligently in the semiconductor industry for dozens of years and have a large amount of talent teams and technological reserve; it is bound to rise within a short time and defeat Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.
hypo: The reason why I am so confident is because, as a veteran technology giant in the United States, Intel has been deeply embedded in the semiconductor industry for decades and has a large team and technical reserve. It is必定能够在在短期内迅速崛起，打败台湾积体电路制造公司(Apple's rival, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)).

src: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
tgt: However, Zhang Zhongmou, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, sniffed at the decision of Intel.
hypo: However, when it comes to Intel's decision, the founder of TSMC, Zhang Qianqian, seems to be dismissive of it.

src: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
tgt: At the “2021 Master Think Tank Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a surprising remark and spoke bluntly about Intel’s move to build a wafer factory, “it is rather ironic for Intel to build an OEM factory of chips”.
hypo: In the "2021 Global Expert智库 Forum" held in April this year, Zhang Zhongwei made an惊人 statement. Regarding Intel's decision to build a chip factory, he freely直言 that it is quite ironic.

src: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou disdained Intel’s decision to get into the wafer industry because Zhang Zhong still holds a grudge against a feud between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Intel more than 30 years.
hypo: The reason why Zhang Zhong谋 is so dismissive of Intel's entry into the raster industry is because he still holds a grudge against Intel and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) from over 30 years ago.

src: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
tgt: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel has been the pearl in the manufacturing industry of the United States, occupying the leading position in the world; it was a king in the semiconductor industry in the world.
hypo: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel was the jewel in the American manufacturing industry, at the top of the global market, and the dominant leader in the world's semiconductor industry.

src: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
tgt: Until the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips have been controlled by a few strong ones.
hypo: until the late 1980s, the high-end semiconductor chips of the world were controlled by a few powerful ones.

src: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
tgt: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode; chips were designed, manufactured and sealed by the same factory, and Intel was a representative of that era.
hypo: The semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode, and the chips were produced by a single factory from design to testing. Intel was a representative of that era.

src: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
tgt: However, such a model has overwhelmed some small enterprises, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs could only flinch in the face of huge production line construction costs.
hypo: However, this model has made small businesses too承受不起， and many semiconductor entrepreneurs have had to望而却步 when faced with large operational costs.

src: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
tgt: To respond to the calling of market demand, after entering the 1980s, the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation of chips industry began to appear; in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there were companies specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there were companies specializing in design, a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing could be established.
hypo: Under the influence of market demand, the chip industry began to develop分工 and cooperation. In 1984, Zhang Zhongming heard about a company specializing in chip design and believed that since there was a company specialized in design, a factory specializing in chip manufacturing could be established.

src: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
tgt: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou’s imagination became reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was created.
hypo: soon after, Zhang Zhong谋's idea became reality, Tsinghua University of Technology (TUT) came into existence.

src: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
tgt: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company aimed to set the single link of “processing of wafers” as its primary business; without design, only OEM services of wafer manufacturing was provided.
hypo: Taiwan 積體電路公司的主題實際目標是在“晶圆製造”這個单一步驟上，專注於提供代碼製作的網絡加工服務，不進行設計。

src: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
tgt: The newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was only a small player in front of Intel the giant.
hypo: When Taiwan 積米銷售公司 was just starting up, it was just a small player compared to Intel, the giant in front of it.

src: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
tgt: In order to gain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but Intel was arrogant when it heard Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only participated in the manufacturing of the chips industry; Intel looked down on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and resolutely refused to invest in it.
hypo: In order to obtain capital support, Zhang Zhong谋 once searched for investment from Intel. However, when Intel heard that Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) only played a role in the manufacturing process in the chips industry, it seemed that Intel was somewhat arrogant and看不起TSMC, and promptly refused to invest in TSMC.

src: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
tgt: Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel despised wafer manufacturing services at that time.
hypo: Zhang Zhong谋 also believed that Intel at that time had a higher opinion of the semiconductor manufacturing service.

src: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
tgt: Unexpectedly, the giant that looked down on wafer manufacturing services back in the days will also start to do wafer foundry now.
hypo: I没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。  Translation: I没想到 that the giant of the day who once laughed at the service ofwafer manufacturing now is also starting to do wafer manufacturing.

src: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
tgt: Therefore, Zhang Zhongmou thinks it is ironic for Intel to work on wafer foundry.
hypo: Therefore, Zhang Zhongxin finds it ironic that Intel enters the field of integrated circuits (ICs) manufacturing.

src: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
tgt: The market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has surpassed that of Intel.
hypo: Today, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC)'s market capitalization has surpassed that of Intel.

src: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
tgt: Facing the powerful attack of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, Intel naturally dares not to stand still.
hypo: In response to the strong attack by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC), Intel naturally cannot stand still.

src: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
tgt: Now, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is trying to develop to the 3nm chips, and Intel still stays at the 14nm 7 years ago.
hypo: "Today, TSMC is pushing towards 3nm chips, while Intel is still stuck at 14nm as of seven years ago."

src: 想要赶超其实并非易事。
tgt: It is actually not difficulty to surpass it.
hypo: 想要赶超其实并非易事。  It's not a easy task to catch up with others.

src: 今天来看一些【奇怪的热搜】。
tgt: Let’s see some “strange trending topics” today.
hypo: Let's have a look at some strange news today.

src: 什么是正常的舆情？
tgt: What is normal public opinion?
hypo: What is a normal public opinion?

src: 随机挑选三个热搜：二月二龙抬头、好丽友涨价、货拉拉事件，舆情扩散形成波峰，然后【指数下降】（平滑曲线）最终消散，如果产生次生舆情会有小驼峰再次出现。
tgt: Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again.
hypo: Randomly select three trending topics: February 2nd, IBI Group price increase, and logistics companies incident. The sentiment spreads form waves, forming peaks, and eventually resolves in a smooth curve. If secondary舆情 arises, there will be another small peak.

src: 它们看起来和网信办官网曾展示的【网络舆情演化模型】相差无二。
tgt: They look no different from the [evolution model of online public opinion] once displayed on the official website of Cyberspace Administration.
hypo: They appear to be similar to the [Cyberspace Administration's] website展示的"网络舆情演化模型".

src: 什么是异常的舆情？
tgt: What is abnormal public opinion?
hypo: What is an unusual public opinion?

src: 随机挑选同一事件中的六个热搜，呈现出【孤峰状】、【锯齿状】、【断崖状】。
tgt: Randomly select three trending topics from the same event, there are [solitary peak], [zigzag] and [cliff].
hypo: Select six trending topics from the same event randomly, with a 【孤峰状】, 【锯齿状】, or 【断崖状】 appearance.

src: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。
tgt: [Solidary peak] means the topic is artificially heated, quickly rushing to the trending topics list and attracting public attention; [Zigzag] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that topic stays on the trending topics list; [Cliff] means collective evacuation; after the topic has played its “function”, they received a new task and rushed to a new battlefield.
hypo: Here's the English translation for the given sentence:  "The shape of a孤峰， which is achieved by human heating, quickly reaches the top of the popular list and attracts public attention. The shape of a锯齿， which is achieved by周期性 heating, ensures that the topic remains on the popular list. And the shape of a cliff, which is achieved by a collective撤离， leads to the completion of its function and the acquisition of a new task and a new battlefield."

src: 图9中，一个事件的热度波峰恰好是另一事件的波谷，时间分秒不差，必定是统一批水军接到任务，开启新一轮攻势。
tgt: In picture 9, the peak of the heat wave of one event happens to be the trough of another event, and the time is exactly the same; it must be because a unified batch of paid internet trolls have received the task and started a new round of offensive.
hypo: In Figure 9, the peak of the热度 of one event is exactly the valley of another event, with no相差 in time at all. It is必定 a unified group of soldiers who have received a task to launch a new campaign.

src: 黑公关的专业化可见一斑：几十个热搜同时上榜，哪些吸引目光、哪些负责科普、哪些引战造势、哪些转移视线、哪些影响认知、哪些误导判断、哪些煽动情感、哪些裹挟决策，黑产账号分批次、分节点精细化作战，几乎考虑到舆情传播扩散中的所有要素。
tgt: The professionalism of black public relations can be seen: dozens of trending topics are on the list at the same time, which attract attention, which are responsible for explanation, which lead to argument and accumulate momentum, which divert attention, which affect understanding, which mislead judgment, which incite emotion, which coerce decision-making; the black production accounts work in batches and conduct segmented operations in different batches and time nodes, taking into account almost all elements in the spread of public opinion.
hypo: The professionalism of black PR is evident: hundreds of trending topics are listed simultaneously, with which topics attract attention, which ones provide科普 information, which ones stir debate, which ones转移话题， which ones influence perception, which ones mislead judgments, which ones煽动 emotions, and which ones裹挟 decision-making. Black产账号 are divided into batches and nodes to conduct精细化作战， considering almost all factors in the spread of public opinion.

src: 传播是一门科学，抛开立场、情感所有主观因素，仅从客观数据，黑公关也会无处遁形。
tgt: Communication is a science which disregards all subjective factors such as standpoint and emotion and only takes into account objective data; black public relations will have nowhere to hide.
hypo: The传播 is a science, forget about all subjective factors such as立场 and emotions, just from objective data, black marketing will nowhere be hidden.   (Note: the translation might not be perfect as it's a sentence fragment and a full-length paragraph would be more appropriate for a formal essay.)

src: 凡走过必留下痕迹，这样的痕迹，我们一起挖出来。
tgt: Traces will be left from anyone walked by, and we can dig out these traces together.
hypo: Any person who walked must leave a trace, and we'll dig it up together.

src: 数据来源：热搜时光机。
tgt: Source of data: trending topics time machine.
hypo: The data source is: time machine on the trending topics.

src: 激光电视和传统电视在市场定位上有何差异？
tgt: What is the difference between laser TV and traditional TV in terms of the market positioning?
hypo: What are the differences between laser television and traditional television in their market positioning?

src: 以我的理解，题主所说的传统电视应该指的就是液晶电视，而激光电视和液晶电视在市场定位上的差异，主要有以下两点：
tgt: In my understanding, traditional TV which the original post mentioned is LCD TV, and the differences between laser TV and LCD TV in terms of market positioning are mainly the following two points:
hypo: Based on my understanding, the traditional television that题主 mentioned should refer to液晶显示屏. The differences between液晶显示屏 andLCD television in their market positioning are mainly two:

src: 第一，激光电视更聚焦大屏市场。
tgt: First, laser TV focuses more on big screen market.
hypo: "First, laser TV is more focused on large-screen markets."

src: 相比液晶电视全面铺开的市场定位，激光电视显然更聚焦大屏市场，或者说激光电视本身就是为大屏而生的产物。
tgt: Compared with the all-round market positioning of LCD TV, laser TV is obviously more focused on the large screen market, or laser TV itself is a product of big screen.
hypo: Compared to the widespread market positioning of液晶 Monitors, laser TVs seem to be more focused on large-screen markets, or perhaps laser TVs are themselves the result of a product designed for large-screen environments.

src: 目前，主流液晶电视尺寸多在55英寸到65英寸，而激光电视的尺寸一般在75英寸以上，最大的超过100英寸，充分满足用户对大屏彩电的需求。
tgt: At present, the size of mainstream LCD TV is mainly from 55 to 65 inches, and the size of laser TV is usually over 75 inches, with bigger ones over 100 inches, which can satisfy the customers’ need for big screen TVs.
hypo: Currently, the mainstream LCD television sizes are主要在55 inches to 65 inches, while laser TV sizes range from over 75 inches to over 100 inches, with the largest ones reaching over 120 inches. These large-screen电视 sizes fully meet the needs of users for larger and more powerful电视机.

src: 近年来，激光电视在全球的出货量和销量占比都在不断增加，在80英寸及以上总体电视销量中占比超六成。
tgt: In recent years, the proportion of the global shipments and sales of laser TV keeps increasing, accounting for over 60% of the total TV sales of 80 inches and above.
hypo: In recent years, the shipments and sales percentage of laser televisions have been increasing worldwide, and they account for over six percent of the total sales of televisions with over 80 inches.

src: 根据中怡康的预测，2020年，激光电视市场销量增长将超过140%，继续保持高速增长。
tgt: According to the prediction of CMM, the sales volume of laser TV market in 2020 will increase by over 140% and will continue to maintain a high-speed growth.
hypo: According to China IDGCO's prediction, the market volume of laser TV will exceed 140% in 2020, and continue to experience rapid high-speed growth.

src: 之所以在大屏市场有如此好的成绩，主要归功于激光电视在护眼方面的出色表现。
tgt: The reason for such great result in the big screen market is mainly the outstanding performance of laser TVs in eye protection .
hypo: The reason for the excellent performance in the large-screen market is mainly due to the outstanding performance of laser televisions in protecting the eyes.

src: 基于激光电视漫反射的成像原理，激光光源发出的光线并不直射入眼球，相比液晶电视的背光源发光，成像过程更接近自然条件下物体的成像过程，对眼睛产生的刺激也更小。
tgt: Based on the imaging principle of diffuse reflection of laser TV, the light emitted by the laser light source does not go directly into the eyeball; compared with the backlight of LCD TV, its imaging process is closer to that of objects under natural conditions, with less irritation to the eyes.
hypo: Based on the diffuse imaging principle of LED-lit LED TVs, the light emitted by the LED source does not directly enter the eye. In comparison to the backlight of液晶 Monitors, the imaging process is more like the imaging process of objects under natural conditions, and the irritation to the eye is also smaller.

src: 中国电子技术标准化研究院赛西实验室和北京协和医院眼科专家，通过人群相同条件下观看激光电视和液晶电视的严格对比试验，得出了144组测试数据。
tgt: Ophthalmologists from CES Laboratory, China Electronics Standardization Institute, and Peking Union Medical College Hospital obtained 144 groups of test data through a strict comparative experiment of watching laser TV and LCD TV under the same conditions.
hypo: ThePeking Union of Electronic Technology Standardization and the Beijing Hospital of Otorhinolaryngology experts conducted a strict comparative study of laser TV and液晶 TV under the same conditions for a population, resulting in 144 test results.

src: 数据证实：激光电视的确具有很强的护眼特性，在特定方面甚至具有一定的改善作用。
tgt: Statistics prove that laser TVs can indeed protect the eyes and may even make improvement in certain aspects.
hypo: Data verify that laser TVs indeed have strong眼睛保护 features, and in certain aspects, they even have a certain improvement effect.

src: 在视力健康越来越受重视的当下，激光电视不仅凭借护眼优势吸引了越来越多用户，也打开了彩电市场的另一个突破口。
tgt: As eye protection is gaining more and more attention, laser TVs not only attracted more and more customers with the feature of eye protection, but also made another breakthrough in the market of color TVs.
hypo: With the growing importance of eye health, laser TVs not only attract more users by their保护眼睛 advantages but also open up another breakthrough in the television market.

src: 第二，激光电视更聚焦高端市场。
tgt: Second, laser TV focuses more on high-end market.
hypo: Secondly, laser TV is more focused on the high-end market.

src: 与液晶电视价格不断下探相反，目前市售激光电视的价格大多在万元以上，随着尺寸和光源的升级，价格逐步攀升。
tgt: Contrary to the downward trend of the price of LCD TVs, price of laser TVs on the market now is over 10,000 yuan, and it went up gradually with the upgrading of size and source of light.
hypo: 与液晶电视价格不断下探相反，目前市售激光电视的价格大多在万元以上，随着尺寸和光源的升级，价格逐步攀升。  激光电视的价格 the price of laser TVs 通常是液晶电视价格的两倍以上。随着尺寸和光源的不断升级，激光电视的价格正在逐渐上涨。

src: 激光电视凭什么卖这么贵呢？
tgt: Why are laser TVs so expensive?
hypo: Why are laser电视 so, so expensive?

src: 肯定是有道理的。
tgt: There must be a reason.
hypo: There must be a reason for this.

src: 在光源和技术水平的不断发展下，激光电视有很多液晶电视和投影都无法实现的优势。
tgt: With the continuous development of light source and technology, laser TVs have advantages that many LCD TVs and projectors don’t.
hypo: Laser TVs have many advantages that LCD and projection TVs cannot achieve due to the continuous advancement of lighting sources and technical levels.

src: 凭借超短焦距投影技术，激光电视的投影距离相对传统投影设备来说要更短，能够在短距离内实现100英寸大屏体验，所需空间不大，而且主机小巧，占用地方很小。
tgt: With the super short focus projection technology, the projection distance of laser TVs is shorter than that of traditional projection equipment; it can realize the 100 inch large screen experience within a short distance; the space required is not large, and the small host takes up very little space.
hypo: With its ultra-short focus projection技术， laser television has a projection distance that is much shorter compared to traditional projection devices, allowing for a 100-inch large-screen experience within a short distance. The display device itself is compact and requires minimal space.

src: 在亮度方面，大品牌激光电视可以达到2000以上的流明。
tgt: In terms of lightness, laser TVs from famous brands can reach over 2,000 lumens.
hypo: "In terms of brightness, major brands of laser TVs can reach over 2000流明."

src: 加之发热量更低，对设备损耗小，电视的使用寿命也更长。
tgt: Plus, the heat is lower, equipment loss is small, and the service life of TV is longer.
hypo: The other thing is that the heat content is lower, which means that there is less equipment loss and the television's使用寿命 is also longer.

src: 除此之外，很多高端激光电视机型还搭载了真4K超高清画质、人工智能系统、仿生屏等众多前沿技术，能够给用户带来更震撼的视听体验。
tgt: In addition, many high-end laser TVs are equipped with real 4K ultra HD image, artificial intelligent systems, bionic screens and other cutting-edge technologies, bringing users a more stunning audio-visual experience.
hypo: In addition, many high-end laser television sets are equipped with cutting-edge technologies such as true 4K ultra-high definition picture quality, artificial intelligence systems, and biomimetic screens, which can provide users with a more stunning audio-visual experience.

src: 谈不上伪需求，而是需求细分的产物，论画质和投入产出比，激光电视不是影音玩家的菜，想兼顾大屏和观看环境不足，可以尝试，凡事皆有利弊，权衡过后自己判断即可，就怕听信一面之词。
tgt: It's not so much of a fake demand, but the product of demand segmentation; when it comes to image quality and input-output ratio, laser TVs are not what video and audio enthusiasts are after; if you want to take into account the lack of large screen and viewing environment, you can try it; everything has its pros and cons, and you can make a decision yourself after deliberation; just don’t listen to only one side of the story.
hypo: Laser TVs are not a伪需求， but the result of demand segmentation. In terms of picture quality and cost-performance ratio, laser TVs are not suitable for audio and video enthusiasts. If you want to balance large screen size with insufficient viewing environments, you can try it. Everything has pros and cons, and you should make your own judgment after considering the advantages and disadvantages. It's important not to trust only one side of the story.

src: 简单说，超广角近焦投影机--激光电视，为了贴近幕布，不得不使用价格昂贵的超广角透镜和反射镜，这不符合光学最佳设计。
tgt: Simply put, in order to get close to the screen, ultra wide angle close focus projector, laser TV, has to use expensive ultra wide angle lens and reflector, which is not in line with the best optical design.
hypo: Simply put, for high-resolution laser TV, it is necessary to use expensive ultra-wide and mirror lenses, which are not optimal for optical design.

src: 为了屏蔽部分环境光，使用微结构的菲涅尔幕布，代价高昂，80寸的价格基本能换个65寸液晶。
tgt: In order to shield part of the ambient light, it uses an expensive microstructure Fresnel screen; the price of an 80-inch laser TV basically can be changed into a 65-inch LCD TV.
hypo: To屏蔽 some environmental light, we use a micro-结构的涅尔幕布. The cost is high, and the price of an 80-inch TV is basically enough to replace a 65-inch liquid crystal display.

src: 还有一点，我特别讨厌投影厂商拿漫反射对眼睛好这种当卖点，拜托，眼睛能够看到的幕布上的光线对于眼睛而言就是直射光，你漫反射到天花板上，眼睛也看不到，非要较真液晶电视也是漫“直射”，打开电视天花板不也被照亮吗？
tgt: Another point is that I especially hate it when projector manufacturers using “diffuse reflection is good for the eyes” as a selling point; please, eyes can see the light on the screen means that it is direct light to the eyes; when it hit the ceiling, eyes cannot see it; if you want to be serious about it, then LCD TV also uses diffused “direct light”; isn’t the ceiling also illuminated when you turn on the TV?
hypo: Another thing, I especially hate投影厂商 using the idea that diffuse reflection is good for the eyes as a selling point. 拜托， the light that can be seen on the screen is direct light for the eyes, and you can't diffuse it to the天花板， so even if液晶智能电视 is diffuse "direct light," opening the TV and the天花板 will also be照亮？

src: 而且，投影幕布如果不是漫反射，根本成不了像。
tgt: Moreover, if the projection screen does not use diffuse reflection, imaging is not possible at all.
hypo: "And, if the projection screen is not a diffuse reflection, it would never create an image."

src: 恰恰被忽略了高增益幕布的热斑（光斑）效应，某一角度大量光线反射到眼睛，那才是真难受。
tgt: The hot spot (light spot) effect of the high gain screen is ignored, and a large amount of light at a certain angle being reflected into the eyes is really uncomfortable.
hypo: The heat spot (light spot) effect of the high-增益 screen is恰恰 overlooked, and at a certain angle, a large amount of light is reflected back to the eyes, which is really uncomfortable.

src: 小雨伞买保险，靠谱吗?
tgt: Is it safe to buy insurance on Little Umbrella?
hypo: Little雨伞买保险， Is it safe?

src: 小雨伞是一个互联网的保险经纪平台。
tgt: Little Umbrella is an insurance brokerage platform on the internet.
hypo: Little Umbrella is an Internet insurance brokerage platform.

src: 从设置条件来看：按照《保险经纪机构监管规定(2015年修订)》提示来看，成为保险经纪公司的，必须满足三个关键词：股东、发起人最近3年无重大违法记录、最低限额为人民币5000万元才可以成立、必须经过中国保监会同意。
tgt: In terms of setup conditions: according to the "Regulations on the Supervision of Insurance Brokerage Institutions (revised in 2015)", the following three key requirements must be met to become an insurance brokerage company, shareholders and initiator have no major illegal records in the past three years, the minimum limit is 50 million yuan, and it must be approved by the CIRC.
hypo: From the condition of setting conditions, according to the "Supervision and Regulation of保险经纪机构(2015年修订)" suggestions, to become an insurance agency, it is necessary to meet three keyKeywords: shareholders and founders have no major criminal records in the past 3 years, a minimum limit of 1 billion yuan can be established, and it must be approved by the China Supervision and Regulatory Commission.

src: 这三条其实就是很苛刻的，总结起来就是要有实力，要经过银保监会（监管全国内的保险公司、银行）的国家权威部门批准、股东要有良好的作风，作为保险经纪公司的小雨伞保险，投保者是不用过多质疑小雨伞保险是正规的与否，毕竟有这3条门槛，不是什么保险公司都能达到的。
tgt: These three requirements are strict enough; in summary, it needs to have strength, to be approved by the national authoritative departments of the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission (supervising insurance companies and banks across the country), and the shareholders’ conduct is descent; as an insurance brokerage company, Little Umbrella Insurance doesn’t need to be questioned by policyholders about whether it is legal or not; after all, not all insurance companies can meet these three requirements.
hypo: These three are actually quite苛刻. In summary, they require strength, approval from the national authority department responsible for regulating insurance companies and banks within the country, good business practices from shareholders, and the Little Umbrella Insurance agency, as a brokerage company, does not require过多的质疑 on whether the agency is legitimate. Since there are these three requirements, no insurance company can meet them.

src: 在这一点上，还不错，是值得信赖的。
tgt: In this regard, it is not bad and worth trusting.
hypo: In this regard, the person is worth trusting.

src: 从保险产品来看：小雨伞保险就是一个保险超市，很多公司的明星重疾险都在这家平台上出售，如最新上架的和泰超级玛丽5号重疾险，理赔方和承保方都是和泰人寿，小雨伞保险只是第三方中介，不用质疑它的靠谱性。
tgt: In terms of insurance products: Little Umbrella Insurance is an insurance supermarket, with star serious illness insurances of many companies on sale on this platform; for example, for the newly added HTLIC Super Mario 5 serious illness insurance, both the claim adjuster and the insurer are HTLIC, and Little Umbrella Insurance is only the third-party intermediary, whose reliability does not need to be questioned.
hypo: From the perspective of insurance products, Umbrella Insurance is an insurance supermarket, where many famous health insurance companies sell their products on this platform, such as the latest addition, Super玛丽 5, which is from ChinaTA. The claim and carrier are both ChinaTA, and Umbrella Insurance is just an third-party intermediary, so there's no need to doubt its reliability.

src: 从缴费模式来看：互联网平台的产品，因为少了营业网点的经营费用，和业务员工资的成本，所以互联网产品普遍性价比比较高，而且缴费方式灵活，支持月缴，减轻投保人的缴费压力，同时可以最大限度的撬动保险的杠杆。
tgt: In terms of payment method: due to the lack of the operating expenses of the business outlets and the cost of the sales people’s salaries, internet products are generally cost-effective, and the payment method is flexible, which supports monthly payment; it reduces the payment pressure of the policyholder, and can leverage of the insurance lever to the greatest extent in the meantime.
hypo: From the payment model perspective: Internet platform products, due to the cost savings from reduced operating costs for store locations and employee salaries, have generally higher cost-effectiveness than traditional products. They are also flexible in payment terms, allowing for monthly payments, which alleviates the payment pressure on new subscribers while leverageing the insurance lever to the maximum.

src: 这点还是非常不错的。
tgt: This is good.
hypo: This is quite good.

src: 可以考虑。
tgt: It can be considered.
hypo: It is possible to consider.

src: 从业务员专业度来看：这点尤为重要，因为保险是一个专业度要求非常强的行业，很多互联网产品客户可以自己投保，这种就会存在很多的误区，在健康告知和职业这块，非保险从业人员往往在投保的时候会添加自己的主观意识，觉得自己健康或者符合，这样容易存在很多理赔隐患，有可能被拒赔的风险。
tgt: In terms of the professional level of sales personnel: this is especially important as insurance industry has a strict requirement on expertise; for many internet products, customers can apply for insurance by themselves, which will cause many misunderstandings; in terms of health notification and occupation, non-insurance practitioners often add their subjective awareness when applying for insurance, and feel that they are healthy or in line with it; like this, there will be a lot of hidden dangers in claims settlement and the risk of being rejected.
hypo: From the professional level of sales representatives, this is particularly important, as insurance is a highly demanding industry. Many internet products allow customers to self-inssure, which can lead to many misconceptions. In terms of health information and work category, non-insurance professionals often include their own subjective opinions when enrolling，觉得自己 healthy or eligible. This can create many理赔隐患， with the risk of being refused insurance coverage.

src: 我自己曾在“腾讯微保”（和小雨伞一样，也是互联网保险经纪平台）做过保险电话销售，非常负责任的告诉大家。
tgt: I worked as insurance telemarketing personnel in “Tencent Micro-Insurance” (like Little Umbrella, it is also an Internet insurance brokerage platform), and I can tell you.
hypo: I worked as a保险电话销售人员 for "WeChat Micro Insurance" (like Little Umbrella, an Internet insurance brokerage platform), and I am very responsible to let you know about it.

src: 互联网的保险是真的，也靠谱，不靠谱的是人，互联网渠道没有专业的从业人员，也有很多的销售误导。
tgt: The insurance products on the internet are real and reliable, and it is the people who are not reliable; there are no professional practitioners on the internet, and there is much misleading information in sales.
hypo: The insurance online is true and reliable, but the people are unreliable. There are no professional从业人员 in online channels, and there are also many sales误导.

src: 比如：1元保险保600万，买保险送手机，免费领取6万重疾保额，这些营销策略没有错，可是却避重就轻，不会告诉投保人，首月1元，次月是需要按正常收费的，几十到200不等，很多客户扣费一两年自己买的是个啥不清楚。
tgt: For example: there is nothing wrong with sales strategies like 1 yuan insurance covers 6 million yuan, buy insurance and get free mobile phones, and get 60,000 serious illness insurance coverage for free; however, they withhold important information and won't tell the policyholder that the first month is 1 yuan, and the fee next month is charged normally, ranging from a few dozens to 200; many customers don’t know what they bought after they’ve been charged for one or two years.
hypo: For example: A insurance policy pays 6 million for 1 dollar, getting a phone for free, and a 6-million-dollar health insurance quote on a first-time purchase. These marketing strategies may be correct, but they avoid focusing on the main points and not explaining to customers what they are getting. For some customers, they may be unfamiliar with the details of their policy until after they have already signed up for it for a few months. Many customers may be confused about what they are paying for or what they have purchased over the course of several years.

src: 以为可以花1块钱，保险公司赔600万（天下掉馅饼）。
tgt: They thought they could spend 1 yuan and get a six million claim settlement from the insurance company (pie in the sky).
hypo: The claim settlement was unexpected as the insurance company paid 6 million dollars.

src: 免费送手机，是保单尾号比如6666，8888这种特殊保单号段才送的，并且如果中奖短信发出，自己不兑换，也没有人提醒的。
tgt: Getting mobile phone for free means only policy ending with special numbers such as 6666 and 8888 can get a free phone, and no one will remind you again if the text message is sent to you and you don’t redeem it yourself.
hypo: Get a free phone, only when it's given as a special contract尾 number, like 6666 or 8888, and if a winning message is sent, you won't be able to兑换 without no one reminding you.

src: （这对于投保人来说，就又是一个坑）免费领6万重疾保额，是短期的，如果只靠这个，没有其他商业险，万一真发生重疾，6万能干嘛，解决不了问题，以后的生活开始裸奔。
tgt: (This is yet another trap for the policyholder) It is a short-term activity to claim 60000 serious disease insurance for free; if you only rely on this and there is no other commercial insurance, 60000 yuan will not solve any problem in case of the happening of a serious disease, and you will have nothing in your life later.
hypo: This is a trap for investors. They can免费 receive a $600,000 health insurance coverage, but if they only rely on this coverage and do not have other商业 insurance, if something really happens to them, what will $600,000 do? It will not solve the problem and their future life will be exposed.

src: 目前对于互联网保险销售的误导，国家也在严厉打击。
tgt: Our country is also cracking down on misleading Internet insurance sales at present.
hypo: Currently, the country is also actively working to严厉打击 misleading Internet insurance sales.

src: 所以综合来看，平台是没有问题，产品也没有问题，有问题的是业务员的专业度和职业操守。
tgt: Therefore, there is no problem with the platform or the products; what matters is the professionalism and professional integrity of the salesperson.
hypo: So overall, the platform is fine, and the products are also fine. The problem is with the professionalism and integrity of the sales representative.

src: 建议题主综合慎重考虑，其实很多线下保险经纪公司的产品更广，客户可以选择的机会和产品更多，有些产品的性价比也优于互联网产品。
tgt: It is suggested that the original post should think about it carefully; in fact, there are many offline insurance brokerage companies with a wider range of products, and customers have more opportunities and products to choose from; some products are better than Internet products in terms of cost performance.
hypo: Suggest you consider the whole thing carefully. In fact, many offline insurance agencies offer wider range of products, more options for customers, and some products have better value-add.

src: 我自己就帮助过59位互联网客户，承保线下产品，保费每个人节约2000-3000元/年。
tgt: I myself have helped 59 Internet customers to underwrite offline products, helping each person save 2000-3000 yuan of premium per year.
hypo: I have helped 59 Internet customers, underwriting offline products, and saved 2000-3000 yuan/year on each of their保费.

src: 如果大家有什么疑问，欢迎与我沟通和交流。
tgt: If you have any question, feel free to communicate with me.
hypo: If you have any questions, feel free to communicate and exchange with me.

src: 我：明亚保险经纪人，有过3年企业管理培训经验，服务过近千家企业用户，合作超过100家保险公司，在投保前，我会从客户需求出发，为客户量身定制保险产品，投保中，为客户货比三家，尽力为客户争取最好的核保结果，投保后，为客户做保单整理，保单托管，让客户放心无忧。
tgt: I am a Mingya Insurance Broker and have three years of experience in enterprise management training; I have served almost a thousand enterprise users and cooperated with over 100 insurance companies; before insuring, I will analyze the needs of my client and customize products for them; while insuring, I will compare all the insurance companies and help my client achieve the best underwriting result; after insuring, I will organize and hold the insurance policy to make my client feel at ease.
hypo: I am a明亚保险经纪 with 3 years of experience in enterprise management training. I have served over 900 enterprise users and have collaborated with more than 100保险公司. Before insuring a customer, I will take their demand into consideration and design personalized insurance products for them. During the insurance process, I will compare and try my best to obtain the best insurance rates for the customer. After insurance is purchased, I will organize and hold the insurance contract, ensuring that the customer is informed and worry-free.

src: 跟每个客户一起终身成长。
tgt: Grow with each client for a lifetime.
hypo: "Together with each client for终身成长."

src: 希望我的回答能够对题主有所帮助！
tgt: Hopefully my answer will help the original post!
hypo: hopes，回答， be of help!

src: 根据保险监管部门的定义，互联网保险就是投保人点击投保链接后，可以自主完成所有的投保流程的保险业务。
tgt: According to the definition of insurance supervising departments, Internet insurance is an insurance business in which the applicant can complete the entire insurance process independently after clicking the insuring link.
hypo: According to the insurance regulatory authority's definition, Internet insurance is an insurance business in which the applicant can complete the entire insurance purchasing process by himself by clicking the link.

src: 在这个过程中，投保人不需要签字，保险顾问也不需要签字，所有步骤全部都可以由投保人自主完成。
tgt: In this process, neither the applicant nor the insurance consultant needs to sign, so all the steps can be fulfilled independently by the applicant.
hypo: In this process, the insured does not need to sign, and the insurance consultant does not need to sign, and all steps can be completed by the insured on his/her own.

src: 虽然互联网保险的投保没太有“仪式感”，甚至可能连打印版的纸质合同都没有，但是这丝毫不影响电子版合同的有效性与法律效力。
tgt: Although insuring an Internet insurance product has no “sense of ritual”, and even there is no printed copy of contact, it doesn’t affect the validity and legal effect of electronic contract at all.
hypo: Although Internet insurance premiums do not typically involve "仪式化" measures, and may even lack a printed copy of the physical contract, this does not affect the effectiveness and legal validity of the electronic version of the contract.

src: 这种模式，有点类似于“电话销售”一般的流水线作业，但如此购买保险也会有一个致命的问题，那就是——后续的服务可能会跟不上。
tgt: This pattern is somewhat similar to assembly line operation of “telemarketing”, but buying insurance this way will also have a fatal problem, that is, the follow-up service may not keep up.
hypo: This model is somewhat similar to the typical production line process of "phone sales," but purchasing insurance also has a fatal problem: the subsequent services may not be able to catch up.

src: 保险通常是一份长达几十年的长期契约，我们在购买保险的时候，是不是应该认真思考一下，我们所选择的这个“中介”，是不是一个可以与我们长期相伴、在很多年后也会给我们提供服务的“保险中介人”呢？
tgt: Insurance is usually a long-term contract that lasts for decades; when we buy insurance, shouldn’t we seriously consider whether the “intermediary” we choose is an “insurance intermediary” who can accompany us for a long time and provide services to us many years later?
hypo: 保险通常是一份长达几十年的长期契约，我们在购买保险的时候，是不是应该认真思考一下，我们所选择的这个“中介”，是不是一个可以与我们长期相伴、在很多年后也会给我们提供服务的“保险中介人”呢？  The insurance is usually a long-term contract with a long duration. When we buy insurance, should we really think about carefully whether the " intermediary" we choose is a "insurance intermediary" who can provide services to us for a long time and will be with us many years later?

src: 从以前到现在，我都反对任何形式的污蔑和谩骂，更不能接受这类人身攻击的行为。
tgt: I have been against any form of insult or abuse since the beginning, and I will not stand such personal attacks.
hypo: From past to present, I am against any kind of insults or abuse, and even more无法接受 physical attacks on this kind of person.

src: 在文明社会，我们可以包容一切，但就是要杜绝这种恶棍。
tgt: In this civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we need to get rid of these bullies.
hypo: In a civilized society, we can tolerate everything, but we must eliminate this rogue.

src: 如果不看政党和派系，要先抵制的，就是这种不文明的作风。
tgt: If you don’t look at political parties and factions, it is this uncivilized actions that should be boycotted first.
hypo: The English translation for the phrase "如果不看政党和派系，要先抵制的，就是这种不文明的作风" is "This impolite behavior should be resistance before considering political factions."

src: 从你开始发来脸书加好友请求开始，进而发表具调侃性的帖子，再到你试图把所谓我的家地点和父亲名字发布在社交媒体上，我都已经采取不回应的态度。
tgt: I never replied to you since you started to send me Facebook friend request, published ridicule posts, and then tried to post the so-called location of my home and my father’s name on social media.
hypo: From your Facebook add friend request, followed by humorous posts, to your attempt to publish my so-called home location and father's name on social media, I have taken a no response attitude.

src: 你过后变本加厉地不只按一日六餐的频率持续tag我，更在脸书跟你的所谓朋友们继续肆无忌惮地讨论着关于我一些隐晦、羞辱的言论，样貌、身材、好生养、又什么床上种草莓、要不要插之类的留言，我...也算了。
tgt: After that, you made it worse by not only continuing to tag me six times a day, but also continuing to wantonly discuss with your so-called friends on Facebook about some obscure and humiliating remarks about me, my appearance, figure, shape fit for giving birth, getting love bites in bed, whether to penetrate or not, I... forget it.
hypo: The English translation for the given sentence is:  "You continued to tag me not only at the frequency of one meal a day, but also on Facebook with your so-called friends to continue discussing indirectly and羞辱ing me with comments about my appearance，身材， good governance, and even comments about播种草莓 and whether to插."  Note: "so-called friends" and "your so-called" are included in the translation to convey the meaning of the words used.

src: 怎知后来我更收到多位朋友发来有关你的脸书朋友户口上载一张你的照片和具性骚扰成分的言论。
tgt: It was unexpected that more people sent me a photo uploaded to your Facebook friends page and your harassing comments.
hypo: I didn't know that later I received multiple friends sending me information about your Facebook friends uploading a picture of you and性骚扰-like comments on your page.

src: 抱歉，作为一位女生，我再也无法继续沉默了。
tgt: Sorry, I cannot be silent anymore as a girl.
hypo: "Sorry, as a girl, I cannot continue to be silent any more."

src: 我报警的新闻上载后，你完全没有收敛，反而更越发嚣张。
tgt: After the news of me calling the police was published, you did not restrain yourself at all, but became more arrogant.
hypo: After the news of my报警 was uploaded, you didn't stop at all, but rather became more arrogant.

src: 我不理你是什么政治背景，也不管你是什么身份地位，在我们的社会，是需要两性尊重的。
tgt: I don’t care about your political background or your identity or position; in our society, the two genders shall respect each other.
hypo: I不理你是什么政治背景，也不管你是什么身份地位，在我们的社会，是需要两性尊重的。  Our society requires respect for both genders.

src: 是的，你们可以继续这种具调侃性、隐晦、羞辱、辱骂的言论，你也可以继续说你只是关爱和关注我，你可以继续认为这并不是骚扰、你甚至可以继续否认那不是你制的图或者继续发表一切攻击性言论。
tgt: Yes, you can continue with your ridicule, obscure, humiliating and abusive remarks; you can continue to say that you just care about and pay attention to me; you can continue to think that this is not harassment; you can even continue to deny that you made the pictures or continue to make all the offensive remarks.
hypo: Sure, here's the English translation for the phrase you provided:  "Yes, you can continue to engage in such humorous，晦涩，羞辱， and derogatory language. You can also continue to express your love and concern for me. You can continue to believe that this is not harassment. You can even continue to deny that it's your own image or continue to publish all攻击性言论."

src: 没错，我不能，也没有能力阻止你们。
tgt: Yes, I can’t and won’t stop you.
hypo: Yes, you are correct. I cannot and do not have the ability to stop you.

src: 我既不认识你，也不想认识你，我的样貌和身材更不需要你评头论足。
tgt: I don’t know you and I don’t want to know you, and my appearance and body don’t need you judgement.
hypo: I don't know you, and I don't want to know you. My appearance and body don't require your judgment or attention.

src: 我甚至不认为会有哪一位女生愿意让别人如此地羞辱自己来换来出名。
tgt: I don’t even think any girl would want to be famous by being humiliated like this.
hypo: I don't think there is any girl who would willing to let herself be羞辱ed by others in order to become famous.

src: 朋友问我，还好吗？
tgt: My friends asked me if I was okay.
hypo: 可以翻译为 "My friend asked if I was okay."

src: 我说好，你也不会信。
tgt: You won’t believe it if I say yes.
hypo: If I says, you will not believe.

src: 我觉得不会有任何一位女生被如此霸凌后还可以说自己还好。
tgt: I don’t think any girl could say they are okay after being bullied like this.
hypo: I believe that no girl could say okay after being霸凌ed like this.

src: 无论在工作、社会、政坛或商界，只有那些连基本品德都没有的人，才会选择用这种方式来伤害任何一位女性。
tgt: No matter it’s in the workplace, society, politics or the business world, only those without basic moral character will harm a woman in this way.
hypo: In work, society, politics, or business, only those with no basic qualities will choose to harm any female in such a way.

src: 我相信，公道自在人心。
tgt: I believe justice is in everyone’s heart.
hypo: I believe that justice lies within everyone.

src: 我截了部分留言给大家评理
tgt: I took screenshots of part of the comments and you can make your judgement.
hypo: I截了部分留言给大家评理 To provide a translation, I will make sure to include the following phrases:  - I截了部分留言给大家评理 (I took some comments and put them together to provide a translation)

src: 你自己发的贴应该没有人可以冒充你了吧
tgt: You posted it yourself, and no one will pretend to be you, right?
hypo: "Will pretend" 的英语翻译是 "will pretend to be"，因此该句子的翻译为：  "你应该没有谁能冒充你了吧，因为已经有人声称自己是你所发帖子的作者了。"

src: 我只能说你是文明的公敌
tgt: I can only say you’re the enemy of civilization.
hypo: I can only say that you are the enemy of civilization.

src: 会心一笑
tgt: Smile
hypo: A smile from the heart

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022-01-17 多维 亲中共媒体多维报道：中美关系最新消息：最新卫星图像显示，美国三艘航母正在中国周边集结；美媒还披露，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一罕见访问关岛，对印太地区美国的盟友与敌手释放重要信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers assemble around China; the most powerful weapons visit Guam in rare situation 2022-01-17 multidimensional Pro Communist media multidimensionally reports: latest news on China US Relation: the latest satellite image showed that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; US media also disclosed that one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy’s arsenal in a rare case visited Guam, and sent an important signal to US allies and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: Three US naval ships are gathering around China, and one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy's inventory is罕见的访问夏威夷.多维报道： latest satellite imagery shows that three US naval ships are gathering around China; the US media also披露 that one of the最强大的武器之一 in the US Navy's inventory is罕见的访问夏威夷，释放重要信号 to friends and enemies in the Indo-Pacific region.

src: 据中国智库“南海战略态势感知平台”消息，1月9日，卫星在巴拉巴克海峡附近发现了美军“卡尔·文森”号（USS Carl Vinson）航母。
tgt: According to Chinese think-tank “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform”, on January 9, the satellite found the USS Carl Vinson aircraft carrier from the US army near the Balabac Strait.
hypo: According to the Chinese think-tank "南海战略态势感知平台", on January 9, a satellite found the US Navy ship USS Carl Vinson near the巴拉巴克海峡.

src: 巴拉巴克海峡连通南海和苏禄海，是西太平洋第一岛链上的战略要地。
tgt: Connecting the South China Sea and Sulu Sea, the Balabac Strait is a strategic place on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.
hypo: The巴拉巴克海峡 connects the South China Sea with the Sunle Sea, and is a strategic location on the first island chain in the Western Pacific.

src: 该平台预计，“卡尔·文森”号将前往南海部署。
tgt: The platform predicts that Carl Vinson will do deployment at the South China Sea.
hypo: The platform predicts that "卡尔·文森"号 will be deployed in the South China Sea.

src: 这是“卡尔·文森”号航母首次搭载F-35C战斗机和CMV-22“鱼鹰”舰载运输机进行部署。
tgt: This will be the first time that Carl Vinson carries F-35C fighter and CMV-22 Osprey carrier transport aircraft to do the deployment.
hypo: This is the first deployment of the carrier "Carlson" with F-35C fighter and CMV-22 "fish鹰" carrier aircraft carrier logistics ship.

src: 现在正在太平洋上游弋的美军航母，除了“卡尔·文森”号外，还有1月3日从美国出发的“亚伯拉罕·林肯”号（USS Abraham Lincoln）航母。
tgt: In addition to Carl Vinson, the US aircraft carriers cruising in the Pacific Ocean now also include the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3.
hypo: There are two US military ships currently sailing in the Pacific Ocean. One of them is the USS Abraham Lincoln, which departed from the United States on January 3rd.

src: “林肯”号也首次搭载了F-35C舰载机中队，该中队隶属美国海军陆战队的第314战斗机攻击中队。
tgt: USS Abraham Lincoln also carried the F-35C carrier based aircraft squadron for the first time, which belongs to the 314th Fighter Attack Squadron of the US Marine Corps.
hypo: The Marine Corps.

src: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号（USS Ronald Reagan）航母。
tgt: Apart from the above two aircraft carriers, the US Navy currently also deploys the USS Ronald Reagan aircraft carrier, which is docked in Yokosuka, Japan, in the Asia Pacific region.
hypo: 除了上述两艘航母外，目前美国海军部署在亚太地区的还有停靠在日本横须贺的“里根”号(USS Ronald Reagan)航母。

src: 航母战斗群中还包括“尚普兰湖”号导弹巡洋舰、“斯托克达尔”号导弹驱逐舰等。
tgt: The aircraft carrier battle group also includes the missile cruiser “Champlain Lake” and guided missile destroyer “Stockdale”.
hypo: The naval battle group also includes the missile巡洋舰 "Zan普兰湖" and the missile驱逐舰 "石勒苏益格-拉达"。

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，“南海战略态势感知平台”公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在中国周边集结。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the “South China Sea Strategic Situation Detection Platform” released the latest satellite images, showing that three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China.
hypo: Three US航母集结周边，最强大武器罕见访问关岛，2022年1月17日，"南海战略态势感知平台"公布最新卫星图片，显示美军三艘航母正在周边集结。  Translation: Three US warships are集结 around China's周边， the most powerful weapons have a rare visit to Hawaii. On January 17, 2022, the "南海战略态势感知平台" published the latest satellite images, showing that three US warships are gathering around China's周边.

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机CMV-22B飞行路线。
tgt: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) three US aircraft carriers assembled around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; on January 17, 2022, the flight route of the US carrier-borne transport aircraft CMV-22B.
hypo: (Weibo @南海战略态势感知) 美国三艘航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 2022年1月17日，美军舰载运输机 CMV-22B 飞行路线。  Translation: (Weibo @南海战略态势感知) Three US aircraft carriers are gathered around China's周边， with the strongest weapons making an rare visit to海南岛， January 17th, 2022, the flight route of the US personnel transport CMV-22B.

src: （微博@南海战略态势感知） 另据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）1月17日报道，美国海军武器库中最强大的武器之一上周末罕见地访问了关岛。
tgt: (Weibo @SouthChinaSeaStrategicSituationDetection) According to report of CNN on January 17, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy arsenal paid a visit to Guam in a rare case.
hypo: According to CNN, on January 17th, one of the most powerful weapons in the US Navy's inventory was recently visited by Guam, an island in the Pacific Ocean.

src: 载有20枚三叉戟（Trident）弹道导弹和数十枚核弹头的俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”（USS Nevada）上周六（1月15日）驶入美国关岛海军基地。
tgt: The Ohio class nuclear submarine USS Nevada, which carries 20 Trident ballistic missiles and dozens of nuclear warheads, entered the US naval base in Guam last Saturday (January 15).
hypo: The Ohio-class潜艇 USS Nevada, carrying 20 Trident long-range missile batteries and dozens of nuclear weapons, entered the United StatesDependent Island海军基地 on Saturday (January 15th).

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 分析称，这是向印度-太平洋地区日益紧张的局势中的盟友和敌人发出了一个信号。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; according to analysis, this is a signal to allies and enemies in the increasingly tense situation in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: Three US aircraft carriers are集结ed near China and a rare visit is made to Guam, where the largest and most powerful weapons are deployed, according to analysis.

src: 这是美国弹道导弹潜艇自2016年以来首次访问关岛，也是自20世纪80年代以来第二次公开访问关岛。
tgt: This is the first visit to Guam by a US ballistic missile submarine since 2016 and the second public visit to Guam since the 1980s.
hypo: This is the first visit by a US missile潜艇 to Hawaii since 2016, and the second public visit to Hawaii since 1980.   Note: This translation includes the relevant keywords "ballistic missile" and "Hawaii".

src: 美三航母集结中国周边 最强大武器罕见访问关岛 中国近年来在南沙群岛修建大批军事设施。
tgt: Three US aircraft carriers are assembling around China; the most powerful weapon paid a visit to Guam in a rare case; China has built a large number of military facilities in the Nansha Islands in recent years.
hypo: Three aircraft carriers from the United States are parked near China's周边， and the largest weapons have recently visitedkumkum island. In recent years, China has built a large number of military facilities in the South China Sea.

src: 图为中国在南沙群岛的永暑岛。
tgt: The picture shows China’s Yongshu Island in the Nansha Islands.
hypo: The English translation for the sentence "图为中国在南沙群岛的永暑岛" is:  "The picture shows the Wangyeol island, located in the South China Sea, representing China."

src: （南海研究论坛） 美国海军在声明中称，俄亥俄级核潜艇“内华达号”此次对关岛的访问加强了美国和该地区盟友之间的合作，展示了美国的能力、灵活性、战备状态，以及对印太地区安全与稳定的持续承诺。
tgt: (South China Sea Research Forum) the U.S. Navy said in a statement that the visit of the Ohio class nuclear submarine “Nevada” to Guam strengthened the cooperation between the US and its allies in the region, demonstrated the ability, flexibility, combat readiness of the US, as well as its continued commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.
hypo: The United States Navy statement said that the visit of the Ohio-class潜艇 "内华达号" to Guam strengthened cooperation between the United States and its allies in the region, demonstrated the US' ability, flexibility, readiness, and ongoing commitment to security and stability in the Indo-Pacific region.

src: 弹道导弹潜艇通常被称为“雷鸣潜艇”（Boomer submarine）。
tgt: Ballistic missile submarines are often called “Boomer submarines”.
hypo: The boat equipped withdeliverableballistic missile is usually called a "Boomersubmarine".

src: 美国海军舰队中14艘“雷鸣潜艇”的行踪通常是被严格保密的。
tgt: The whereabouts of the 14 “Boomer Submarines” in the US Navy fleet are usually strictly confidential.
hypo: The whereabouts of 14Boomer Submarines in the美国海军舰队 are strictly confidential.

src: 围绕着弹道导弹潜艇的秘密使“雷鸣潜艇”成为“核三位一体中最重要的生存武器”，这一体系还包括位于美国本土的发射井弹道导弹，以及B-2和B-52等可携带核弹头的轰炸机。
tgt: The secret surrounding ballistic missile submarines makes “Boomer Submarine" the “most important survival weapon in the Nuclear Trinity”; this system also includes launching silo ballistic missile located in the US, as well as bombers such as B-2 and B-52 that can carry nuclear warheads.
hypo: The secret surrounding strategic弹道导弹潜艇 makes the " thunderbolt潜艇" the "中最重要的生存武器" in the "核三位一体" system, which also includes strategic launch boats based on the United States本土， such as the B-2 and B-52, which can carry nuclear weapons.

src: 跟朋友聊起最近Meta大跌 26%，市值蒸发 2510 亿美元，扎克伯格回应「面临前所未有的竞争」，原因为何？
tgt: I talked to my friend about the recent 26% plunge in Meta and its loss of US $251 billion in market value; Zuckerberg responded that he was “facing unprecedented competition”; why?
hypo: When discussing Meta's recent 26% decline and $2.51 trillion loss in value, Zuckerberg responds that the company is "facing unprecedented competition." What is the reason behind this?

src: Meta（原 Facebook）实质是一家广告公司，收入主要来自于广告，今时今日赚钱的广告公司，自己是有流量渠道的。
tgt: Meta (formerly Facebook) is essentially an advertising company, whose revenue mainly comes from advertising; the advertising company that makes money today has its own channel for traffic.
hypo: Meta(原 Facebook) is essentially an advertising company with a primary source of revenue being advertising. As of today, it is one of the most profitable advertising agencies. It has its own traffic channels.

src: Facebook，Instagram，Whatsapp 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。
tgt: Regardless of its function positioning, Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, etc. are all channels of traffic for Meta.
hypo: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, 等等，无论什么样的功能定位，都是 Meta 的流量渠道。  Translation: Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, etc., regardless of any的功能 positioning, are the traffic channels for Meta.

src: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的”广告联盟”,很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。
tgt: Not only that, Meta is also the biggest “advertisement alliance”; Many apps are externally connected to Meta’s advertising, and they achieve realization through Meta’s advertising platform.
hypo: 不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的“广告联盟”，很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。  Explanation: The sentence is written in Chinese, but it's difficult to understand what it means without knowing the context. However, I can provide an English translation to help you understand:  "不仅如此，Meta 还是最大的‘广告联盟’，很多 App 外接 Meta 的广告，通过 Meta 的广告平台是实现变现。"  In this sentence, " advertisement联盟" means an alliance of advertisers, and "the biggest" means the largest in size or scope. Meta is also mentioned as the largest ad alliance, indicating that it has a significant influence on the advertising industry. Many apps 外接 Meta's advertisements, which are displayed on Meta's advertising platform, and the money earned from these advertisements is transferred to the app developer.

src: 但是，时代变了。
tgt: But, the time has changed.
hypo: However, the time has changed.

src: 第一，因为苹果隐私政策的调整，Meta 很难再拿到用户的数据信息，影响了广告投放的效率。
tgt: First, due to the adjustment of Apple’s privacy policy, it is difficult for Meta to get users’ data information now, which affects the efficiency of advertising.
